[\[123a.3\]]byed pa'i rgyu byed pas na/_sman gyi skye gnas ni chu'i yin te/_de ltar chu zhes bya ba'i 'byung ba chen pos ro dang ldan par skye gnas kyi dgos ba byas pas des de skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/chu ni skye gnas me dang rlung /_/nam mkha' rnams ni tshogs pa las/_/de skyes gyur dang khyad par byung /_/
[\[123a.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_sman de skyes shing byung bar gyur pa dang /_rdzogs par 'thon pa de ni me dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams kyi tshogs pa las skyes par gyur pa yin te/_tshogs pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul gyis skyed de/_des na dper na me ni smin par byed pa nyid kyis dgos pa byed la/_
[\[123a.5\]]rlung ni g.yo 'gul gyis so/_/nam mkha' ni go 'byed pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de skyes par gyur ba me dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams kyi tshogs pa las de skyes par gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gang khyad par du gzhan rnams tshul tha dad cing /_rang bzhin du ma gyur pa'i bar de rnams kyang
[\[123a.6\]]me dang rlung dang nam mkha' de rnams kyi tshogs pa las byung ba yin no/_/gal te de ltar sman thams cad dang 'byung ba chen po lnga char gyis bskyed pa yin na/_'di ni sa'i 'o/_/'di ni chu'i'o zhes ming ci'i phyir 'dogs she na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_ming ni shas che las gyur yin/_/
[\[123a.7\]]zhes bya ba yin te/_rdzas gang la 'di dag thams cad rgyur gyur pa yin yang /_gang gang gi shas che zhing mang bar gyur pa des/_de nyid kyi ming du btags pa yin te/_sa'i shas che ba las skyes pa ni sa'i ming can yin la/_chu'i shas che ba las skyes pa ni chu'i'o/_/de ltar na sman
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'i bdag nyid can yin no/_/de bas 'byung ba 'dus pa las/_/'byung bas sman ni ro gcig min/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang phyir 'byung ba chen po'i tshogs pa rnams las sman rnams 'byung zhing skye ba yin pa de bas na/_sman rnams ni ro gcig kho nar
[\[123b.2\]]mi 'gyur te/_ro mang zhing tha dad pa yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'dir 'di ltar gang ro'i rgyu ni 'byung ba chen po gcig po chu nyid yin no/_/'byung ba chen po gzhan dag ni ma yin te/_de dag ni ro med pa yin no/_/'bras bu ni rgyu dang cha 'dra bar 'byung ba yin pas/_gzhan
[\[123b.3\]]las ro 'byung bar mi rigs so zhes brgal zhing brtag par mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir 'byung ba 'dus pa las 'byung zhes bya ba 'di skad ston pa yin te/_ci ltar sman 'byung ba chen po 'dus pa las sman 'byung ba de bzhin du/_sman la brten pa'i ro tha dad par gyur pa dag kyang /_
[\[123b.4\]]'byung ba 'dus pa nyid las skye ba yin gyi/_yon tan gzhan ltar sman la ltos pa ni ma yin no/_/de bas na 'byung ba chen po 'dus pa nyid ro 'byung bar byed pa yin gyi/_'byung ba chen po kha dog la sogs pa lta bur rdzas gcig pu la rag lus pa ni ma yin no/_/de ltar na ro ni
[\[123b.5\]]'byung ba chen po 'dus pa las 'byung gi_/_gcig las ma yin te/_sman la brten pa'i ro rnams kyi rgyu rnams 'byung ba chen po 'dus pa yin no/_/la la ni yang 'byung ba gnyis shas che ba las sman mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro gsal bar 'gyur te/_de yang ro tha dad pa shes par bya
[\[123b.6\]]ba'i le'u las/_mngar ba la sogs ro skye ba/_/sa chu me sa chu dang me/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no/_/de ltar na ro thams cad ni 'byung ba 'dus pa las 'byung la/_de la mang zhing shas che ba las ni 'di ni sman mngar ba'o/_/'di ni skyur ba la sogs pa'i sman rnams so
[\[123b.7\]]zhes bya bar gnas kyi/_mngar ba'i sman de la skyur ba la sogs pa'i zhad du gyur pa med pa ni ma yin no/_/myangs par gyur pa dang nus pa'i dbang gis rdzas rnams la phan tshun du ro du ma snang la/_chu ni ro mi gsal ba yin te/_ro drug car dang ldan yang mi gsal zhing mi mngon pa yin no/_/
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]de ltar na 'byung ba 'dus pa las sman 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du mngar ba la sogs pa ro rnams kyi yang rgyu yin pas/_ro thams cad ni 'byung ba 'dus pa las byung ba yin zhing ro gsal ba mang po bshad pa yin no/_/de phyir nad kyang nyes gcig min/_/
[\[124a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni/_gang gi phyir sman ro sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir nyid kyis na nad ni gcig pu ma yin no zhes bstan te/_de la nad ni nad kyi tshogs rnams so/_/nyes pa ni rlung la sogs pa'o/_/de yang ro la brten la ro yang sman la brten te/_sman ni 'byung ba chen bo'i bdag nyid
[\[124a.3\]]can yin pas ro sna tshogs pa nyid la de dang phrad pa las rlung la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ba yin la/_de rnams bskyed pa las ni nad du 'gyur ba yin te/_de'i phyir nad kyang nyes pa gcig dang ldan pa ma yin te/_nyes pa gsum car ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'dir
[\[124a.4\]]yang mang po nyid yin no zhes shugs kyis sbyar bar bya ste/_'di ni rlung gi rims so/_/'di ni mkhris pa'i rims so/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/de la 'dir ro ni gang /_ro rjes ni gang zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_de la gsal bar ro zhes bshad/_/mi
[\[124a.5\]]gsal ro rjes mtha' mar ni/_/cung zad gsal ba dag tu'ang 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_'byung ba chen po lnga las gyur pa'i sman/_ro thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa de la/_mngar ba la sogs ba'i ro gang gsal zhing nges pa nyid kyi tshul du shes par 'gyur ba de la ni ro zhes
[\[124a.6\]]bya bar bshad de/_'di ni mngar ba nyid do/_/'di ni skyur ba nyid do zhes bya'o/_/ro'i rjes ni mi gsal ba la bya ste/_skyu ru ra la sogs pa gang za ba na/_lces gsal ba nyid du ma rtogs pa de ni ro rjes zhes bya'o/_/de ni tha mar zhabs su cung zad ces nyung shas cig ro dang bcas pa
[\[124a.7\]]gsal ba dag tu'ang 'dod pa yin no/_/dris pa/_mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro la lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par smra bar mi rigs te/_gang gi phyir mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro rnams ni yon tan nyid yin la/_lci ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du yon tan yin te/_des
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]na lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi gnas mngar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bshad par ni mi rigs te/_gang gi phyir bye brag pa dag gis yon tan la ni yon tan med pa zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_sman gyi yon tan lci sogs dang /_/ro ni sa la
[\[124b.2\]]sogs brten pas/_/mtshungs par spyod bar nyer gdags pas/_/ro las ming du btags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro'i gnas la sogs pa la yang dag par na sman gyi yon tan lci ba la sogs pa yang gang yin par ni 'bras bu las dpag par bya'o/_/des na sman gyi
[\[124b.3\]]yon tan lci ba yin la/_lci ba de bstan pa'i ro yang yon tan lci ba yin par mtshungs shing thun mong du spyod pa yin te/_lhan cig spyod pas na mtshungs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/nye bar gdags pa ni cha 'dra bar spyod pa ste/_gzhan gyi chos dang mtshungs par bsgre'o/_/de ltar na
[\[124b.4\]]mtshungs par spyod pa'i nye bar gdags pas cha 'dra bas lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan ni/_ro la sogs pa la yon tan yod par btags pa yin gyi/_yang dag par rol sogs pa'i yon tan yod pa ni ma yin no/_/de bas na ro gtso bor gyur pa las ming du sgros btags pa yin no/_/de la sa'i
[\[124b.5\]]sman lci dang sbom/_/sra zhing dri yi shas rab che/_/lci zhing brtan dang 'dus pa dang /_/nye bar 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la zhes pa de rnams kyi nang nas sa'i rang bzhin can gyi sman ni lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang dri zhes bya ba'i yon tan gyi shas
[\[124b.6\]]rab tu che ba yin te/_sa'i rang bzhin can gyi sman de'i lus ni/_lus la sogs par byed pa yin no/_/de la lci ba ni 'ju dka' zhing lci bar gyur pa nyid do/_/brtan pa ni lus brtas par byed pa'o/_/'dus pa ni yan lag mkhregs shing sra ba'o/_/nye bar 'phel ba ni lus zungs
[\[124b.7\]]rnams rgyas par byed pa'o/_/chu yi gsher dang lci bsil snum/_/rtul zhing bska la ro shas che/_/'jam zhing bad kan 'dra ba la/_/'drul zhing tshim byed sdud bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_chu'i rang bzhin can gyi sman ni gsher ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_ro'i yon
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]tan gyi shas che ba yin no/_/de lus la sbyar na lus 'jam zhing snum par byed pa dang /_rtsa sbubs gsher zhing bad kan 'dra ba 'dzag pa dang /_zas 'drul zhing myags pa dang /_sems tshim zhing ngoms par byed pa dang /_tshigs dang rkang lag sdud cing 'byor
[\[125a.2\]]bar byed pa yin no/_/me yi rtsub rno tsha zhing skam/_/phra zhing gzugs kyi yon tan che/_/tsha zhing 'bar la mdog skyed cing /_/gsal zhing smin pa'i bdag nyid can/_/zhes bya ba la/_me'i rang bzhin can gyi sman ni rtsub pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing /_de ni gzugs
[\[125a.3\]]kyi yon tan gyi shas che ba yin no/_/de zos shing spyad na lus tsha bar byed pa dang /_mdangs 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus kyi mdog skyed pa dang /_gsal zhing snang ba dang ldan pa dang /_zas smin cing 'ju bar byed pa'i yon tan can yin no/_/rlung gi rtsub cing khyab la yang /_/
[\[125a.4\]]reg pa'i yon tan shas che yin/_/rtsub cing yang la dri ma sel/_/rnam dpyod na bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi rang bzhin gyi sman ni/_rtsub pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_reg pa'i yon tan gyi shas che ba yin la/_de lus la brten na rtsub pa dang /_
[\[125a.5\]]yang ba dang /_dri ma sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi las byed pa yin no/_/nam mkha'i phra zhing dngas la yang /_/sgra yi yon tan shas che ste/_/khong stong yang bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam mkha'i bdag nyid can gyi sman ni phra ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[125a.6\]]sgra'i yon tan shas che ba yin no/_/de lus kyis bsten na khong stong ste/_nang stong par byed pa dang /_yang bar byed pa yin no/_/dris pa/_rlung dang nam mkha'i ni gzugs med pa yin pas de'i bdag nyid can gyi rdzas yod par ga la 'gyur zhes pa la/_nyes pa 'di yod pa ma yin te/_
[\[125a.7\]]sman gang la rtsub pa dang /_khong stong gi las byed pa mang du snang la/_der ni rlung dang nam mkha'i bdag nyid can du nye bar gdags pas ming du btags pa yin te/_dper na dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa mthong nas/_skyes
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]bu dam pa dag la 'di ni lha yin no zhes nye bar 'dogs par byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/de ltar 'gro na don dang ni/_/sbyor ba sna tshogs dbang gis ni/_/sman min ci yang yod ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar 'byung ba chen po las byung ba 'dis na/_sman lci ba la sogs pa'i yon
[\[125b.2\]]tan dang ldan pas/_'gro ba ste 'khor ba'i gnas 'di/_sman ma yin par gyur pa'i rdzas ci yang yod pa ma yin te/_gzhan du na thams cad nad sel bar byed pa'i dgos pa byed pas sman nyid yin no/_/de yang ji ltar gyen du nyes pa sel bar byed nus pa'i dgos pa de'i don byed
[\[125b.3\]]par nus pa dag gis stod du nyes pa sel te/_me dang rlung gi shas che ba'i sman gang yin pa dag phal cher de byed par nus pa yin te/_rlung ni 'phar bar byed pa dang /_me ni ring du 'bar bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/_de bas na ro stod kyi nad bsal ba'i don gyi dbang gis me dang rlung
[\[125b.4\]]shas che ba'i sman gang yin pa de rnams de'i sman yin no/_/'og gi nyes pa sel bar nus pa'i sman ni don de sgrub par byed nus pa dang /_chu shas che ba'i sman gang yin pa dag phal cher ni de'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin te/_sa ni lci ba nyid dang /_dri dang ro ni chu'i rang bzhin yin
[\[125b.5\]]te/_de ltar na 'og gi nad sel ba'i rgyu'i dbang gis sa dang chu'i shas che ba'i rdzas gang yin pa de/_de'i sman gyi me dang rlung gi ma yin la/_stod kyi nyes pa sel ba ni sa dang chu'i shas che ba dag ma yin no/_/de ltar na rgyu'i don gyi dbang gis rdzas la 'ga' zhig sman du 'gyur
[\[125b.6\]]ba yin gyi/_thams cad thams cad du ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar ba'i dbang gis kyang rdzas la la dag la lar sman du 'gyur ba yin gyi/_sbyor ba gcig gis nad thams cad la sman du 'gyur ba ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang sbyor ba'i dbang kha cig gis nad kha cig la
[\[125b.7\]]sman du 'gyur ba yin te/_'di ltar po son cha la sogs pa'i sman sbyor ba'i khyad par gzhan dag gis snga ma las lhag par 'gyur ba yin la/_gzhan dag gis kyang gzhan du 'gyur gyi gcig gis thams cad byed pa ni ma yin no/_/de bas na sbyor ba'i dbang gis kyang rdzas
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]thams cad sman yin no/_/de la sman gyi gyen du 'gro/_/phal cher me dang rlung shas che/_/zhes bya ba de la/_sman gyi rigs de rnams kyi nang nas/_gyen du 'gro zhing steng du rgyu ba'i sman slon par byed pa ni phal cher zhes pa mang du me dang rlung gi shas che ba ste/_
[\[126a.2\]]me dang rlung gi bdag nyid can yin te/_de yang gang gi phyir gyen du 'gro bas me yin pa dang /_yang bas rlung yin par shes par bya'o/_/thur du 'gro ba phal cher ni/_/sa chu'i yon tan shas cher yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman thur du 'gro zhing 'og tu rgyu bas 'khru bar byed pa'i
[\[126a.3\]]ngang tshul can gang yin pa de ni/_sa dang chu'i shas che ba yin te/_de gnyis ni sa lci ba dang /_chu gzhol phyogs su 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar sman no/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa la bya ste/_sman gyi phyir smra bar bya ba gang dag yod
[\[126a.4\]]pa de thams cad rdzogs so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/cha 'dres pa'i bdag nyid can gyi sman dang /_steng dang 'og gi nyes pa cha mnyam par sel ba'i sman ni/_sngar so sor bstan pa'i don gyi shugs kyis shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_gzhung mangs par 'gyur ba'i dogs pas/_
[\[126a.5\]]rgyud gzhan dag ltar 'dir ma bstan pa yin no/_/de ltar sman bstan nas de la brten pa'i ro mngar ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag re zhig bstan par bya ste/_de ni/_ro'i bye brag_/'di yi 'og nas ston pa yin/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_ro'i bye brag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi grangs
[\[126a.6\]]su nges par chad par 'di'i 'og nas zhes pa/_ro tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u las gzhung rtsom par byed pas ston cing 'chad par 'gyur te/_'dir ni bshad par bya ba mang du yod pas ma smras pa yin no/_/da ni sman gyi nus pa bshad pa rtsom par byed de/_de ni/_sman mthu la las
[\[126a.7\]]bshad pa ni/_/lci snum bsil dang 'jam pa dang /_/yang rtsub tsha dang rno ba ste/_/de ltar rnam pa brgyad du 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_sman gyi mthu ni thams cad du thogs pa dang /_gtugs pa med par 'gro ba yin pas sman gang la yon tan gyi rigs gang cung zad yod pa de
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]thams cad la mthu'am nus pa zhes bya'o/_/de la slob dpon gzhan dag gis bshad pa ni/_sman gyi mthu ni lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi dbye ba rnam pa brgyad du 'chad de/_de ltar rnam pa 'dis ni grangs kyi rnam pa brgyad yin par slob dpon dag 'dod cing 'chad kyi/_rnam pa gzhan
[\[126b.2\]]gyis ni rnam grangs kyi nges pa gzhan du 'dod do/_/sman mthu tsa ra kas bshad pa/_/gang gis bya ba gang byed pa/_/mthu min ci yang mi byed kyi/_/de dag thams cad mthu yis byed/_/ces bya ba la/_drang srong tsa ra kas sman gyi mthu'am/_nus pa bshad cing bstan pa ni/_
[\[126b.3\]]dngos po gang gis byed pa/_gang la zhugs shing bya ba/_gang zhig byed cing rdzogs par gyur pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin te/_de'i mthu yin no zhes mtho btsun drang srong tsa ra kas bshad do/_/mthu gang gis byas pa gang byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis na/_nus pa ni mthu yin zhing
[\[126b.4\]]ro yang mthu yin la/_de bzhin du sman la brten pa'i yon tan lci ba la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni/_sman de'i mthu zhes bya ste/_nus pa nyid las ma 'das pa mthu byung ba yin no/_/spyir ni sman de'i mthu la slob dpon rnams tha dad par 'dod de/_slob dpon la
[\[126b.5\]]las ni lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad la mthu yin par 'dod de/_de rnams ni khyad par can nyid la mthur 'dod kyi/_nus pa phra mo tsam la ni mi 'dod do/_/gal te nus pa phra mo tsam la mthur 'dod na ni/_lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad po'i cha phra mo'i dngos po thams
[\[126b.6\]]cad la yod par 'gyur bas mi rigs pa yin no/_/de'i khyad par can gyi nus pa dang ldan pa'i lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad la mthu zhes bya ba'i ming mthong ba yin no/_/des na yon tan ni brgyad po de dag yin no/_/de yang gang gi sbyor ba byed pas byed/_rdzas de'i nus pa
[\[126b.7\]]yin zhes bya ba yin no/_/de ltar na drang srong tsa ra kas 'dod kyi sman gang la yon tan gyi rigs gang dag yod pa de thams cad sman de'i mthu dang bral zhing /_mthu ma yin pas na dngos po'i rigs des bya ba ci yang mi byed de/_bya ba gang zhig kyang rdzogs par mi nus so/_/des
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]na bya ba de dag thams cad mthus byed cing nus pa rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/gal te de ltar bya ba thams cad mthu yin na/_ci'i phyir lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad po nyid la mthu zhes bya/_ro la sogs pa'i yon tan dag la mthu zhes ci'i phyir mi bya/_
[\[127a.2\]]de dag gis kyang bya ba de ni byed pa nyid yin no zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_des na lci la sogs pa nyid/_/nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa dang /_/yon tan ma lus snying por ni/_/gyur pas mthu zhes bshad pa dag_/don dang mthun par btags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[127a.3\]]des na slob dpon drang srong tsa ra kas lci ba la sogs pa brgyad po nyid ni nus pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin zhing /_yon tan ma lus pa'i snying por gyur pa yin pas/_mthu zhes bshad cing nus pa zhes ming du btags pa de ni gzhung dang don mthun zhing ldan par ming du btags pa yin
[\[127a.4\]]no/_/de la nus pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa ni yon tan lhag pa nyid de phul du byung ba'i nus pa'o/_/yon tan ma lus pa'i snying po ni yon tan mtha' dag gi dam par gyur pa'o/_/tha snyad ni 'jig rten pa dang /_bstan bcos kyi brtags pa rnams so/_/de las kyang 'di rnams ni tha snyad
[\[127a.5\]]gtso bo yin no/_/de yang 'jig rten pa rnams 'di skad smra ba dag thos shing mthong ste/_'di ni lci ba'o/_/'di ni yang ba'o/_/'di'i yon tan ni 'di lta bu'o zhes zer ba de bzhin du bstan bcos las/_gces pa mang du yod na yang /_/tha snyad gtso bo nyid kyis yin/_/zhes
[\[127a.6\]]bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no/_/gzhan yang gces pa mang du smos zhes bya ba yin te/_lci ba la sogs pa de ni gces par mang du smos pa yin gyi/_ro la sogs pa rnams ni de lta ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du gtso bo nyid du smos pa yang yin te/_rol sogs pa'i yon tan las
[\[127a.7\]]de rnams mchog tu bzung bar 'og nas bshad de/_bad kan la sogs pa'i nad kyi rang bzhin brtag pa na/_rang rang gi yon tan lci ba la sogs pa yod par bstan pa dang /_bad kan lci zhing bsil la snum/_/zhes bshad kyi mngar bar ma bshad pa dang /_mkhris pa snum bcas
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bsil zhing tsha/_/zhes bshad kyi yang bar ma bshad pa yin no/_/de bas go ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/de ni ro la sogs pa la/_/srid du zin kyang ma bshad de/_/de bas lci la sogs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bas de ltar bstan pa'i rgyu 'dis na yon tan ma lus pa'i snying por
[\[127b.2\]]gyur pa la sogs pa las/_gang go bzlog par gyur pa'i ro la sogs pa zhes pa ste/_ro dang 'ju ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gzhan dag la de srid kyang zhes bya ba/_mthu zhes bya ba de yod du zin kyang /_gtso bor ma gyur pas mthu zhes de la ma bshad pa yin no/_/de bas ni lci pa la
[\[127b.3\]]sogs pa nyid mthu nyid kyi/_ro la sogs pa ni ma yin no/_/gzhan dag tsha dang bsil nyid gnyis/_/stobs yin zhes kyang ston par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_slob dpon gzhan dag ni sman gyi tsha ba dang bsil ba gnyis la mthu gnyis zhes bya'o zhes ston to/_/nyid ces
[\[127b.4\]]bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o/_/de yang rdzas gang gis bya ba gang byed pa ste de'i mthu zhes bya'i/_lci ba la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad ni mthu ma yin no/_/de yang tsha ba dang bsil ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi mthu gnyis po 'dir sngar bshad pa'i stobs lngar ma 'dus pa thams cad 'dus
[\[127b.5\]]pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir de'i gtan tshigs smras pa ni/_sman ni sna tshogs bdag nyid can/_/nyi ma zla ba'i stobs can yin/_/'gro 'di gsal dang mi gsal las/_/nam yang 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang 'di 'gro ba na sman rnams ni ngo bo nyid
[\[127b.6\]]gcig kyang sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du snang la/_de yang nyi ma dang /_zla ba nyid ni stobs che ba yin pas na/_de'i rang bzhin las 'da' bar mi byed do/_/de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de la re zhig rdzas 'di dag sna tshogs dag kyang nyi ma dang zla ba'i rang bzhin las
[\[127b.7\]]'da' bar mi byed ce na/_de'i dpe bstan pa'i phyir 'og ma 'di smos ba yin te/_ci ltar 'gro ba 'di dag ni gsal ba dang mi gsal bar snang ba'i chos las nam yang 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i tshul gyis sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid can du gnas ba dag
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]kyang /_zla ba dang nyi ma'i rang bzhin las 'da' bar mi byed de/_de ltar na sman la la ni nyi ma'i rang bzhin can yin la/_sman la la ni zla ba'i rang bzhin can yin no/_/de bas na la la ni tsha ba'i mthu yin la/_la la ni grang ba'i mthu can yin no/_/de la tsha ba mgo
[\[128a.2\]]'khor skom/_/rmya rngul tsha zhing myur 'ju byed/_/rlung dang bad kan zhi bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_de la zhes bya ba ni tsha ba dang bsil ba'i mthu gnyis kyi nang na/_sman tsha ba'i mthu can ni mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa byed do/_/myur 'ju byed ces bya ba ni zas myur ba nyid du 'ju bar byed do/_/
[\[128a.3\]]rlung dang bad kan gnyis zhi bar byed pa ni/_rlung nad dang bad kan gyi nad sel bar byed pa'o/_/bsil ba dag ni tshim byed cing /_/'tsho dang rengs par byed pa dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa rab dang byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sman bsil zhing stobs grang ba dang ldan pa ni tshim par byed pa la
[\[128a.4\]]sogs pa dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa rab tu dang bar byed do/_/de la tshim pa ni bde ba skyed par byed pa'o/_/'tsho ba ni gzi mdangs 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/rengs par byed pa ni lus shing bzhin rengs par byed pa'o/_/khrag dang mkhris pa rab tu dang ba ni de dag gsal zhing rnyog pa
[\[128a.5\]]med par byed pa'o/_/da ni pho ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa'i rdzas 'ju ba smras pa yin te/_pho ba'i me dang phrad pa las/_/gang zhig ro gzhan byung gyur pa'i/_/ro rnams kyi ni mthar zhu ba/_/de ni zhu ba zhes bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho ba'i me dang sman
[\[128a.6\]]phrad cing 'dus pa las gang ro gzhan du 'gyur ba ste/_mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro gzhan dag tu byung bar gyur pa zas kyi las kyi mthar thug pa na/_mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_tsha ba'i ro rnams kyi zhu ba'i tha mar gang zhig zhu zhing smin par gyur pa de ni zhu ba zhes bya'o/_/zhes
[\[128a.7\]]drang srong dag gis bshad do/_/ji ltar mngar ba'i ro zos pa na/_dang ba'i ro'i khyad par 'byung bar gyur pa de ni bstan bcos shes pa dag gis zhu ba yin no zhes bshad do/_/de nyid kyi phyir smras pa ni/_mngar dang lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar/_/skyur ba'i zhu rjes skyur ba yin/_/kha dang tsha dang
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bska ba rnams/_/zhu rjes phal cher kha ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngar ba ni ro zhim pa'o/_/lan tshwa ni tshwa rnams te/_de gnyis ni zhu ba'i rjes mngar ba'o/_/ro skyur ba zos pa'i rjes kyang skyur ba nyid yin no/_/ro kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba rnams ni phal cher kha bar 'ju ba yin no/_/
[\[128b.2\]]de la phal cher zhes smos pa ni/_kha cig tu 'dir smos pa dang mi mthun pa yod de/_'bru la gnas pa'i ro mngar ba ni zhu ba'i rjes skyur bar 'gyur la/_des ni 'bru ni ro mngar yang zhu rjes skyur ba yin pas/_mkhris pa skyed cing lci ba yin no/_/de bzhin du a ru ra dang /_bca' sga dang /_
[\[128b.3\]]sge'u gsher dang /_pi pi ling la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de yang bsdus ba las/_'bru ni mngar dang skyur ba nyid/_/de bzhin se'u skyur yang mngar/_/til mar kha bar gyur pa dang /_/pi pi ling yang bska bar 'gyur/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/de ltar na 'bru ni mngar
[\[128b.4\]]du zin kyang zhu ba'i rjes skyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_se'u skyur yang mngar bar 'ju ba dang /_til mar skyur du zin kyang kha bar 'ju ba dang /_pi pi ling tsha yang zhu rjes bska bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/des na 'di ltar mi mthun pa dag kyang yod pas phal cher zhes smos pa yin no/_/ro dang zhu rjes
[\[128b.5\]]'bras bu mnyam/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro zhes pa lce'i yul du gyur ba mngar ba dang /_skyur ba la sogs pa dang /_zhu ba'i rjes 'di ni 'bras bu yin pas mnyam zhing mtshungs pa yin te/_'di ni mngar ba'i ro myangs pa na lus tshim par byed pa la sogs pa gang byed pa de ni me tog lta bu yin
[\[128b.6\]]te/_ro mngar ba de zhu ba dang /_de mtshungs pa yin la/_gang gzhan ro zhim pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa de ni/_ro mngar ba de'i 'bras bu yin pas thams cad du mthun pa yin no/_/ro mngar ba'i las ni 'ju ba rtul ba dang /_lus zungs rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa yin no/_/
[\[128b.7\]]de la sman ni bzang dang ngan/_/la la ro yis las byed la/_/gzhan dag 'ju bar byed pa yin/_/yon tan gzhan dang nus pa dang /_/mthu yis la la byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste/_sman dang /_ro dang /_nus pa dang /_mthu stobs
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]kyi nang nas/_sman bzang dang ngan zhes bya ba ni yod pa dang med pa'i las sman la ni ro yis byed pa dang /_bska ba dang bcas pas bad kan zhi bar byed cing /_nus ba bsil bar byed pas rlung skyed par byed do/_/rlan can gyi sha'i chu ni nus pa dro ba yin pas mkhris pa
[\[129a.2\]]skyed par byed do/_/de bzhin du til mar ni zhu rjes kha ba nyid kyis bshang gci skyed la/_rang skyur yang rtsub cing dro ba yin pa dang bil ba'i rkang ni rtsub pas mkhris pa skyed pa dang /_skyu ru ra ni nus pa bsil ba dang /_zhu rjes mngar bas bad kan skyed pa dang /_yang zhing rtsub kyang rlung
[\[129a.3\]]mi skyed pa dang /_lan tshwa lce myang tsha ni zhu rjes mngar bas mkhris pa sel zhing yang bad kan la phan pa dang /_pu shel tse dang /_bca' ska ni snum ba dang /_dro ba dang /_zhu rjes mngar bas rlung sel ba dang /_pi pi ling yang de dang 'dra bas/_rlung sel ba dang /_sgog skya dang kun
[\[129a.4\]]dong dag ni snum pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_lci bas rlung sel bar byed la/_de dag ni snum pa dang /_lci bas bad kan skyed par byed pa yin no/_/la phug sgong po yang zhu rjes mngar bas bad kan skyed do/_/bri ha ti dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_byi sha la ni nus pa tsha bas mkhris pa skyed par
[\[129a.5\]]byed pa dang /_sha ni nus pa dro bas rlung sel zhing mkhris pa skyed pa dang /_ku lang+tha ni ro bska yang zhu rjes bsil bas rlung sel zhing mkhris pa skyed pa yin no/_/de ltar na de dag ni phyogs gcig tsam gyi dper bstan pa yin no/_/sman gyi ro sogs gang dang gang /_/stobs ldan
[\[129a.6\]]nyid kyis gnas byed de/_/shin tu zil gnon de dang de/_/sgrub byed rgyu ni nyid du gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman gyi ris su gtogs pa'i ro dang /_nus pa dang /_'ju ba dang mthu gang dang gang yin pa de dag gi nang nas/_stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyis sman la gnas par byed pa de
[\[129a.7\]]ni/_sman gyi rigs de shin tu zil gyis mnan cing stobs chung ba gzhan dag pham par byas nas/_gnas pa de dang de ni bya ba gang sgrub par byed pa de dag ni/_rgyu nyid du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_bsgrub par bya ba nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no/_/de yang ros ni 'di byas so/_/nus
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]pas ni 'di byas so/_/stobs kyis ni 'di byas so/_/zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/don 'di nyid kyis dper brjod pa/_bsdus pa las spros te bshad pa 'dir bstan pa yin la/_/gang 'di ltar ro la sogs pa'i rigs su gtogs pas ro gzhan dag la stobs dang ldan par gnas shing /_
[\[129b.2\]]de dang de nyid du zil gyis mnan nas sgrub pa'i rgyu nyid du byed kyi/_rang dang gzhan gyi stobs la gnas pa dang /_stobs dang ldan pa dang /_stobs chung ba dang /_gnyi ga'i tshul gyis rang rang gi las byed pa yin pas na/_de'i phyir 'di bstan par bya ba smras pa ni/_yon tan mi 'phrod
[\[129b.3\]]sbyar ba ni/_/mang pos nyung ngu zil gyis gnon/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_gang gi phyir yon tan mi 'phrod pa dag sbyar zhing bsres pa ni/_mang po stobs dang ldan pas/_stobs chung ngu zil gyis gnon cing rgyal bar byed do/_/yon tan mi 'phrod ces bya ba 'dir ni/_rdzas mi 'phrod
[\[129b.4\]]pa'i sbyor ba la bya'o/_/yon tan mi 'phrod pa nyid du ni smra bar rigs pa ma yin no/_/de yang drang srong tsa ra kas bshad pa/_sbyor ba ni rdzas gnyis sam rdzas mang po sbyar ba yin la/_de yang mi 'phrod pa ni gnyis te/_rang bzhin mi 'phrod pa dang /_'bras bu mi 'phrod pa'o/_/
[\[129b.5\]]rang bzhin mi 'phrod pa ni/_dper na sman yang ba dang /_lci ba sbyar ba dang /_chab dang bsil ba sbyar ba la sogs pa'o/_/'bras bu mi 'phrod pa ni/_dper na rlung gi nad bsal ba'i phyir/_/sman rtsub pa dang /_ro lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_de bzhin du bsil ba dang /_
[\[129b.6\]]dro ba dang lhan cig sbyar ba la sogs pa'o/_/de ltar na rang bzhin gyis yon tan mi 'phrod pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba dang /_de bzhin du 'bras bu mi 'phrod pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba phan tshun rigs mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba de ni/_gang zas kyi rigs nyung ngu rdzas kyi rigs mang pos zil gyis mnan
[\[129b.7\]]nas/_de nyid du rgyu nyid du sgrub par byed par gnas par mthong ngo /_/de yang dper na sbrang rtsi ni mngar du zin kyang bad kan zhi bar byed do/_/ro mngar ba ni bad kan skyed par byed pa yin yang /_sbrang rtsi bad kan zhi bar byed pa ni mi mthun pa mi 'phrod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]ltar na rigs mthun pa'i mtshan nyid sbyor ba las kyang gang zhig gang gis zil gyis mnan nas/_rang rgyud du grub pa yin par som nyir gyur pa de dgag par bya ba'i phyir 'dir smras pa ni/_ro dang 'ju ba'i mthu dag ni/_/de yi stobs kyis zil gyis gnon/_/zhes bya
[\[130a.2\]]ba yin te/_ro dang nus pa dang 'ju ba dang /_stobs rnams ni ci ltar lhan cig sbyar zhing nus pa mnyam pa yin du zin kyang rang bzhin gyis 'ju bas ni ro zil gyis mnan te de'i nus pa med par byas nas/_rang gi bya ba bstan pa'i sgo nas/_de'i nus pa zil gyis mnan nas/_rang gi
[\[130a.3\]]nus pa gsal bar ston to/_/de bzhin du ro dang 'ju ba de gnyis kyang mthus zil gyis gnon la/_mthu de rnams kyi stobs kyis zil gyis gnon pa yin no/_/ro sogs de ltar stobs ni mnyam/_/ma bcos pa ni stobs dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba ni/_ro dang 'ju ba dang mthu dang
[\[130a.4\]]stobs rnams ni/_de ltar zhes pa rnam pa 'dis stobs mnyam zhing mtshungs pa yin la/_de'i stobs ni ro la sogs pa la dmigs nas ma bcos pa gang yin pa de ni stobs dang ldan par bshad de/_rdzas gang gi ro mngar ba de ji skad bshad pa bzhin du 'ju ba mngar ba dang ldan pa
[\[130a.5\]]dang /_de bzhin du nus pa bsil ba dang ldan pa ni stobs che ba yin la/_de bzhin du ro skyur ba ji skad bshad pa'i zhu rjes skyur ba dang ldan zhing /_de bzhin du tsha ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du ro tsha ba dang ji skad bshad pa'i 'ju ba'i tsha ba dang ldan zhing dro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du 'o ma dang chang dang /_
[\[130a.6\]]na le sham la sogs pa las 'o ma ni ro mngar la 'ju ba dang nus pa bsil ba dang /_chang ni skyur la 'ju ba dang nus pa dro ba dang /_na le sham ni ro tsha la 'ju ba dang nus pa dro ba skyed pa dang /_sman de dag ni ro dang 'ju ba dang nus pa dang stobs mnyam pas ma bcos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa zhes
[\[130a.7\]]bya ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/kho bo cag gis ro dang 'ju ba dang nus pa'i rang bzhin ci lta bu yin pa des ni las la rjes su dpag pas shes pas ni/_mthu zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin shes par dka' bas de mi shes pas the tshom du gyur na mthu ni gang zhig yin/_gang las ni rjes su
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]dpag par bya zhe na/_'dir smras pa ni/_ro sogs mnyam pa'i las gang ni/_/khyad 'phags de ni mthu las skyes/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_ro la sogs pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa nyid kyis las gang khyad par du 'phags pa sman gang la snang ba de ni mthu las skyes pa yin par shes par
[\[130b.2\]]bya'o/_/rjes su dpag pa des na mthu zhes bya ba shes par bya ste/_'di ni rdzas kyi mthu yin no/_/de yang sman gnyis ro mtshungs pa dang nus pa mnyam du zin kyang de la sman gcig las gzhan byed la cig shos kyang las gzhan byed pa nyid yin te/_des ni stobs kyis stobs yod
[\[130b.3\]]pa nyid du shes par bya'o/_/de ltar na sman re re'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos rang gi rang bzhin dngos po rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba nges par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni mthu zhes bya ste/_dngos po gzhan gyi mthu ni ma yin no/_/dan ti dang ni tsi tra ka_/ro sogs
[\[130b.4\]]mtshungs kyang dan ti 'khru/_/shing mngar rgun 'brum 'dra yang 'khru/_/'o ma mar 'dra mar drod skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar na sman dan ti dang /_tsi tra ka ni ro dang nus pa'i zhu rjes mtshungs te/_tsi tra ka la ro dang nus pa dang 'ju ba'i rjes gang dag yod pa de dag dan ti la yod du
[\[130b.5\]]zin kyang /_dan ti ni dan ti rang nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'khru bar byed pa yin gyi/_tsi tra ka ni ma yin te/_de lta bu'i khyad par gyi chos la mthu zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du mngar ba dang /_rgun 'brum ro mngar ba la sogs par mthun du zin kyang rgun 'brum 'khru bar byed kyi shing mngar
[\[130b.6\]]ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du 'o ma dang /_mar la sogs pa mtshungs su zin kyang 'o ma ni 'o mar gyur pas drod mi skyed kyi/_mar gyis drod skyed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad kyang mthu las gyur pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/'di ltar re zhig dngos po thams cad la yang spyi dang
[\[130b.7\]]khyad par gyis khyab pa yin pas/_de'i phyir bstan bcos byed pas smas pa ni/_de ltar sman la sogs pa yi/_/spyi yi las te de yang ni/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_de ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gam rnam pa'i don no/_/de yang sman la sogs pa'i
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]ro dang 'ju ba dang nus pa dang mthu spyi'i las rdzogs pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin te/_de rtsom bar byed pa'i 'byung ba chen po spyi'i las byung ba na spyi'i rkyen spyi'i rgyu las byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/yang na rnam pa'i don te/_rnam pa 'dis sman la sogs pa spyi'i
[\[131a.2\]]las nyid bshad kyi khyad par gyi ni ma yin te/_'byung ba chen po dag gi sman la brten pa'i ro dang mthu la sogs pa ji ltar bskyed pa spyi'i rgyu bstan pa de bzhin du de'i las kyang spyi tsam du bstan to/_/zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de la sman la sogs pa'i spyi'i las bshad nas khyad par gyi
[\[131a.3\]]dbye bas sman de rnams re re zhing las gzhan dang gzhan byed pa'i tshul smras pa ni/_sna tshogs rkyen gyi dbye ba yis/_/sman dbye tha dad gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_spyir bshad pa'i sman gyi ro dang 'ju ba dang nus pa la sogs pa'i las de yang tha dad par 'gyur ba yin zhing /_
[\[131a.4\]]bye brag tu 'gyur ba yin no/_/gang gis tha dad par 'gyur zhe na/_sna tshogs pa'i rkyen gyi dbye ba tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te/_sna tshogs pa'i rkyen ni rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la bya la/_de yang sems can tha dad pa rnams kyis sngon dge ba
[\[131a.5\]]dang mi dge ba byas pa'i las las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po de rnams sna tshogs shing tha dad pa de lta bur yongs su 'gyur ba'i rkyen sna tshogs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa'i sman de rnams kyi dbye ba ni khyad par te/_khyad par gyi dbye ba des spyir bshad pa'i sman rnams las kyi dbye ba tha dad par
[\[131a.6\]]'gyur zhing du ma nyid du gnas pa yin la/_ro la sogs ba yang la brten pa yin pas de rnams kyi las kyang sman gyi dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de ltar sman rnam pa gnyis po las/_la la ni rtsom par byed pa'i rkyen gyis mtshungs par skyed pa yin la/_la la ni nus
[\[131a.7\]]pa skyed pa'i rkyen gyis mtshungs par skyed pa yin pas rkyen sna tshogs nyid du gnas pa yin te/_de dag gi phyogs gcig gi dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa ni/_gro dang nas ni mngar ba dang /_/lci las rlung 'joms skyed pa yin/_/nya dro 'o ma bsil ba dang /_/seng ge kha yi phag ma
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gro dang nas dag ni ro mngar ba dang yon tan lci ba dang ldan pa yin du zin kyang /_gro ni rlung 'joms par byed la/_nas ni rlung skyed par byed pa ni rkyen sna tshogs las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du rkyen sna tshogs pa las byung bas/_nya ni ro mngar du zin
[\[131b.2\]]kyang nus pa dro ba yin gyi grang ba ma yin la/_'o ma ni mngar du zin kyang zhu rjes nus pa bsil ba yin gyi dro ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rkyen sna tshogs pa las byung ba'i phyir/_seng ge'i sha ni mngar du zin kyang zhu rjes la sogs pa kha ba yin la/_phag gi sha ni mngar ba yin pa las/_
[\[131b.3\]]zhu rjes la sogs pa yang mngar ba nyid yin no/_/de ltar na thams cad kyang rkyen sna tshogs las byung ba'i phyir/_ro dang /_zhu rjes dang /_nus pa tha dad yin par dpes rim pa bzhin du bstan pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer
[\[131b.4\]]zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_le'u dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas ro tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la/_sman la sogs pa rnams kyi bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad pa'i 'og tu/_ro tha dad
[\[131b.5\]]pa shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/_ro rnams ni sman la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang /_sman rnams nyid kyi ro la sogs/_/de ni de la brten pas mchog_/ces sngar bshad pa'i phyir te/_sman med par ro la sogs pa nye bar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas
[\[131b.6\]]na dang por sman bshad nas de'i 'og tu brten pa po'i ro'i bye brag shes pa bstan pa brtsams pa yin no/_/de la ro rnams kyi tha dad pa ni ro'i khyad par te de shes par bya ba la phan pa'i le'u gang yin pa de bshad par bya zhing bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/de la ro ni re zhig chu'i rang bzhin
[\[131b.7\]]dang /_dang po mi gsal ba yin pa la/_de ni dus rnam pa drug dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir dang /_'byung ba chen po'i yon tan shas che chung gi dbang gis byung ba dang mi mnyam zhing /_tshig pa las mngar ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ro/_/de ltar chu smos pas ni/_
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]ro dag chu'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin par shes pas la sogs pa ni/_lhan cig byed pa'i tshul gyis dgos pa byed pa yin te/_de bas na tshogs pa ni yang dag par na ro'i byed pa po yin no/_/des na 'byung ba chen po shas che ba'i khyad par las ro 'byung ba'i tshul
[\[132a.2\]]smras pa ni/_mngar ba la sogs ro skye ba/_/sa chu me sa chu dang me/_/mkha' rlung me rlung sa dang rlung /_/gnyis gnyis shas che las rim 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_ro mngar ba dang skyur ba la sogs pa drug po rnams ni skye zhing 'byung ba ni 'byung ba gnyis gnyis shas che zhing lhag
[\[132a.3\]]pa las go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa dang bshad pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ste/_'byung ba gnyis gnyis gang la shas che bar gyur pa de las 'byung ba'o/_/de las 'byung ba chen po gang dag ro gang zhig rtsom pa las lhag par gyur pa yin zhe na/_de dag grangs ji lta ba bzhin du
[\[132a.4\]]smras pa ni/_sa chu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/_sa chu zhes pa sa dang chu'i 'byung ba shas che ba las ni/_ro mngar ba 'byung la me sa zhes bya ba me dang sa'i shas che ba las ni skyur ba 'byung ngo /_/chu dang me zhes bya ba 'byung ba/_chu dang me'i shas che ba las ni lan tshwa'i ro 'byung ngo /_/mkha'
[\[132a.5\]]rlung zhes bya ba nam mkha' dang rlung shas che ba las ni ro kha ba 'byung ngo /_/me rlung zhes bya ba me dang rlung shas che ba las ni ro tsha ba 'byung ngo /_/sa rlung zhes bya ba 'byung ba sa dang rlung gi shas che ba las ni ro bska ba 'byung ngo /_/de lta na gnyis gnyis las 'byung ba yin no/_/shas che zhes smos
[\[132a.6\]]pas na ro thams cad kyang 'byung ba las gyur pa yin par ston to/_/des na tshogs pa las byung ba yin yang shas che ba'i shas rdzogs par byas pa yin te/_gang du gang zhig shas che ba ste der ro'i khyad par gzhan bskyed pa yin no/_/de ltar na shas che ba'i dbang gis na ro mngar ba ni 'byung
[\[132a.7\]]ba thams cad kyis bskyed du zin kyang /_sa dang chu las byung ba yin zhes bshad pa yin no/_/de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/da ni mngar ba la sogs pa 'byung ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang las bstan pa'i phyir smras pa ni/_de las ro ni mngar ba dag_/gang zhig
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]myangs pa'i tshe na ni/_/kha la chags shing lus kyang ni/_/tshim byed dbang po rab dang byed/_/grog ma la sogs dga' ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro drug po de dag gi nang nas ro mngar ba dag tu shes par bya ba ni gang zhig myangs shing lce dang phrad par gyur pa na/_kha la chags shing
[\[132b.2\]]'byar bag can du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du lus kyang tshim zhing bde bar byed pa dang /_dbang po rnams rab tu dang zhing dga' bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du grog ma la sogs srog chags phra mo rnams kyang dga' zhing sred par byed pa yin no/_/skyur ba kha nas chu 'dzag cing /_/so brtse spu
[\[132b.3\]]ni ldang ba dang /_/mig dang smin ma 'dzum par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro skur ba ni myangs pa'i tshe kha nas chu 'dzag cing /_gsher ba 'du ba dang /_de bzhin du so brtse ba dang /_spu ldang bar byed pa dang /_mig gnyis dang smin ma gnyis 'dzum zhing sdud par byed pa yin no/_/
[\[132b.4\]]lan tshwa khar ni mchil ma 'du/_/mkhur ba gre ba tsha bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro lan tshwa ni lces myangs pa na khar mchil ma 'du zhing 'dzag pa dang mkhur ba dang gre ba tsha bar byed pa yin no/_/kha ba kha yi dri ma sbyong /_/lce ni 'joms par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro kha ba ni
[\[132b.5\]]myangs par gyur pa na/_kha'i dri ma sbyong zhing dag par byed de/_ljan ljin sel ba yin zhing lce 'joms te/_ro gzhan 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa 'jig par byed pa ste/_rang gi las kyi nus pa nye bar 'joms par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/tsha ba lce rtse skyo byed cing /_/tsag tsag
[\[132b.6\]]byed par 'gyur ba dang /_/kha mig sna las 'dzag byed cing /_/mkhur ba sreg par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro tsha ba ni lce la myangs pa'i lce'i rtse mo skyo bar byed cing na bar byed pa ste/_lce bem bem por byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/tsag tsag byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[132b.7\]]me lce la reg pa ltar lam lam por byed pa'am/_ske tsho'i lde gus bskus pa ltar tsha ba tsag tsag por byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du kha dang mig dang sna las chu 'dzag par byed pa dang /_mkhur ba me lces phog pa ltar sreg par byed pa yin no/_/bska bas lce ni bem por
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]byed/_/gre ba rtsa sbubs 'gags par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro bska ba ni lces myangs pa na lce bem bem por byed do/_/ro ji lta ba bzhin du tshor bar gyur pa las nyams par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du gre ba dang rtsa'i sbubs 'gags par byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[133a.2\]]ro yi tshul ni de dag ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad nas de dag gi rang bzhin nyid kyi don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i tshig tu slob dpon gyis smras pa yin te/_mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro'i tshul ni sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can yin par shes
[\[133a.3\]]par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/las ni ro mngar ba dag gis/_/skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa dang /_/lus zungs mthu stobs rab skyed cing /_/byis pa rgan po glo rdol skem/_/mdog mdangs skra dang dbang po bzang /_/lus brtas skad 'gags phan zhing lci/_/nu zho skyed cing
[\[133a.4\]]rma 'byor byed/_/tshe ring 'tsho byed snum pa dang /_/rlung dang mkhris pa dug rnams sel/_/ha cang drags na tshil bcas dang /_/bad kan las byung nad skyed cing /_/lus sbom drod 'bri chang nad dang /_/gcin nad lba ba rmen sogs skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro mngar ba bsten
[\[133a.5\]]cing spyad na las 'di dag byed do/_/de yang skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa ste/_skyes pa nas brtsams te 'phrod cing rjes su mthun pa yin pa'i phyir/_bcud kyi dngas ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams kyi mthu stobs rab tu skyed par byed pa ste/_nus pa khyad par can dang ldan pa'i stobs
[\[133a.6\]]bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de bzhin du rtag tu byis pa dang rgan po glo rdol ba dang skem ba dang mdog mdangs dang /_skra dang dbang po rnams la bzang zhing bsngags par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du lus brtas par byed pa dang skad 'gags pa'i lkog ma la phan pa dang bud
[\[133a.7\]]med kyi nu zho skyed pa dang /_rma dang rus pa chag pa 'byor zhing 'tsho bar byed pa dang /_tshe ring bar byed pa dang /_'tsho bar byed cing mdangs skyed pa dang /_snum pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad dang dug las gyur pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed pa
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]yin no/_/yang ro mngar ba de ha cang drags shing shas cher bsten par gyur na/_tshil dang bad kan las byung ba'i nad rnams skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa dang /_lus sbom ba la sogs par byed pa dang /_chang nad ni 'og nas bshad do/_/de la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/skyur
[\[133b.2\]]ba me drod skyed byed snum/_/zhim zhing 'ju byed yi ga 'byed/_/dro ba'i nus skyed reg pa bsil/_/tshim byed 'drul byed yang ba ste/_/bad kan khrag mkhris rgyas par byed/_/rlung 'gags rgyu bar byed pa yin/_/de ni shin tu bsten drags na/_/lus lhod rab rib mgo 'khor
[\[133b.3\]]dang /_/g.yan pa skya rbab me dbal dang /_/'or nad thor bu skom rims skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro skyur ba bsten cing spyad na/_khong ba'i me drod skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du snum pa dang /_zhim zhing sems dga' bar byed pa dang /_kha zas 'ju zhing smin par byed
[\[133b.4\]]pa dang /_yi ga 'byed cing zas len pa dang /_de bzhin du dro ba'i nus pa skyed pa dang /_bskus na reg pa kha ba ltar bsil ba dang /_tshim par byed pa dang /_kha zas 'drul zhing sla bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du yang ba dang /_bad kan dang mkhris pa dang /_khrag rgyas par byed pa dang /_
[\[133b.5\]]de bzhin du rlung lam 'gags shing 'khyil ba dag bde bar rgyu bar byed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin no/_/ro skyur ba de ni shin tu bsten drags shing shas cher zos na lus lhod cing mi mkhregs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du rab rib la sogs pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa sra dang
[\[133b.6\]]'khyil ba dang /_/'gags pa 'byin cing drod skyed byed/_/snum dang dugs kyis rdul zhing rno/_/yi ga 'byed cing gcod 'byed byed/_/de ni drags pas rlung khrag dang /_/skra 'byi skra dkar gnyer ma dang /_/skom mdze dug dang me dbal rnams/_/skyed cing stobs ni 'bri
[\[133b.7\]]bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro lan tshwa can bsten cing longs spyad na/_sra ba 'byin par byed pa dang /_'khyil ba 'byin par byed pa dang /_'gags pa 'byin par byed pa yin no/_/de la sra ba ni rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa'o/_/'khyil ba ni bshang ba la sogs
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]pa'i tshogs pa 'khyil zhing 'byung du mi btub pa'o/_/'gags pa ni rtsa sbubs rnams 'gags pa ste/_de dag 'byin cing sel bar byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du drod skyed de me'i shas 'phel bar byed pa dang /_snum pa dang /_dugs kyis rdul
[\[134a.2\]]'byin par byed pa dang /_rno zhing 'jug pa myur ba dang /_yi ga 'byed cing zas 'dod pa dang /_gcod cing kha gnyis su byed pa dang /_'byed par byed pa yin no/_/lan tshwa'i ro de drags shing shas cher bsten pas rlung dang khrag gi nad dang /_de bzhin du skra 'byi zhing spyi ther du
[\[134a.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_rgas sra ba'i mtshan ma skra dkar ba dang /_gnyer ma zhes pa pags pa 'dus pa dag byed pa dang /_de bzhin du skom dad la sogs pa skyed par byed cing /_stobs 'bri zhing 'jig par byed pa yin no/_/kha ba rang nyid zhim min zhing /_/yi ga 'chus dang srin skom dug_/
[\[134a.4\]]mdze dang brgyal dang rims slon bro/_/tsha dang mkhris pa bad kan 'joms/_/'drul dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang /_/bshang dang gci ba skems pa dang /_/yang zhing yid gzhungs bsil zhing rtsub/_/nu ma'i nad dang skad 'gags sel/_/de ni shin tu drags gyur nas/_/lus
[\[134a.5\]]zungs zad cing rlung nad skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro kha ba ni rang nyid zhim pa ma yin zhing yi ga 'byed par byed pa yin la/_rang nyid yi gar mi 'ong ba yin no/_/de bzhin yi ga 'chus pa nas bad kan gyi bar du 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin 'drul ba la sogs pa zhu zhing
[\[134a.6\]]gsher ba'i tshul can dag skem par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhin yang ba dang /_yid gzhungs shing shes rab 'phel ba dang /_bsil zhing grang ba'i nus pa skyed pa dang /_de bzhin du rtsub pa dang /_bud med kyi nu ma'i nad dang /_skad 'gags pa'i lkog ma'i nad sel zhing
[\[134a.7\]]'joms pa yin no/_/ro kha ba de shin tu drags par bsten cing goms par gyur na/_lus zungs dngas ma la sogs pa zad cing 'bye ba dang /_rlung las gyur pa'i nad rnams skyed cing 'byin pa yin no/_/tsha bas lkog nad 'gags pa dang /_/mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad sel/_/
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]rma 'jig byed cing snum pa dang /_/tshil dang 'drul bag skems par byed/_/drod skyed 'ju zhing yi ga 'byed/_/sbyong zhing zas ni 'jig par byed/_/'ching ba gcod cing rtsa sbubs dag_/rnam par 'byed cing bad kan sel/_/de ni shin tu drags gyur pas/_/skom skyed khu
[\[134b.2\]]ba stobs zad cing /_/brgyal zhing lus 'khums 'dar ba dang /_/rked pa rgyab sogs na bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ro tsha bas ni lkog ma'i nad la sogs pa sel bar byed de/_lkog nad ni lkog ma'i phyogs su byung ba'i nad do/_/'gags pa ni brang 'gags shing bad kan
[\[134b.3\]]gyis rgyas pa las byung ba'i nad la bya'o/_/la la ni grang ba'i 'dar nad la u dar du zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag ni grang ba'i dus su khyad par du/_grang ba chu yi reg pa las/_/lkog mar skrangs par gyur pa'i nad/_/gag pa zhes bya bad kan 'byung /_/zhes bshad
[\[134b.4\]]do/_/ma zhu ba ni ma zhu ba be'u snabs can no/_/rma 'jig par byed pa ni/_rma shin tu mtho ba'i skrangs bag can 'dzum zhing 'bri bar byed pa'o/_/yang rma 'byor ba dag gi gags byed pa'o/_/de bzhin du snum pa dang /_tshil la sogs pa skems shing 'bri bar byed pa dang /_me'i drod
[\[134b.5\]]skyed cing 'phel ba dang /_ma zhu ba zhu bar byed pa dang /_kha zas yi ga 'byed par byed pa dang /_rtsa sbubs sbyong ba dang /_zas 'jig par byed pa dang /_'ching ba gcod pa ste/_rno bas lhu tshigs kyi 'ching ba dam po lhod par byed pa dang /_rtsa sbubs kyi kha rnam par 'byed pa dang /_
[\[134b.6\]]bad kan sel zhing 'joms pa yin no/_/tsha ba de shin tu drags par bsten cing zos pas ni skom dad skyed pa la sogs pa byed pa yin no/_/brgyal ba ni rmongs par gyur pa'o/_/lus 'khums ba ni yan lag 'jas pa ltar gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'dar ba dang /_rked pa dang
[\[134b.7\]]rgyab na ba ste/_de dag tu gzer ba la sogs pa mi bzad pas 'debs pa dang /_sogs pa'i sgras ni rkang pa dang /_rtsib logs na bar byed pa yin no/_/bska bas mkhris pa bad kan sel/_/lci zhing khrag nad rnam par sbyong /_/skem zhing rma 'tsho bsil ba dang /_/'drul
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]dang tshil ni rnam par skems/_/be'u snabs 'khyil cing sri bar byed/_/rtsub cing pags mdog rab dang byed/_/de ni shin tu bsten drags na/_/bshang 'gags lto sbos snying nad dang /_/skom dang skem zhing skyes mthu nyams/_/rtsa sgo 'gags shing
[\[135a.2\]]dri ma sri/_/zhes bya ba/_ro bska ba bsten cing spyad pas ni/_mkhris pa bad kan sel zhing 'joms par byed pa dang /_lci ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_khrag gi nad rnam par sbyong ba la sogs pa byed pa dang /_be'u snabs 'khyil zhing thogs pa dang /_bshang bsri bar
[\[135a.3\]]byed pa dang /_de bzhin du shin tu rtsub pa dang /_pags pa'i mdog rab tu dngas zhing mdog gsal bar byed pa yin no/_/ro bska ba de bsten pa drags shing shas cher zos na bshang ba 'gag pa la sogs pa skyed par byed pa dang /_skyes bu'i mthu nyams shing khu ba zad par 'gyur
[\[135a.4\]]ba dang /_dri ma sri ba ste/_gcin dang phyi sa 'gags par 'gyur ba yin no/_/mngar ba la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi sde tshan smras pa ni/_zhun mar bu ram star ga gser/_/mo tsa tso tsa pa ru sha/_/nye'u shing ra mnye ba nas/_/ra dza dan ba la gsum/_/me da gnyis dang par+Ni bzhi/_/
[\[135a.5\]]'tsho byed dzi ba ri sho ba/_/shing mngar ma du ka pim bi/_/shra ba ni gnyis bi da ri/_/cu gang k+Shi ra shu ku la/_/sa ha 'o can gash+ma ri/_/'o ma bu ram shing gze ma/_/rgun 'brum sbrang sogs mngar ba'i sde/_/zhes bya ba la/_zhun mar nas rgun 'bru'i bar gyi sde tshan ni rdzas
[\[135a.6\]]mngar ba ste/_sman mngar po yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de la mo tsa ni chu shing gi 'bras bu'o/_/tso tsa ni rgya skyegs kyi 'bras bu'o/_/nye'u shing ni a bi ru'o/_/ra mnye pa nas ni bi ra'o/_/ra dza dan ni ba na ya bri ya'o/_/ba la gsum ni ba la dang /_a ti bal dang /_
[\[135a.7\]]nA ga ba la'o/_/me da gnyis ni me da dang /_ma hA me da'o/_/par+Ni bzhi ni sa la par+Ni dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_mung+ga par+Ni dang /_ma sha par+Ni'o/_/'tsho byed ni dzi ban ti'o/_/dzi ba ka ni ku ra tsa shir sha'o/_/ri sho ba ni bi la bar d+ha'o/_/ma du ka ni ma du ka'i me tog go/_/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bim bi ni tun ta ke ri'o/_/shra ba gnyis ni/_shri ba ni dang /_ma hA shri ba'o/_/bi da ri ni k+Shi da ri'o/_/cu gang ni tu ka k+Shi ra'o/_/k+Shi ra shu ku la ni/_k+Shi ra ka lo li'o/_/mahA gnyis ni ma hA sa ha dang /_k+Shu das ha'o/_/'o ma can ni 'o ma yod pa'i phyir 'o ma la sogs pa'o/_/
[\[135b.2\]]kash+ma ri ni kad pha la'o/_/gzhan ni go bar zad do/_/skyur ba skyu ru a m+lika_/ba lung dang ni star bu dang /_/se'u 'bru rdul dang dar ba dang /_/tsha dang ku shu a mra dang /_/am+la ta ka b+ha bya dang /_/kar ma rda ka bid tha'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyu ru ra nas ka pid tha'i bar
[\[135b.3\]]gyi sde tshan 'di ni sman skyur ba'i sde tshan yin no/_/am+li ka ni tsu kri ka'o/_/ba lung ni pi za pu ra'o/_/gzhan ni go bar zad do/_/tsha mchog rtsal ru kha ru tsha/_/bi da rgya mtsho bkod pa'i tsha/_/mtsho tsha skam tsha ro nye dang /_/k+Sha ra lan tshwa'i sde tshan yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[135b.4\]]tsha mchog nas lan tshwa'i bar ni/_tsha'i sde tshan gyi sman gyi tshogs so/_/tsha mchog ni rgyam tsha dang /_lce myang tsha'o/_/rtsal ru tsha ni so bar tsa la ste/_ming gi rnam grangs ru tsi ka zhes bya'o/_/kha ru tsha ni tsha nag po'o/_/bi da ni kha ru tsha nag po dri mi zhim pa'o/_/rgya mtsho'i tsha nis
[\[135b.5\]]mu tra la wa na'o/_/ro nye zhes bya ba ni zha nye nag po'o/_/k+Sha ra ni sa rdzi ka dang /_ya bak+Sha la sogs pa'o/_/kha ba kyi lce pa to la/_/tsan+dan ur shi ba le ka_/ci skrigs nim pa pu tse shel/_/rgya spos a kar ba tsa ka_/nag ta ma la ser po gnyis/_/gla sgang mur ba ba sha
[\[135b.6\]]ka_/a pa marga po son cha/_/'khar lcags sle tres byi tsher ba/_/rtsa ba che lnga bya gri gnyis/_/bong nga shu dag bi shal/_/zhes bya ba la/_kyi lce ba nas bi sha la'i bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni sman kha ba'i sde tshoms so/_/ci skrigs ni ka ri ta tig ta'o/_/nag ta ma la ni ka rany+dza'o/_/
[\[135b.7\]]ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer pa'o/_/ba sha ka ni ang ta ru sha ka'o/_/byi tsher ba ni dur la ba'o/_/rtsa ba chen po lnga ni/_bil ba dang ka k+Sha ri la sogs pa'o/_/bya gri ni bri ha ti dang /_kaN+Da ka ri'o/_/tsha ba shing kun na le sham/_/byi dang ga dang tsha ba lnga/_/ku ther sogs
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]ldum rngad sngo/_/mkhris pa gcin dang go bye yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing kun nas go bye'i bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni/_sman tsha ba'i sde tshan yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/tsha ba lnga ni pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling mU la dang /_dbyi mong dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_bca'
[\[136a.2\]]sga'o/_/ku the ra sogs ldum rngad sngo zhes bya ba ni tshod ma'i nang nas ldum gyi sngo rngad ku the ra dang /_shi kru dang /_byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'o/_/mkhris pa ni ri dgas dang bya la sogs pa'i mkhris pa'o/_/gcin ni ba lang dang ra lug la sogs pa'i gcin rnam pa brgyad do/_/go
[\[136a.3\]]bye ba ni pa la ka zhes bya ba bse shing 'bras bu'o/_/bska tshan a ru ba ru ra/_/sbrang rtsi seng ldeng shi ri sha_/ka dam u dum+bA ra dang /_/mu tig byi ru an tsan btsag_/ka pid ta gzhon khar dzu ra/_/pad tsa pad+ma ut+pa la'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_a ru ra nas ut+pa la'i
[\[136a.4\]]bar gyi sde tshan 'di ni ro bska ba'i sman gyi tshogs so/_/an tsan ni lig bu mig dang dngul rdo'o/_/btsag ni su bar na gi ri ste/_btsag yug snam mo/_/ka pid tha gzhon zhes bya ba ni ba li ka pid tha gzhon nu'o/_/khar dzu ra zhes bya ba ni ka pid tha rlon pa dang /_khar
[\[136a.5\]]dzu ra ma smin pa'o/_/'bras rnying nas rnying gro rnying dang /_/mung+ga sbrang rtsi sha kha ra/_/skam sa'i sha rnams ma gtogs pa'i/_/mngar ba phal cher bad kan skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_mar la sogs pa'i sman ro mngar ba phal mo che de dag ni/_bad kan skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa
[\[136a.6\]]yin mod kyi/_'bras rnying pa dang /_nas rnying pa dang /_gro rnying pa dang /_sran mung+ga ste/_mon sran sde'u dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_sha kha ra dang /_skam sa'i sha rnams ni ma gtogs te/_'di dag mngar yang bad kan mi skyed kyi/_de las gzhan pa'i mngar ba phal cher bad kan
[\[136a.7\]]skyed pa yin no/_/skyu ru se 'bru ma gtogs ba'i/_/skyur ba phal cher mkhris pa skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_gang skyur ba'i sman phal cher zhes pa mang du ste/_ma du lung ga la sogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mkhris pa skyed cing 'phel bar byed pa yin mod kyi/_rgyam tsha lce myang
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]tsha ma gtogs/_/lan tshwa phal cher mig la gnod/_/ces bya ba la/_rgyam tsha dang /_lce myang tsha ni mig la phan no zhes don gyi shugs kyis ston pa yin no/_/sle tres pa to la bca' sga/_/sgog skya pi pi ling ma gtogs/_/kha dang tsha ba phal cher ni/_/ro tsa 'bri zhing rlung skyed yin/_/
[\[136b.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_sman kha ba dang tsha ba thams cad las phal cher te ro tsa zhing khu ba 'phel ba la gnod cing 'bri bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung skyed par byed pa yin mod kyi/_gzhan du na sman kha ba'i nang na sle tres dang /_pa to la ma gtogs pa/_sman tsha ba rnams kyi nang na bca' sga
[\[136b.3\]]dang /_sgog skya dang /_pi pi ling ste/_gsum ma gtogs pa sman kha ba dang /_tsha ba gzhan dag ni ro tsa ba 'bri zhing rlung skyed pa yin zhing /_lnga po de dag ni ro tsa bar byed ba yin la/_rlung 'joms pa yin no/_/bska las a ru ra ma gtogs/_/phal cher bsil zhing sri
[\[136b.4\]]bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sman bska ba shi ri sha la sogs pa thams cad las phal cher te/_mang du bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan zhing /_bshang ba la sogs pa sri bar byed ba yin mod kyi/_a ru ra ma gtogs te/_de ni nus pa dro zhing 'khru bar byed pa yin no/_/ro tsha
[\[136b.5\]]skyur dang lan tshwa rnams/_/go rims bzhin du dro nus ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro tsha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa rnams ni go rims bzhin te/_rim pa ma 'chol bar tsha ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de yang tsha ba ni tsha zhing dro ba yin la/_skyur ba ni rab tu tsha ba yin te/_lan
[\[136b.6\]]tshwa ni mchog tu dro ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/kha dang bska dang mngar ba rnams/_/de bzhin du ni bsil ba nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_ro kha ba dang bska ba dang mngar ba rnams ni de bzhin du zhes pa/_go rims snga ma bzhin du bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin gyi kha ba ni bsil ba
[\[136b.7\]]yin la/_bska ba ni rab tu bsil ba yin/_mngar ba ni mchog tu bsil ba yin no/_/kha dang tsha dang bska ba rnams/_/de bzhin rtsub cing dri ma sri/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnams ni de bzhin du zhes pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rtsub cing dri ma
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]sri bar byed pa yin te/_kha ba ni rtsub pa dang dri ma sri bar byed pa yin la/_tsha ba ni rab tu rtsub cing rab tu dri ma sri ba yin te/_bska ba ni shin tu rtsub cing dri ma sri ba yin no/_/lan tshwa skyur mngar snum ba dang /_/bshang gci thur gyi dbugs 'byin byed/_/
[\[137a.2\]]ces bya ba la/_ro lan tshwa dang /_skyur ba dang /_mngar ba rnams ni snum pa dang /_bshang gci dang thur gyi dbugs 'byin cing 'don par byed pa yin la/_go rims bzhin zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya ste/_lan tshwa ni snum pa dang /_bshang gci dang phyi rol gyi dbugs
[\[137a.3\]]'byin par byed pa yin la/_skyur ba ni rab tu snum pa dang /_bshang ba dang gci ba dang phyi rol gyi dbugs rab tu 'byin par byed pa yin no/_/mngar ba ni shin tu snum pa dang /_bshang ba dang gci ba dang phyi rol gyi dbugs shin tu 'byin par byed pa yin no/_/lan tshwa las bska
[\[137a.4\]]de bas kyang /_/mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro lan tshwa las ni ro bska ba lci ba yin la/_de bas kyang zhes bya ba/_ro bska ba bas kyang ro mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don no/_/skyur las tsha dang de bas kyang /_/kha ba dag ni yang ba
[\[137a.5\]]yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro skyur ba ni yang ba yin la/_de bas kyang tsha ba yang ba yin zhing ro tsha ba de las kyang kha ba dag yang ba yin no/_/ro rnams kyi dbye ba bshad pa ni/_ro rnams kyis ni dbye ba las/_/sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /_/brtag pa drug cu rtsa gsum
[\[137a.6\]]du/_/rags rim ji bzhin phye ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro rnams kyi gzhi bo sman gyi sbyor ba byas pa las 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul du phan tshun 'dres pa'i sbyor ba byas shing rnam par phye ba las sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun tha dad par bya ba yin pa dang /_yang 'di rnams la brtag
[\[137a.7\]]pa drug cu rtsa gsum du phye ba yin no/_/ji ltar byas nas ro rnams kyi sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /_brtag pa drug cu byas pa yin zhe na/_rags rim ji bzhin zhes bya ba yin te/_rags pa'i go rims la ltos shing mtshon nas/_ro gsal bar myang ba'i tshul dang /_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]rjes su mthun par byas pa yin gyi/_ro phra mo yan chad rab dang mchog gi dbye ba las ni ro mtha' yas pa yin pas/_phra mo rnams kyi dbang du byas pa ni ma yin no/_/de yang ji tsam zhig lus las dgos pa yod pa de tsam gyi rags rim ji lta ba bzhin du phye zhing grangs su chad par
[\[137b.2\]]byas pa yin no/_/sbyor ba nyid ro gnyis la sogs pa'i dbye bas bshad pa ni/_de lnga re re phri ba las/_/lngar gyur pa ni ro gnyis pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro gnyis sbyar ba ni gnyis pa ste/_ro'i gzhi sman dang 'brel pa'i sbyar ba gnyis pa de la ro lnga po de dag gi sbyor ba byas pa
[\[137b.3\]]las 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_re re phri ba las gyur te/_mngar ba phri ba'i skyur ba la sogs pa dang /_skyur ba phri ba'i lan tshwa la sogs pa dang /_kha ba phri ba'i tsha ba dang bska ba gnyis dang /_tsha ba phri ba'i bska ba'o/_/de ltar na mngar ba la sogs pa'i ro re re
[\[137b.4\]]phul ba'i ro lnga ni sbyor ba'i don du 'gro bar byed pa yin no/_/skyur ba la sogs pa ni sbyor bar byed pa yin te/_de yang 'di lta ste/_mngar ba dang skyur bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang kha ba sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang tsha ba sbyar ba dang /_mngar
[\[137b.5\]]ba dang bska ba sbyar bar bya ste/_de ltar na mngar ba dbye ba rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/skyur ba'i gnyis pa ni mngar ba la ltos nas re re phri bar gyur na/_dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_lan tshwa dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /_lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_lan tshwa
[\[137b.6\]]dang bska bar sbyar ba ste/_de ltar na lan tshwa'i gsum par 'gyur ro/_/kha ba'i gnyis pa ni lan tshwa la ltos nas/_re re phri bar gyur na dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_kha ba dang bska bar sbyar bar bya'o/_/tsha ba dang kha ba la ltos
[\[137b.7\]]nas gcig phri bar gyur na/_dbye ba rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur te/_tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar na gnyis pa de dag dbye ba rnam pa bco lngar 'gyur ro/_/gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste/_/lan tshwa gsum ste kha ba gcig_/bzhi pa la ni mngar po
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]bcu/_/skyur pa bzhi po lan tshwa gcig_/ces bya ba la/_gsum pa mngar bcu zhes bya ba la/_sman gyi ro gsum pa la/_ro mngar ba dbye ba rnam pa bcur 'gyur te/_de yang 'di ltar mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwar sbyar ba dang /_
[\[138a.2\]]mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyar ba
[\[138a.3\]]dang /_/mngar ba dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste/_de ltar na bcu'o/_/skyur drug ste zhes bya ba ni/_ro skyur ba gsum pa'i dbye ba drug tu 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_skyur ba dang
[\[138a.4\]]lan tshwa dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste/_de ltar na drug go/_/
[\[138a.5\]]lan tshwa gsum zhes bya ba ni/_lan tshwa'i gsum pa ni dbye ba rnam pa gsum du gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/_lan tshwa dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste/_de ltar na dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[138a.6\]]kha ba gcig pu nyid ces bya ba ni ro kha ba ni kha ba dang tsha ba dang /_bska bar sbyar ba ste/_dbye ba gcig pu nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na gsum pa nyi shur 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa la ni mngar po bcu zhes bya ba ni/_bzhi pa la ni zhes bya ba dbye ba bzhi pa can la ro mngar ba dbye
[\[138a.7\]]ba bcur 'gyur ro/_/de yang 'di lta ste/_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang kha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang lan tshwar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang bska
[\[138b.2\]]bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste/_de ltar na dbye ba rnam par bcur 'gyur ro/_/skyur ba bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/_skyur ba bzhi po dbye ba bzhir 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba
[\[138b.3\]]dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste de ltar na dbye ba rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/lan tshwa sna gcig ces bya ba ni/_ro lan tshwa'i bzhi pa ni/_dbye ba gcig tu 'gyur
[\[138b.4\]]te/_lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar ro/_/de ltar na dbye ba rnam pa bco lngar 'gyur ro/_/lnga pa la ni skyur gcig pu/_/mngar ba lnga la bsten pa yin/_/zhes bya ba ni/_dbye ba rnam pa lnga ni/_ro skyur ba'i dbye ba gcig pu bsten pa ni 'di lta ste/_skyur ba
[\[138b.5\]]dang /_lan tshwa dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar bar bya'o/_/lnga pa la ro mngar ba ni dbye ba lnga bsten cing gnas pa yin te/_'di ltar mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang tsha bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyar
[\[138b.6\]]ba dang /_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba dang /_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyar ba ste/_de ltar rnam pa lnga dang /_snga ma dang bcas pa lnga pa dbye ba
[\[138b.7\]]drug tu 'gyur ro/_/sman ni ro drug gcig pu yin/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sman ni ro drug ces bya ba gcig pur 'gyur ba yin te/_mngar ba dang skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba ste/_spyir gcig pu kho nar 'dus shing gcig tu 'gyur
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ba yin no/_/de ltar na sbyor ba ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ba yin no/_/ma 'dres pa ni ro drug 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ma 'dres pa ni gcig dang gnyis la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang 'brel te/_gcig pu nyid du ni ro drug tu 'gyur te/_
[\[139a.2\]]mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba'o/_/de rnams bye brag gi cho gas nye bar sbyar ba yin la/_bye brag de ni snum gyi cho ga la drug cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur te/_de yang ro dbye ba de gnyis gcig pu gnyis/_drug cu rtsa gsum
[\[139a.3\]]dag tu brtag_/snum gyis gzhan dag zil mnan cing /_/nyung ba nyid kyi rim las bshad/_/ces 'byung ba yin no/_/dbye ba de dag bye brag dran par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad par bsdus te smras pa ni/_lnga pa drug dang ro ni tha dad drug_/bzhi pa gnyis pa rnam pa bco
[\[139a.4\]]lnga yin/_/dbye ba gsum pa nyi shu gcig nyid de/_/sman ni ro drug de ltar drug cu gsum/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro lnga'i sbyor ba du yod ce na/_drug ces bya ba ste/_lnga pa la ni skyur gcig pu/_/mngar ba lnga ni bstan pa yin/_/zhes bshad pas ni/_de ltar lnga pa la
[\[139a.5\]]ni sbyor ba'i dbye ba drug yin no/_/ro tha dad drug ces bya ba ni ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las ni mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba ste/_ro drug gi dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa gnyis pa rnam pa bco lnga yin/_/zhes bya ba ni/_bzhi pa dang
[\[139a.6\]]gnyis pa'i dbye ba ni rnam pa bco lnga ste/_de ltar na bzhi pa dang /_gnyis pa'i rnam pas phye ba'i ro ni dbye ba rnam pa sum cur 'gyur ro/_/de yang /_bzhi pa la ni mngar bo bcu/_/skyur ba bzhi po lan tsha gcig_/ces smos pa'i phyir bco lnga yin no/_/dbye ba gsum
[\[139a.7\]]pa nyi shu zhes bya ba ni/_dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis phye ba'i ro rnams ni/_dbye ba ni rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur te/_gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste/_/lan tshwa gsum ste kha ba gcig_/ces bya ba yin pas na nyi shu'o/_/gcig nyid de/_sman ni ro drug ces bya ba ni/_sman ni
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]ro drug gcig pu yin/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/de ltar drug cu rtsa gsum zhes bya ba ni ro rnams kyi dbye ba drug cu rtsa gsum yod pa'o/_/de dag kyang gong du grangs lnga bcu rtsa bdun du chad pa'i bcos mar yongs su dbye ba'i sbyor ba dang bcas par bshad pa dang /_ma bcos pa'i ro
[\[139b.2\]]drug ste/_ro drug cur ro rnams dbye bar bshad pa gang yin pa de ni dgos pa'i dbang du byas pa las/_mtshon cing lus la dgos pa'i yul du rigs pa nyid las/_rags rim ji lta ba bzhin du phye zhing bshad pa yin gyi/_phra ba rnams kyi sbyor ba brtsis pa'i tshul
[\[139b.3\]]'di tsam du zad pa yang ma yin la/_dbye ba yang drug cu rtsa gsum du zad pa ma yin te/_gang gi phyir phra zhing rab tu phra bar brtag pa dang /_de bzhin du rab dang mchog tu brtag pa'i dbang dang /_de bzhin ro dang ro rjes kyi dgos pa'i dbang las ni/_'di rnams kyi dbye ba
[\[139b.4\]]grangs med pa yin pas na/_'di dag bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa ni/_de rnams ro dang ro rjes ro'i dbye ba/_/rab dang rab mchog dag tu brtags pa las/_/rtsis las 'das par byung bar gyur pa ni/_/nad dang sman gyi dbang las nye bar sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[139b.5\]]drug cu rtsa gsum gyi grangs kyi dbye bas phye ba de rnams ni rtsis las 'das pa yin te/_shin tu mang ba'i phyir brtsi bar mi nus par 'gyur zhing skyes par gyur pa yin no/_/de ci lta zhe na/_ro dang rjes kyi dbye ba las te/_de bas 'byung ba 'dus pa las/_/byung bas
[\[139b.6\]]sman rnams ro gcig min/_/zhes bya ba smos pa yin te/_ro dang rjes de gnyis kyang 'di ltar mngar ba'i rjes ni skyur ba la sogs pa yin la/_skyur ba'i rjes ni mngar ba la sogs pa yin pa dang /_de bzhin du skyur ba ni lan tshwa'i la sogs pa'o/_/lan tshwa ni kha ba
[\[139b.7\]]la sogs pa ste/_de rnams zhes bya ba'i tshig gis thams cad la snyegs su zin kyang /_lnga bcu rtsa bdun po nyid la ci rigs par ro dang ro rjes kyi dbye ba byas na grangs med par 'gyur la/_ro drug po 'ba' zhig la rab dang rab mchog la sogs pa'i brtag
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]pa las grangs med par 'gyur ba lta su zhig 'gog_/de gnyis kyis na rab dang /_rab mchog dag tu brtag pa las zhes smos pa yin te/_ro sbyar ba dang /_ma sbyar ba'i dbye ba mchog dang /_rab mchog dag tu brtag pa ni 'di ltar mngar ba dang /_
[\[140a.2\]]rab tu mngar ba dang /_rab mchog tu mngar ba dang /_cung zad mngar ba dang /_cung zad rab tu mngar ba dang /_cung zad rab mchog tu mngar ba ste/_de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang ro'i dbye ba de rnams nad kyi sman gyi dbang gis nye bar sbyar bar bya ste/_
[\[140a.3\]]de la nad ni rlung la sogs pa'o/_/sman ni a ru ra la sogs pa'o/_/nad dang sman gyi mngar ba ni de'i ched dam/_dbang du byas pa'am/_de la ltos pa ste/_de'i dbang du byas pa las yongs su brtags te sbyar bar bya'o/_/bab bab tu 'chol bar bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya
[\[140a.4\]]ba'i don to/_/nad dang sman zhes smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin par shes par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_le'u bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel
[\[140a.5\]]pa'o//_//de nas nad la sogs pa'i tshul shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_de'i rjes thogs la nad la sogs pa shes par bya ba brtsam par bya'o/_/gang gi phyir ro rnams kyi dbye ba drug cu rtsa gsum gyis phye ba de dag kyang nad kyi sman gyi dbang du
[\[140a.6\]]sbyar bar bya ba yin par bshad la/_de lta bas na nad las rjes su dpags te sbyar bar bya'i/_bab bab tu 'chol bar bya ba ni ma yin no/_/de bas na nad de rnams ni rang gi las kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba nyid las rjes su dpags te shes par bya dgos te/_de shes par bya
[\[140a.7\]]ba'i phyir na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/'dir nad rnams gzhi med par ni ji ltar yang shes par mi nus la/_de bas na nad de rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa/_lus zungs dang dri ma rnams gang yin pa de shes par bya dgos pas na/_nad shes par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]zad kyi zhes bya bar nges par gnas so/_/de ltar na nad la sogs pa shes par bya ba de la phan pa'i le'u bshad par bya zhing bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/nad dang lus zungs dri ma rnams/_/rtag tu lus kyi rtsa ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma
[\[140b.2\]]rnams ni/_nad dang lus zungs dang dri ma rnams te/_de ni rtag par dus thams cad du lus kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin te/_lus ni de las byung ba yin pa'i phyir/_rtsa ba dang 'dra bas na rtsa ba ste/_rgyu'i gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de rlung dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dang /_/
[\[140b.3\]]bskyod dang las spyod shugs 'byin dang /_/lus zungs legs par rgyu ba dang /_/dbang po rnams ni gsal ba dag_/mi gnod pa ni rjes 'dzin yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus de ni rlung mi gnod cing /_dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pas mnyam par gnas na
[\[140b.4\]]lus rjes su 'dzin cing rten par byed pa yin no/_/de la dbugs 'byung ba ni gyen du dbugs 'byin cing gtong ba'o/_/dbugs rngub ba ni dbugs sdud cing thur du 'jug pa'o/_/bskyod pa ni dbugs su bya ba thams cad la brtson zhing rtsol ba'o/_/las la spyod pa ni lus dang
[\[140b.5\]]ngag dang yid kyi las la spyod cing 'jug pa'o/_/shugs 'byin pa ni bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang rlung phyi rol tu 'byin pa'o/_/lus zungs legs par rgyu ba zhes pa ni/_lus zungs kyi sgras ni dngas ma la sogs pa dang /_mkhris pa dang bad kan dag gzung ngo /_/
[\[140b.6\]]de rnams legs par rgyu ba ni mnyam par gnas shing 'jug pa'o/_/de la mnyam par rgyu ba'i gnas skabs nyid kyis de rnams rlung nyid mi gnod par 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid yin te/_gang gi phyir rnam par 'thor zhing 'khrugs pa sdud cing zhi bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de
[\[140b.7\]]bzhin du dbang po rnams gsal ba ste/_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po yul 'dzin pa la gsal bar gnas pa ste/_yon tan de dag dang ldan na mi gnod cing rjes su 'dzin pa yin no/_/mkhris pa 'ju drod mthong byed dang /_bkres skom zas len mdangs yid gzhungs/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]blo ldan dpa' snying lus 'jam pas/_/zhes bya ba la/_de mkhris par 'gyur ba med cing 'ju ba la sogs pas rjes su 'dzin cing rten par byed pa yin no/_/de la 'ju ba ni zas smin cing 'ju ba'o/_/drod ni me'i shas so/_/mthong ba ni gzugs 'dzin par
[\[141a.2\]]nus pa'o/_/bkres pa ni zas 'dod pa'o/_/skom pa ni 'thung 'dod pa'o/_/zas len pa ni yi ga 'byed cing nye bar longs spyod par 'dod pa'o/_/mdangs ni bzhin mdog gsal zhing gzi mdangs che ba'o/_/yid gzhungs pa ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o/_/blo dang ldan pa
[\[141a.3\]]ni blo gros dang ldan pa'o/_/dpa' snying ni sems kyis rtul phod pa yin te/_brtan zhing mi g.yo ba'o/_/lus 'jam pa ni lus kyi sha mdangs 'jam zhing mnyen pa ste/_de dag gis lus kyi rten byed do/_/bad kan brtan zhing snum nyid dang /_/tshigs 'brel bzod la sogs
[\[141a.4\]]pas so/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la bad kan ni mi 'gyur zhing brtan pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa/_lus rjes su 'dzin par byed do/_/brtan pa ni mi g.yo ba nyid do/_/snum pa nyid ni lus snum par gyur pa nyid do/_/tshigs 'brel pa ni lhu tshigs kyi bar de rnam par 'brel zhing dam
[\[141a.5\]]du gnas pa'o/_/bzod pa ni gnod pa la mi 'khrugs pa ste/_de dag la sogs pas phan pa'i las byed pa yin no/_/lus zungs las gtso go rims bzhin/_/tshim byed 'tsho byed g.yogs pa dang /_/snum dang brtan dang 'gengs pa dang /_/mngal ni skyed byed yin
[\[141a.6\]]par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bcud kyi dngas ma la sogs pa/_lus zungs bdun po rnams kyi mchog dang /_gtso bo bdun ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa la sogs pa yin par slob dpon dag gis bshad cing bstan to/_/de la tshim par byed pa ni lus
[\[141a.7\]]zungs tshim zhing sems dga' bar byed pa ni dngas ma'i bcud kyi las kyi mchog yin no/_/'tsho bar byed cing srog 'dzin par byed pa ni khrag gi las so/_/lus kyi rus pa g.yogs shing khebs par byed pa ni sha'i las so/_/lus snum zhing bcud can du byed pa ni tshil gyi
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]las so/_/lus brtan zhing mkhrang por bsgreng ba ni rus pa'i las yin te/_gzhan du na lus la rus pa med na sha'i gong bu nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rus pa'i rkang sbubs 'gengs pa ni rkang gi las so/_/mngal skyed cing 'byung bar byed pa ni khu ba'i las kyi mchog yin par bshad
[\[141b.2\]]do/_/brtan par byed pa bshang ba yin/_/'drul dang 'byin pa gcin gyi yin/_/ba spu brtan pa rngul gyi yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus brtan cing 'byin par byed pa ni/_/bshang ba'i las kyi gtso bo yin no/_/zas 'drul zhing myags pa dang /_phyi rol du
[\[141b.3\]]'byin zhing 'don pa ni/_gcin gyi las kyi gtso bo yin no/_/skra dang ba spu brtan par 'dzin par byed pa ni/_rngul gyi las kyi gtso bo yin no/_/rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis/_/skem dang mdog gnag drod bag dga'/_/'dar dang lto sbos bshang ba sri/_/
[\[141b.4\]]stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams/_/smra mang mgo 'khor zhum par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gi nad 'phel zhing skyes par gyur pas skem pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do/_/de la skem pa ni khrag la sogs pa zad pas skem zhing nyam chung ba'o/_/mdog nag
[\[141b.5\]]pa ni kha dog nyams pa'o/_/drod bag la dga' ba ni dro ba mngon par 'dod pa'o/_/'dar ba ni g.yo zhing 'gul ba'o/_/lto sbos pa ni gsud pa rgyas pa'o/_/bshang ba sri ba ni bshang gci 'gags pa'o/_/stobs la sogs pa nyams pa ni de dag dang bral ba'o/_/smra
[\[141b.6\]]mang ba ni ma 'brel bar mang du smra ba'o/_/mgo 'khor ba ni lus mal na mi gnas shing 'khor ba'o/_/zhum pa ni sems mi dga' zhing gdung bar byed pa'o/_/mkhris pa bshang gci pags mig ser/_/bkres skom lus tsha gnyid chung byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa
[\[141b.7\]]'phel zhing rgyas par gyur na/_bshang ba la sogs pa ser por byed pa ste/_bshang ba dang gci ba sri ba dang /_pags pa dang /_mig gi mdog kha dog ser por 'gyur bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_lus tsha ba dang gnyid chung ba nyid du byed par
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/bad kan drod nyams mchil ma mang /_/khong snyom lci dang sha mdog dkar/_/lus grang yan lag lhod pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid che/_/dngas ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'phel bas me drod
[\[142a.2\]]nyams pa la sogs pa byed do/_/de la drod nyams pa ni pho ba'i me drod nyams pa'o/_/mchil ma mang ba ni mchil ma lhag par 'byung ba'o/_/khong snyom pa ni spro ba chung zhing sgyid lug pa'o/_/lci ba ni lus kyi yan lag lci ba nyid do/_/sha mdog dkar ba ni lus kyi mdog
[\[142a.3\]]dkar zhing skya ba nyid do/_/de bzhin du lus grang ba nas gnyid che ba'i bar yang skyed pa yin no/_/dngas ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la/_/zhes bya ba la/_bcud kyi dngas ma 'phel bar gyur na/_drod nyams pa nas gnyid che ba'i bar bad kan dang 'dra bar skyed par byed pa'o/_/
[\[142a.4\]]khrag 'phel me dbal khong 'bras mcher/_/mdze dang rlung khrag mkhris pa khrag_/skran dang rnyil nad mig ser dang /_/bskyod dka' drod nyams rmongs bag dang /_/mig dang gcin pags dmar bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag 'phel ba las ni me dbal la
[\[142a.5\]]sogs nad skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rlung khrag ni rlung dang khrag 'dres pa las gyur pa'i nad do/_/mkhris pa dang khrag ni mkhris pa dang khrag 'dres pa'o/_/rnyil nad ni so'i sha las khrag las gyur pa'i sha lhag skye ba'am skrang ba'o/_/bskyod dka' ba ni rkang lag lci ba la bya'o/_/
[\[142a.6\]]yang na byang gya zhes pa gdong la dmar po tal til byung ba'i pags nad la bya'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/_/sha 'phel wa ba rmen bum dung /_/mkhur tshos brang lto brla sbom zhing /_/mgul sogs lhag par sha yang che/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha 'phel ba las ni
[\[142a.7\]]lba ba la sogs pa skyed par byed do/_/de bzhin du mkhur tshos dang /_brang dang /_lto ba dang /_brla sbom pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_mgul pa la sogs par lhag par sha che bar 'gyur ba ste/_sha'i steng du sha skyes pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/tshil 'phel de 'dra de
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]bzhin ngal/_/cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs rgod cing /_/rkub tshos nu ma gsus 'phyang 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil 'phel ba ni sha 'phel ba de dang 'dra bar lba ba la sogs pa skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du ngal ba dang /_cung zad bskyod cing g.yo
[\[142b.2\]]ba dag la yang dbugs rgod par 'gyur ba dang /_rkub tshos dang nu ma dang gsus pa dag kyang sbom zhing rgyas pa nyid kyis 'phyang bar 'gyur ro/_/rus 'phel rus lhag so lhag 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rus pa 'phel bas ni rus pa'i steng du rus pa skye ba dang /_
[\[142b.3\]]de bzhin du so'i steng du so 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rkang 'phel lus lci mig rtsa g.yung /_/tshigs kyi mgo bo sbom pa dang /_/tshigs la thor bu gso dka' 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang 'phel nas ni lus lci ba dang /_mig rtsa g.yung zhing zhan par byed pa dang /_tshigs
[\[142b.4\]]mdud kyi mgo bo rnams sbom zhing che bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshigs la thor bu g.yo zhing mi bzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khu 'phel bud med la rab gdu/_/khu ba'i rde'u dag tu 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khu ba 'phel zhing rgyas pa ni bud med la rab tu gdu zhing
[\[142b.5\]]chags pa che bar 'gyur ba dang /_khu ba las byung ba'i rde'u dag chags par 'gyur ro/_/bshang 'phel lto sbos rgyu 'khrug cing /_/lus lci lto ba na bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bshang ba 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni/_lto ba ste khong sbos shing gang ba dang /_rgyu ma
[\[142b.6\]]'khrug cing krug krug zer ba dang /_lus lci zhing bskyod dka' ba dang /_lto ba na zhing zug gzer skyed par byed pa yin no/_/gcin 'phel chu sor zug cing na/_/gcis kyang ma gcis snyam sems 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcin 'phel bar gyur pa ni chu sor zug
[\[142b.7\]]cing lhag par na ba dang /_de bzhin du gcis shing btang du zin kyang ma gcis pa snyam sems par 'gyur ba ste/_yongs su 'dor ba snyam sems par 'gyur te/_yang dang yang 'ong bas na gcis so snyam du sems par byed par 'gyur ro/_/rngul 'phel rngul che dri mi
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]zhim/_/g.yan pa nyid kyang skyed ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rngul chen nang du 'phel bas rngul rab tu che bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus dri mi zhim pa nyid du byed do/_/g.yan pa nyid kyang skyed cing 'byung bar byed pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/mig rdul
