[\[202a.2\]]de nas dugs kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs ni phal cher dang por snum chos byas nas 'dir bya dgos pas na/_de'i phyir snum gyi cho ga'i 'og tu dugs kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad cing bstan pa yin no/_/de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_/dugs kyis gso bar bya
[\[202a.3\]]ba'i nad/_/rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid can/_/snum gyi dngos su 'gro ba yi/_/dugs kyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/dugs kyi cho ga ni las su bya ba nyid de/_de'i tshul gyi le'u yin pas na dugs kyi le'u'o/_/de la dugs kyi cho ga ni dbye ba'i dbang
[\[202a.4\]]du byas nas smras pa ni/_dugs bsro bcing dang tha mal pa/_/chu dugs dbye bas rnam pa bzhi/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_bsro ba dang /_bcing ba dang /_tha mal pa ste/_chu dugs zhes bya bar mtshams sbyar bar bya'o/_/des na dugs ni bsro ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas me'i lums
[\[202a.5\]]rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/bsro ba gos dang lcags dang ni/_/lag mthil la sogs mer bsros bsro/_/zhes bya ba la/_bsro ba'i dugs ni gos la sogs pa me la bsros pas bsro bar bya ste/_gos ni bgo ba'i gos bal la sogs pa la bya'o/_/lcags ni lcags kyi
[\[202a.6\]]spyad thong lcags lta bu la sogs pa'o/_/lag mthil ni lag pa'i mthil lo/_/sogs pa'i sgras ni bum pa dang /_khar ba'i snod la sogs pa bsdu'o/_/bcing ba shu dag sbang ma dang /_/thang shing sha ta puSh+Tha dang /_/'bru kun dri rnams ra sna dang /_/e raN+Da'i rtsa sha
[\[202a.7\]]dag dang /_/snum bag tsha dang dar ba dang /_/'o mas sbrus shing tsha cher btab/_/rlung las byung ba 'ba' zhig sel/_/bad kan 'dres la bye'u rug sogs/_/mkhris pa 'dres la shug sogs kyis/_/glan pa zhes bya yang dang yang /_/dkri ba snum zhing nus pa dro/_/spu
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]'jam lpags rul min pas dkri/_/ma rnyed rlung 'joms lo ma dang /_/dar dang snam bu ras kyis dkri//_mtshan mo dkris pa nyin mo 'grol/_/nyin par dkris pa mtshan mo 'grol/_/zhes bya ba la/_bcing ba'i dugs ni shu dag dang /_sbang ma la sogs pa snum la sogs pa dang sbrus
[\[202b.2\]]shing bsres pa dang /_de bzhin du lan tshwa cher btab cing lan tshwa lhag par mang du btab pa dag rlung las byung ba'i nad 'ba' zhig ste/_nad gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i rlung nad sel lo/_/bad kan dang 'dres pa'i rlung la ni bye'u rug pa la sogs pa phu ras rnam gnyis dang /_ku the
[\[202b.3\]]ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan du bshad pa dag gis bya'o/_/de bzhin du mkhris pa dang 'dres pa'i rlung ni shug la sogs kyis zhes bya ba la/_pad+ma dang phra phran ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan du bshad pas so/_/snum bag tsha dang dar ba dang /_/'o mas sbrus shing tsha ches btab/_/
[\[202b.4\]]ces bya ba ni/_gsum char dang sbyar bar bya ste/_dkri ba gsum po de dag rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ni glan pa zhes kyang bya ste/_des yang dang yang du dugs bya'o/_/gzhan dag las kyang /_nyams re ba sogs rlung 'joms bcas/_/sgyur dang gsher ba'i rdzas
[\[202b.5\]]kun ldan/_/rlan can sha dang legs par btsos/_/snum kun dang ni yang dag ldan/_/dro 'jam lan tshwa shas cher dro/_/glan pa zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba 'byung ba yin no/_/dkri ba dang ni dkris shing bcings pa na dkris pa zhes bya ste/_bcings pa la
[\[202b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de bas na mang du byugs la snum pa dang nus pa dro ba dang /_spu 'jam pa'i pags pa rul pa ma yin pas dkri bar bya'o/_/de ma rnyed cing med par gyur na/_rlung 'joms shing nus pa dang ldan pa'i rtswa shing gso ma la sogs pa'i lo mas bcings
[\[202b.7\]]shing yan lag dkri ba ste/_mtshan mo dkris na nyin par 'grol bar bya ste/_de ni tsha ba med pa'i phyir bya'o/_/nyin mo dkri zhing bcing byas pa ni mtshan mo 'grol bar bya'o/_/la lar ni yul dang nad kyi dbang gis yan lag chag pa la sogs pa nyin zhag gnyis
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]sam/_gsum gzhag par bya ba yang yod de/_sbang ma ni chang gi snyigs ma'o/_/'bru kun ni gra ma dang /_gang bu can gyi sde tshan las bshad pa'o/_/dri rnams ni spang spos dang /_ru rta dang a ru ra la sogs pa'o/_/e raN+Da ni rtsa ba'o/_/sha ni rlan gyi
[\[203a.2\]]sha las tsho khu zhib mor brdungs pa'o/_/snum bag ni til mar la sogs pa'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/_/tha mal pa ni khur ba dang /_/bong ba gyo mo rdo sa phye/_/gso ma'i lo ma 'bru rnams dang /_/lci ril phye ma phub ma rnams/_/thabs rnams du mas legs bsros
[\[203a.3\]]pa/_/yul dang dus las dpags te sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_tha mal pa zhes bya ba'i dugs ni/_bal dang khur ba la sogs pas bya ste/_de yang nas dang mon sran gre'u dang /_til la sogs pa btab nas sbrus te btsos nas khur ba lta bur byas nas/_dugs su bya ba'i
[\[203a.4\]]thabs la sbyar ba gang yin pa de ni khur ba'i dugs zhes bya'o/_/bong ba dang gyo mo dang /_rdob mer bsregs pa la me'i mdog can du byas la/_chu'am sham po'i nang du nub par byas la rlon pa de gos rim gcig gis dkris pas dugs bya'o/_/gso ma'i lo ma dang 'bru rnams pa
[\[203a.5\]]lang la sogs pa'i lci ba dang /_ril ma dang phye ma dang /_phub ma rnams chu skyor mo dang bskol la/_gos kyi nang du bcug pas dugs bya'o/_/thabs rnams du mas legs bsros pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rdza ma dang sbu gu dang rdza skyogs dang /_sla nga la sogs pa'i thabs
[\[203a.6\]]kyis legs par bsros pa'i khu ba la sogs pa'i dugs rnams yul dang dus las dpags nas sbyar bar bya ste/_yul ni sa'i yul phyogs dang /_lus kyi yan lag gi tshogs so/_/dus ni skad cig la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_nad pa'i gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/
[\[203a.7\]]de las dpags pa ni de'i dbang du byas te/_dugs kyi sbyor ba 'di bya'o/_/de yang lus kyi yul ni dper na/_rlung ni ma zhu'i gnas zhugs dang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/sa'i yul las dpags pa ni/_yul rlan can du dugs bya dgos pa de ltar skam sar yin no/_/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]dus las ni dper na dgun gyi dugs gzhan dag bya dgos la/_so gar gzhan dag bya'o/_/nad pa las ni dper na dugs la la ni mkhris pa dang 'dres pa'i rlung la sogs pa'o/_/la la ni bad kan dang 'dres pa'i rlung la dgos la/_la la ni rlung 'ba' zhig la dgos
[\[203b.2\]]pa'o/_/'bru rnams ni 'bru'i rigs lo ma dkrugs shing bcom pa'o/_/chu dugs shi kru ba ra na/_/e raN+Da dang ka rany+dza/_/bye'u rug pa dang ardza ka_/shi ri sha dang ba sha ka_/'od ma arga ma la ti/_/ya ba sha ka'i lo ma bkru_/shu dag la sogs sman rnams dang /_/gsher sa chur gnas sha rnams dang /_/
[\[203b.3\]]rtsa bcu nad dmigs ji bzhin du/_/so so 'am lhan cig sbyar na ni/_/snum ldan chang dang tshwa dang ni/_/'o ma chu sogs kyis btsos la/_/bum pa'am sbu gu ring po ni/_/bkang la nad kyis nyam thag pa'i/_/lus ni gos kyis dkris nas su/_/ci bde bar ni snum chu
[\[203b.4\]]blugs/_/lus la rlung nad zhugs gyur pa/_/de nyid kyis 'dir bkang snod du/_/nad pa zhugs te gnas na ni/_/gcin sri gzhang 'brum sogs nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shi kru nas brtsams te/_ya ba sha ka'i bar gyi sde tshan de rnams las/_lo ma rnams bkru
[\[203b.5\]]zhing mnyes la/_de rnams dang de bzhin du shu dag la sogs pa'i sman sngar bshad pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du gsher sa dang chu na gnas pa'i ro hi ta pa thi na la sogs pa'i nya dang /_de bzhin du rtsa ba bcu pa zhes nad kyi dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du so so'am lhan cig btang
[\[203b.6\]]ba ste/_so so re re nas gtang ba'am/_ma lus pa lhan cig sbyar zhing bsres nas nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du/_de dang rjes su mthun par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du snum dang ldan pa ste snum yod pa'o/_/'di yang nad las dpags pa dang
[\[203b.7\]]sbyar bar bya ste/_mar la sogs pa nad gang dang gang la phan pa'i snum de dang de dag dang ldan par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du de dang mnyam pa'i chang la sogs pa dang btsos pa nad dmigs ji lta bu las dpags te/_blugs pa'i chu de bum pa mchu phra mo btod pa'i mchus blugs
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]par bya ste/_sbu gu ni ring po kha gyen du bltas pa'i nang du bcug ste/_bkang la nad kyis nyam thag pa ste/_gzer la sogs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i lus gos kyis dkris la/_snum zhing rlung 'joms pa'i sman bskol ba blugs par bya ste/_de yang bde ba ste/_ci bde ba
[\[204a.2\]]la reg par gyur pa'i tshul du bya ste/_'dir lan 'ga' cung zad dro bas bya'o/_/lan 'ga' ni shin tu dro bas bya'o/_/de blugs pa ni chu'i rgyun gyi khyad par gang zhig gis rgyun mi 'chad par blugs shing chu la sogs pa'i gsher rdzas 'dzag par 'gyur bas na blugs pa zhes bya'o/_/chu'i
[\[204a.3\]]dugs ni rnam pa gnyis te/_rgyun blugs pa dang chu la bcing ba'o/_/de ltar blugs pa bshad zin nas/_da ni chu la bcing ba bshad pa'i phyir/_lus la zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin te/_nad pa lus kyi yan lag thams cad la rlung nad zhugs shing rlung gi bdag_/
[\[204a.4\]]de nyid kyis zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i sman tsho snod chen po bkang la/_bkang ba'i snod der nad pa bcug ste/_snying ga la sogs pa bsrung bzhin gnas par bya'o/_/snod ces smos pa ni spyi ming tsam du nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste/_zangs chen po'am/_gzhong pa ring po chen po sman chus
[\[204a.5\]]bkang ba'i nang du 'jug cing bcings te gnas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du gzhang 'brum dang /_gcin sri ba la sogs pa lus kyi phyogs gcig na bar gyur pa la ni nad la sogs tshul las dpags te sbyar bar bya'o/_/rlung med phyi nang snum bcas shing /_/zas 'ju'i dus su dugs
[\[204a.6\]]dpyad bya/_/nad dang nad pa yul dus kyi/_/dbang las chung 'bring chen por bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung med pa'i sa phyogs su skyes bu'i lus phyi nang snum dang bcas par byas la/_kha zas sman dang zhu zin par gyur pa'i dus su dugs dpyad par bya la/_dugs de yang nad la
[\[204a.7\]]sogs pa'i dbang gis chung ngu la sogs pa'i tshad gsum du 'gyur ro/_/de yang chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po gsum du 'gyur la/_de bzhin du nad pa yang stobs la sogs pa la chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po yod de/_yul rlan can dang /_skam sa 'dren ma gsum yod do/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]lus kyi gnas mgo dang phrag pa dang /_lto ba dang /_byin pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin no/_/dus ni dro ba dang /_grang ba dang /_'dres ma'i dbye bas phye ba yin no/_/dbang las zhes bya ba ni de dag gtso bor byas pa yin no/_/bad kan gyis nyen rtsub dugs bya/_/bad
[\[204b.2\]]kan rlung la rtsub snum bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyis nyen cing bad kan shas che ba'i skyes bus dugs rtsub mo bya'o/_/de bzhin du skyes bu rlung las gyur cing bad kan yang yod pa dag gis dugs gzhan ltar dang por snum chos bya zhing /_bad kan dang rlung yod pas rtsub pa
[\[204b.3\]]dang /_snum pa 'dren ma'i dugs sbyar bar bya'o/_/rlung ni ma zhu'i gnas zhugs dang /_/bad kan zhu ba'i gnas brten la/_/gnas kyi dbang gis rtsub dugs dang /_/de bzhin snum sngar 'gro dugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs la gnas pa'i nad la ni
[\[204b.4\]]rtsub pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dugs spyad par bya'o/_/de bzhin du bad kan zhu ba'i gnas la gnas shing brten pa la ni snum sngon du 'gro ba'i dugs bya ste/_de dag ni gnas kyi dbang gis tshul de ltar bya dgos pa yin no/_/sta zur dag dang mig dang snying /_/rlig par nyung ngu'am bya
[\[204b.5\]]ba min/_/zhes bya ba la/_sta zur zhes bya ba lus kyi phyogs gcig brla dang /_dpyi la brten pa'i nad la dugs nyung ngu bya'o/_/de bzhin du mig dang snying ga dang rlig par ni shin tu chung ba'i dugs bya'o/_/yang na bya ba min zhes bya ba ste/_gnas de dag tu ye mi bya'o/_/dugs
[\[204b.6\]]kyis grang dang zug gzer bral/_/yan lag mnyen par gyur pa dang /_/dal gyis mnyes la khrus byas la/_/de nas snum gyi cho ga bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs kyis skyes bu'i grang ba dang /_zug gzer bral bas skyes bu'i lus legs par brlan zhing mnyen par
[\[204b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du yan lag mnyen zhing 'jam par 'gyur ba dang /_dal gyis dang por mnyes la de'i 'og tu khrus bya ba de dang po lag pas yan lag mnyes la chu dron pos khrus byas nas/_de'i 'og tu snum chos kyi skabs nas bshad pa'i cho ga bsten cing spyad par bya ba dang /_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]spang bar bya ba rnams dor bar bya'o/_/de dag kyang snum gyi cho ga'i skabs su zas dang spyod lam bstan pa bzhin du bya ba dang /_thal sman rnon po dang /_me btsa' btang ba dang /_mes tshig pa la tsha ba zhi bar bya ba dang /_tshad pas 'khru ba dang /_slon pa la de
[\[205a.2\]]bcad pa dang /_mi dran cing myos pa la slar dran par bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de bzhin du chu tshan gyi nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa spang bar bya'o/_/dugs drags pa yis khrag mkhris 'khrugs/_/brgyal skom skad 'gags yan lag 'jums/_/mgo 'khor tshigs na rims
[\[205a.3\]]'debs shing /_/tshi gu dmar po tal til snang /_/lums kyis skyug bro bar 'gyur te/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs drags shing shas cher bsten pas khrag mkhris 'khrugs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyal ba ni dran pa'o/_/skad dang yan lag 'jums
[\[205a.4\]]pa ni/_skad gdangs dma' zhing rmya ba'o/_/mgo 'khor ba ni lam mi gnas pa'o/_/lhu tshigs na ba ni lhu tshigs na ba'o/_/tshi gu dmar po tal til snang bar gyur pa ni/_de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_der ni zhi ba'i sman gyis gso/_/dugs dang thal sman me
[\[205a.5\]]btsa' dang /_/tshad 'khru skyug bro brgyal nad gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs drags pa las byung ba'i nad khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa la sogs pa zhi bar bya zhing rtse gzhil ba'i sman bya ba dang bcos sbyar bar bya'o/_/dugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i skabs
[\[205a.6\]]su zhar la bshad pa yin te/_de dag kyang tshul 'di nyid la brten nas dugs gzhil ba la sogs pa'i sman bya ste/_dugs gzhil ba'i sman bya ba dang /_thal sman rnon po btab pa la de'i tsha ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman gtang ba dang /_me btsa' la de'i tsha ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
[\[205a.7\]]sman gtang ba dang /_tshad pas 'khru ba la tshad pas 'khru ba gcod cing smin pa'i sman gtang ba dang /_skyug bro ba la de zhi ba'i sman dang /_brgyal ba la 'du shes rnyed bar bya ba'i thabs kyis gso'o/_/dugs ni phal cher lci dro rno/_/de las gzhan pa'i zhi byed yin/_/gsher
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]zhing brtan 'khru snum pa dang /_/rtsub cing sra ba dugs sman yin/_/'jam dang rtsub dang zhi 'byar bag_/gsher bag de ni sel byed yin/_/mdor na phal cher kha ba dang /_/bska dang mngar ba de sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dis dugs de zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga spyir bshad
[\[205b.2\]]pa yin te/_sman gang lci ba dro ba dang rno ba de thams cad ni dugs kyi sman yin la/_phal cher zhes smos pa ni/_la la rnam par 'gyur ba dag kyang yod par bstan pa yin no/_/de las gzhan pa go bzlog pa dang /_yang ba dang /_bsil ba dang /_rtul ba ni zhi zhing rtse
[\[205b.3\]]'jil bar byed pa'i sman yin no/_/de bzhin du gsher ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sman rnams ni dugs kyi sman yin la 'jam pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sman ni zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du mdor bsdu na sman gang cung zad kha ba dang bska ba dang /_mngar ba rnams ni de rtse
[\[205b.4\]]gzhil bar byed cing zhi bar byed pa'i sman yin no/_/'di gnyis kyi mtshan nyid drang srong tsa ra kas bshad pa de ni/_zhi byed lci zhing dro ba 'joms/_/lums phyed rngul ni 'byin byed cing /_/gso ba'i rdzas dag gang yin pa/_/rtse 'jil zhi bar byed pa yin/_/zhes 'byung
[\[205b.5\]]ba yin no/_/zhi zhing rtse bcil stobs thob gyur/_/ji skad bshad pa'i nad rnams zad/_/ces bya ba ste/_skyes bu nad zhi zhing rtse bcil bas/_stobs thob par gyur na/_nad de rtse zhil zhing dugs drags pa'i skyon med par 'gyur ba yin la/_de bzhin du dugs drags
[\[205b.6\]]pa las byung ba'i nad khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i nad rnams zad na/_nad zhi ba bcos pa legs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/bcil drags pags pa rtsa 'khums shing /_/'dar snying kha 'gram nad du 'gyur/_/rkang mchu lag pa
[\[205b.7\]]pags nag 'gyur/_/bcil drags pa yin nad du bshad/_/ces bya ba yin te/_dugs pa'i nad ha cang bcos drags te thal ches pa las nad du 'gyur ba ni pags pa dang rtsa 'khums pa la sogs pa yin par bshad do/_/de yang bcing zhing bcos drags pa pags pa dang
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]rtsa 'khums shing lus po nyid 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang /_snying ga dang /_kha dang 'gram pa rnams 'gags shing rengs pa'i nad du 'gyur te/_tshig mi thon pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mchu dang /_lag pa dang /_pags pa'i mdog nag por 'gyur
[\[206a.2\]]ba ste/_de lta bu ni shin tu rtse bcil zhing drags pa'i nad yin par shes par bya'o/_/shin tu sbom dang rtsub pa dang /_/nyam chung brgyal bar gyur pa dang /_/dugs drags bcos dgos glo rdol dang /_/skem dang chang nad kyis btab dang /_/rab rib dmu rdzing shu ba
[\[206a.3\]]mched/_/mdze nad 'or nad rlung mkhris dang /_/'o ma zho dang mar sbrang rtsi/_/'thungs dang bkru sman btang ba dang /_/lus nad tshigs dang gzhang nad yod/_/khro dang mya ngan 'jigs pas nyen/_/bkres skom mig ser skya rbab dang /_/gcin nad mkhris nad zla mtshan 'dzag_/
[\[206a.4\]]sbrum dang bu skyes dugs mi bya/_/nad tshabs che na 'jam por bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shin tu sbom pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_bu btsas pa'i bar du dugs bya bar mi rung ngo /_/de la nyam chung ba ni stobs chung ba'o/_/dugs drags te bcos dgos pa ni rtse bcil bar 'os
[\[206a.5\]]pa'o/_/chang nad kyis btab pa ni chang drags pa'i nad na ba'o/_/rlung mkhris ni rlung dang mkhris pa'i ldan pa ste/_de dag la dugs mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'o ma la sogs pa 'thungs pa la yang dugs mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du bkru sman 'thungs pa la yang dugs mi
[\[206a.6\]]bya'o/_/gzhang nad yod pa ni gzhang nad la sogs pa la yang mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du khro bas nyen pa dang /_mya ngan gyis nyen pa dang /_'jigs pas nyen pa de dag la yang dugs byar mi rung ngo /_/de bzhin du gcin nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang /_zla mtshan 'dzag
[\[206a.7\]]ba dang /_sbrum ma dang /_bu skyes pa la sogs pa la yang dugs byar mi rung ngo /_/gal te de dag la gsung pa la sogs pa'i nad tshabs che ba byung ste/_mi byar mi rung na/_'jam por sbyar ba'i dugs dang lums mi drag pa 'jam po bya'o/_/lud pa cham pa dbugs
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]mi bde/_/skyigs bu lto sbos bshang 'gags dang /_/skad 'gags rlung gi nad rnams dang /_/bad kan be snabs 'khyil zhing lci/_/lus rengs rked pa rtsib logs dang /_/sgur dang lto nad 'grams nad dang /_/rlig nad skrangs dang da rgan dang /_/rtsol dang rlung
[\[206b.2\]]nad kyis zug dang /_/gcin 'gags thor bu rmen bu dang /_/khu ba bkag dang rlung 'khyims la/_/de yi sman gyi dbye ba yis/_/dugs ni so so ji bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lud pa dang cham pa dang rlung 'khyims ba'i bar la/_de'i sman ji lta bas legs par dugs bya
[\[206b.3\]]ste/_la lar ni spro bas so/_/la lar ni bcings pas so/_/la lar ni tha mal pa zhes bya bas so/_/la lar ni chu'i dugs bya ba dang /_de bzhin du de la phan pa'i rang gi sman gyi dbye ba'i cha so so gang la phan pa'i dbye ba 'og nas rang rang gi nad kyi gnas skabs su
[\[206b.4\]]bshad pa'i sman gyi dugs so sor bya'o/_/de'i ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/_gang gi tshe lud pa la dugs bya dgos pa de'i tshe/_lud pa'i sman du bshad pas dugs bya'o/_/de bzhin du cham pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa la yang rang rang gi sman gyis
[\[206b.5\]]dugs bya'o/_/zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/da rgan dang /_rtsol ba dang /_rlung nad kyis zug pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rlung nad kyi nad gzhi las mtshan nyid ston to/_/khu ba 'gags pa ni khu chu bkag pa'o/_/rlung 'khyims pa ni tshil gyis bar bkag pa'o/_/dugs phan me
[\[206b.6\]]yis bsro min pa/_/rlung nad tshil dang bad kan can/_/rlung med khang par rtsol ba dang /_/gos lci ba dang 'jigs pa dang /_/dkri dang stobs 'gyed khro ba dang /_/chang mang bkres dang nyi tshan gzhag_/ces bya ba la/_tshil dang bad kan gyis g.yogs pa'i rlung
[\[206b.7\]]la ni mes mi bsro bar bya ba phan pa yin te/_de'i thabs ni rlung med pa'i khang par 'dug la/_rtsol ba de lus dub par bya ba dang /_gos lci ba khur du longs pa bgo ba dang /_de bzhin du 'jigs pa dang /_de bzhin du sngar bshad pa'i dkri ba dang /_stobs 'gyed
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa ste lag par stobs 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang /_khros 'khrugs pa dang /_chang mang po btung ba dang /_bkres shing ltogs pas nyen pa dang /_de bzhin du nyi ma tsha ba la gzhag pa ste/_'di dag bya'o/_/nad gang nang khrol gnas dang lus
[\[207a.2\]]zungs dang /_/rtsar song rkang lag rus pa'i nang song ba'i/_/nad de dugs kyis bsrung bar byas nas ni/_/khong du bsdus la sbyang bas dpyis dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa khong par gnas shing nang khrol na 'dug pa'am/_khrag la sogs pa lus
[\[207a.3\]]zungs la gnas pa rnams dang de bzhin gang rtsa rnams su khyab cing zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du rkang lag gi nang du song ba ste/_lag pa la sogs pa'i rus pa la zhen pa'i nad de dag thams cad gnas de dag las bshad ma thag pa'i snum dang dugs kyis bsrung bar byas shing /_
[\[207a.4\]]'dzag tu rung ba lta bu byas la/_de nas ji skad bshad pa'i dugs bzhi pos ji lta ji lta ba bzhin du bsrung zhing bzhu nas/_rkang lag la sogs pa nas khong pa'i nang du bsdus la/_de'i 'og tu 'og nas bshad pa'i bkru sman gyis dpyis dbyung zhing bton nas/_gdon
[\[207a.5\]]pas phyir dbyung bar bya'o/_/rkang lag gi nang du song zhes bya ba ni de gnas pa'i nad ni shin tu dugs bya bar 'os pa yin no/_/zhes bstan pa yin no/_/yang na lus zungs su gtogs pa'i nad gang 'phel nas/_khong pa nas lus zungs su song ba dang rkang lag la
[\[207a.6\]]gnas na ldang bar gyur pa yin pas na/_'dir rkang lag dang rus par gnas pa ni gtso bor bzung ba'i don smos pa yin no/_/de bas na dugs kyis nad rnams bsrung ba byas la/_khong pa'i nang du bsdu dgos pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam
[\[207a.7\]]par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_dugs kyi cho ga'i
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]'og tu skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi cho ga'i le'u brtsams pa ni gang gi phyir/_nad de dugs kyis bsrung ba byas nas ni/_/khong du bsdus la sbyar bas dpyis dbyung bya/_/zhes 'das ma thag par bshad pa gang yin pa de/_spyad pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pas bstan par
[\[207b.2\]]bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin te/_skyug sman ni stod kyi nad bsal ba'i thabs yin la/_bkru sman ni smad kyi nad bsal ba yin te/_de gnyis kyi cho ga ni de dag gi nad las su rung bar bya ba yin te/_de tshangs pa la sogs pas gang du dran pa'i cho ga ni/_skyug sman
[\[207b.3\]]dang bkru sman la sogs pa'i cho ga zhes bya ste/_de dag bshad cing bstan par bya ba'o zhes pa'o/_/bad kan nad dam 'dres pa yi/_/bad kan rgyas la skyug sman gtang /_/de bzhin mkhris pa bkru sman bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'ba' zhig gi nad la skyug
[\[207b.4\]]sman gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na ldan pa ste/_'dres par gyur pa'i bad kan la rgyas par zhes bya ba bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad dang mkhris pa 'dres pa'i nad ldan pa'am/_bad kan dang rlung 'dres pa'i ldan pa bad kan shas che ba la skyug sman gtang bar bya'o/_/de
[\[207b.5\]]bzhin mkhris pa skyug sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de dang 'dra bas na de bzhin te/_bad kan de dag tshul mthun par bya'o/_/de yang ji ltar bad kan 'ba' zhig la skyug sman bya ba yin pa'am/_bad kan shas che ba'i ldan pa'i nad la skyug sman bya ba de bzhin du
[\[207b.6\]]mkhris pa 'ba' zhig la bkru sman gtang ba'am/_'dres pa'i nad mkhris pa shas che ba/_mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dres pa'i nad dam/_mkhris pa dang rlung 'dres pa'i nad la bkru sman bya'o/_/rgyas pa zhes smos pas ni de 'ba' zhig bod pa'am/_rang gi gnas sam
[\[207b.7\]]gnas gzhan du zhugs pa'i bad kan ni skyug sman bya la/_mkhris pa la ni bkru sman bya'o/_/rims sar tshad 'khru thur du ni/_/mkhris pa khrag 'khru glo gcong dang /_/mdze dang gcin nad 'brum thor bu/_/rkang bam mi dran lud pa can/_/dbugs mi bde snying 'phar 'bras
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]mched/_/nu ma'i nad dang ro stod nad/_/khyad par du ni skyug sman bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims sar pa dang tshad pas 'khru ba la sogs pa nas ro stod kyi nad kyi bar dag la khyad par ram mchog tu skyug sman gtang bar bya ste/_des nad 'di rnams
[\[208a.2\]]chu dang bral ba'i 'bras ltar mchog tu zad cing dengs par 'gyur ro/_/de la rims sar pa ni dang por byung ba'i rims so/_/thur du khrag dang mkhris pa 'khru ba ni khrag mkhris kyi 'byung ba'o/_/thor bu ni 'bras kyi phreng ba'o/_/rkang bam ni rkang pa'i nad do/_/skyug sman mi gtang
[\[208a.3\]]sbrum khong rtsub/_/bkres dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba/_/byis pa rgan skem sbom snying na/_/glo skam smras dang nyam chung dang /_/rtag tu slon dang mcher pa na/_/rab rib lto na srin bu yod/_/rlung khrag 'dres mar gyen du 'byung /_/so na mas gtong skad 'dzer dang /_/gcin
[\[208a.4\]]sri dmu rdzing skran can dang /_/slon dka' drod che gzhang 'brum can/_/rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sra/_/rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrum ma la sogs pa nas rlung nad can gyi bar dag la skyug sman mi gtang ngo /_/de la khong rtsub pa la
[\[208a.5\]]skyug sman btang na/_rlung gis yan lag la gnod par 'gyur te/_phal cher kha zas la sogs pa rtsub mo bsten pas rlung nad skyed pa'i phyir stobs zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bkres pa dag la skyug sman btang na me'i stobs kyis stobs zad par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu sdug
[\[208a.6\]]bsngal ba ni/_khur dang rtag tu sdug byed pa'i dub pas stobs zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bzhon pas dub cing nyam chung ba dag la yang stobs phrin shin tu khrag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byis pa la sogs pas ni sman gyi stobs mi bzod pa'i phyir/_lus kyi stobs
[\[208a.7\]]zad pas nang gi khong pa skem zhing gcong du 'gyur ba'i skyon yod pa yin no/_/na ba ni snying nad kyis nyen pa la byas na snying nad la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu slon pa ni stod du rgyu ba'i rlung gis gyen du bteg pas de drags na srog zad par 'gyur ro/_/lto na srin bu yod pa ni
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]sngar bkru ba ma byas na/_srin bu shin tu mang ba'i phyir ma lus pa 'byung bas/_snying shin tu gtses pas slon pa drags par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung la sogs pa gyen du 'byung ba ni 'og tu gsal bar gyur pas gyen du drangs pas skyon du 'gyur ro/_/slon dka' ba
[\[208b.2\]]ni khong pa 'gags shing slon dka' ba las shas cher drangs na khong pa'i nad thams cad slongs shing dkrugs pas/_me dbal dang rmongs bag dang /_mi dran pa la sogs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtug skam la sogs pas nyen pa rnams dang /_rtsib
[\[208b.3\]]logs zug pa la sogs pa ni rang rang gi nad 'phel ba dang /_'chi ba dag tu'ang 'gyur ro/_/ci rnam pa thams cad du sbrum ma la sogs pa la skyug sman gtang bar mi bya'am/_'on te gnas skabs la lar skyug sman bya zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_de dag dug
[\[208b.4\]]'thungs ma zhu dang /_/mi 'phrod zas zos ma gtogs so/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_sbrum ma la sogs pa de dag gis gal te dug dang sbyar ba'i dug 'thungs sam/_zas ma zhu ba ste gsud dam/_mi 'phrod pa'i zas zos bar gyur na ni ma gtogs te/_'di
[\[208b.5\]]dag ni myur du gsod par byed pa yin pas na/_dug 'thungs pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs 'di lta bu ma gtogs pa gnas skabs gzhan du skyug sman mi gtang gi/_rkyen 'di dag byung na der skyug sman 'jam po gtang bar bya'o/_/rtag tu slon pa yan chad dang /_
[\[208b.6\]]phal cher ma zhu'i rims dag kyang /_/ma zhu ba ni thams cad la/_/dud pas bdug pa'i las kun spangs/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir rtag tu slon zhing rgyun du skyugs pa'i skyes bu dang /_gang sngar skyug sman gtang du mi rung bar bstan pa sbrum ma nas/_nyam chung
[\[208b.7\]]ba'i bar de thams cad spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/'di dag dud pas bdug pa'i bar gyi \u0f85las kun spang bar bya bar ma zad kyi/_ma zhu ba'i rims kyi bar dag la'ang spang bar bya ste/_rims sar pa la ni nad 'khyims par 'gyur ba'i nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du ma zhu ba'i
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]nad thams cad la yang sgyug sman gyi rjes la las kun te/_bkru sman dang /_mas gtong ba dang /_sna nas gtang ba dang /_dud pas bdugs pa dang /_mkhur ba bkang zhing dbo ba dang /_mig sman dang /_smin par bya ba'i bar gyi las spang
[\[209a.2\]]bar bya ste/_ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs kyi 'jigs pa nyid kyis so/_/bkru sman gyis gso skran gzhang 'brum/_/'brum bu mig ser gzhogs phyed lci/_/rims rnying dmu rdzing dbyig dug dang /_/skyug dang mcher nad skya rbab dang /_/long nad rab rib sngon por gyur/_/mchi
[\[209a.3\]]'dzag zhu ba'i gnas na zug_/mngal dang khu ba'i gnas kyi nad/_/khong nad gtogs dang srin nad rma/_/dreg nad nam tshong yan chad nad/_/gcin sri bshang ba 'gags pa dang /_/slon bya mdze gcin nad sogs yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skran la sogs pa
[\[209a.4\]]nas rtug pa 'gags pa'i bar gyi nad rnams dang /_de bzhin du slon par bya ba'i nad las/_mdze nad dang gcin nad nas ro stod kyi nad rnams kyi bar bkru sman gyis gso zhing sbyang bar bya ba yin te/_'di dag la bkru sman byas pas mchog tu 'byang zhing 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[209a.5\]]khrus mi bya ba rims sar dang /_/drod chung khrag mkhris thur du 'byung /_/rmas dang gzhang nad tshad pas 'khru/_/khong du mtshon lus lto sra dang /_/snum ches pa dang skem ches pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims sar pa nas skem ches pa'i bar la ni khrus byar mi rung ngo /_/
[\[209a.6\]]de la rims sar pa yin du zin kyang /_nad ma smin pa la khrus mi bya ste/_des nad slar skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhang nad pa ni bshang sgo sogs la gnod pa'i nad skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/tshad pas 'khru ba dang khrag mkhris thur du dbyung ba gnyis la khrus byas shin
[\[209a.7\]]tu 'khru drags pas ma rungs par 'gyur ro/_/drod chung ba la sogs pa ni sman gyi shugs mi bzod cing bsten mi nus pa yin no/_/chang nad kyis nyen pa la khrus mi bya ste/_des rlung gis srog la gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/long kha'i gnas su rlung bsags pas
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]phan tshun rgyu ba na nang du lto sbos pa skyed par byed do/_/khong du mtshon lus pa yang der rlung brten pas srog la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/lto sra ba ni sman bdo bas nad phyir phyin par ma nus pa dang /_snying gar gzer ba dang /_rtsib logs su zug pa dang /_spo ba dang /_
[\[209b.2\]]slon pa dang /_brgyal ba dang /_rmya ba skyed de/_srog ma rungs par byed do/_/snum ches pa la khrus byas na yang ha cang drags par 'gyur ro/_/skem ches ba 'dir nad gcong chen po la bya ste/_gcong chen pos nyen pa ni lus zungs zad pas dri ma'i stobs kyis gnas pa
[\[209b.3\]]yin pa las/_de phyung nas lus kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/sbrum ma la sogs pa la khrus byas na yang nyes pa sngar bshad pa ltar 'gyur ro/_/de nas thun mong dus su ni/_/cho ga bzhin du snum gyis nyen/_/nya dang ma sha til sogs kyis/_/nang par slon bya'i bad kan
[\[209b.4\]]skyed/_/mtshan mo gnyid log zas legs zhu/_/snga dro'i dang por bkra shis byas/_/zas ma zos pa'am cung zad snum/_/thug pa zhun mar ldan pa btung /_/byis pa rgan po nyams stobs chung /_/sman stobs chung ba nad dbang las/_/chang 'o bu ram shing sha khu/_/
[\[209b.5\]]nad dmigs ji skad bshad pa bzhin/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ldan pa/_/sman tshad lto ba las dpags te/_/sman la sngags ni mngon bzlas la/_/lkog mar phyin pa'i bar du blud/_/tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag dang tha skar bu/_/drag po dbang po nyi zla sa me rlung /_/drang
[\[209b.6\]]srong rnams kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_/'byung po'i tshogs kyis khyod ni bsrung bar shog_/drang srong rnams kyi bcud kyis len pa dang /_/lha rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi lta bu dang /_/klu mchog rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bur ni/_/khyod la sman 'di nye bar gnas gyur cig_/
[\[209b.7\]]oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/_b+hai Sha dz+ya gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_aR+ha te/_saM myaka sam bud d+hA ya/_tar+ya thA/_oM b+hai Sha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/_rA dza sa mung+ga te swA hA/_shar du kha bltas 'thung du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_de nas zhes bya ba ni bkra shis
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pa'i don du smos pa yin no/_/thun mong gi dus su ni dbyar zla tha chungs dang /_dpyid zla 'bring po'o/_/cho ga bzhin du bya ba ni bya ba'i rim pa dang mthun par snum gyis zhen cing brlan par byas la/_nang par te de las gzhan pa'i nyi ma
[\[210a.2\]]la/_skyug sman gtang bar bya ba'i skyes bu nub gcig snum gyi cho ga spyad la/_tshad dang ldan pa'i sman de btung ba ni sman pa nub tu kha bltas la nad pa shar du kha bstan te/_sngags ni mngon par bzlas la 'thung du gzhug go ces bya bar sbyar ro/_/skyug par bya ba ji lta bu
[\[210a.3\]]la blud ce na/_bad kan glongs pa ste/_bad kan skyed pa de rang gi gnas nas gso bar bya'o/_/gang gis she na/_mon sran gre'u dang til la sogs pas so/_/sogs pa smos pa ni 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_til gyi 'ba' cha la sogs pa'i kha zas kyi bye brag
[\[210a.4\]]rnams kyis so/_/mtshan mo gnyid log pa ni mtshan mo bde bar gnyid log pas gnas pa'o/_/rang gi zas legs par zhu ba ni kha zas bde mor zhu bar gyur pa'o/_/snga dro ni nyi ma'i cha dang po'o/_/bkra shis bya ba ni byin rlob cing dge ba ston par byed pa'o/_/de bzhin du
[\[210a.5\]]zas ma zos pa ni kha zas longs spyad pa ma byas pa'o/_/yang cung zad snum pa ni snum gyi bya ba cung zad byas pa'o/_/thug pa ni nas thug go/_/de zhun mar cung zad btab la btung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du byis pa dang rgan po la sogs pa rnams ni nad kyi dbang las chang la
[\[210a.6\]]sogs pa lkog mar phyin gyi bar du 'thung du bcug la/_nad dmigs ji skad bshad cing gang la ji ltar 'os pa bzhin du sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha dag dang ldan zhing bsres la/_sman gyi tshan lto sra snyi rab 'bring tha ma'i tshad las dpags te/_lto snyi ba la sman 'jam po'am
[\[210a.7\]]tshad chung ba'i sman sbyin no/_/'bring la 'bring ngo /_/sra ba ni che ba dang che ba'o/_/sman la sngags kyis mngon par bzla ba ni/_dge slong bram ze rnams kyi shis par brjod par bya ba'i tshig rnams dang /_de bzhin du tshangs pa ste skye dgu'i bdag dang zhes bya ba la sogs
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/de la tshangs pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po myur du zhes bya ba dang /_tha skar gyi bu gnyis dang /_drag po lha chen po dang /_dbang po ste brgya byin dang /_sa'i lha dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_me lha dang /_
[\[210b.2\]]rlung lha ste tshangs pa la sogs pa de dag gis khyed la bsrung zhing skyob par shog shig pa'o/_/'di dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi drang srong zhes bya ba rgyun shes la sogs pa sman gyi tshogs dang bcas pa ste/_sman gyi gnas yul lam sman gyi tshogs du ma dang bcas
[\[210b.3\]]pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs te lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci la sogs pa 'byung po mthu bo che rnams kyis bsrung bar shog shig pa'o/_/yang khyed la sman 'di lta bur nye bar gnas par gyur cig pa ste/_drang srong rnams kyi bcud
[\[210b.4\]]len dang /_zhes bya ba drang srong 'pho ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas bcud kyis len du byas pa'i sman gyi tshogs lta bu dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa lha rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bu dang /_klu yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas na/_klu mchog ste mtha' yas dang nor
[\[210b.5\]]rgyas dang rigs ldan la sogs pa rnams kyi ste/_klu rnams kyi bdud rtsi rnyed par sla ba ma yin pas klu mchog ces smos pa yin te/_klu rnams kyi bdud rtsi ni lha'i bas cung zad dman pa yin te/_de dang khyed kyi sman 'di 'dra ba nyid du gnas par gyur cig pa'o/_/
[\[210b.6\]]'thungs nas de la sems dmigs te/_/yud tsam bsdad la dang gar 'khyil/_/mchil ma de las slon du gzhug_/ma gnod par ni sor mos sam/_/yang na chu ba 'jam po yis/_/lkog ma lce'u chung ma snad bya/_/skyug mi bro bar mi drang ngo /_/'byung bar
[\[210b.7\]]ldog pa slon par bya/_/pus mo dang mnyam stan la gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman 'thungs zin nas/_de la sems shing zhes pa slon bro ba'i sems bskyed la/_yud tsam zhes pa chu tshod gnyis kyi bar du bsdad cing 'dug la dang gar 'khyil ba dang /_rngul 'byung
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]bas nad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_ba spu ldang bas gnas las bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /_khong pa cung zad spo zhing 'khrugs pas ltor rgyu ba dang /_rim gyis snying gar zug cing dang ga 'khyil ba dang /_snying 'phar ba dang /_mchil ma mang po khar
[\[211a.2\]]'byung ba dag gis nad de gyen du mngon par shes pa'i bar du yud tsam bsdad nas slon du gzhug go/_/gang la dang ga 'khyil ba dang mchil ma mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni dang gar 'khyil ba dang /_mchil ma mang ba zhes bya la/_de ltar gyur nas de slon du gzhug
[\[211a.3\]]go/_/ji ltar slon par bya zhe na/_ma gnod par sor mo gnyis kyis slon zhing drang ba ste/_shin tu rtsol ba drag pos mi bya'o/_/yang na chu ba 'jam pos bya ste/_ut+pal sngon po la sogs pa'i chu sdong zlum pa 'jam zhing mnyen pas bya'o/_/lkog ma lce chung ma snad par/_/
[\[211a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni/_de dag la gnod pa med par ro/_/de bzhin du skyug mi bro zhing 'byung bar mi ldog pa'i tshe drang zhing slon par mi bya'o/_/skyug bro zhing 'byung bar ldog pa na slon zhing skyug par bya'o/_/skyes bu slon zhing skyug bro ba'i tshe/_pus mo dang mnyam pa'i stan mthon po la
[\[211a.5\]]gnas par gyur pas skyug tu gzhug go/_/de ni slon tshe glo gnyis dang /_/dpral ba dag la brten par bya/_/de bzhin lte ba btsir ba dang /_/rgyab nas gyen du mnye bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi de slon zhing skyugs par gyur pa na/_glo gnyis te rtsib logs gnyis
[\[211a.6\]]dang /_de bzhin du dpung pa nas gzung zhing brten par bya'o/_/de bzhin lte ba btsir bar bya ba dang rgyab nas gyen du btsir thabs kyis phul zhing lag pa gyen du bltas pas mnye bar bya'o/_/de ltar bad kan rno drod kha/_/mkhris pa mngar dang bsil bas slon/_/rlung
[\[211a.7\]]'dres bad kan snum pa dang /_/skyur dang lan tshwa dag gis slon/_/ji srid bad kan rgyun chad pa'am/_/mkhris pa snang gi bar du skyug_/ces bya ba la/_tshul de ltar bad kan ni sman rno ba dang dro ba dang kha bas slon zhing skyug tu gzhug go/_/de bzhin du mkhris pa dang bad kan
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]rgyas pa 'dres pa'i nad la/_sman mngar ba dang bsil ba'i nus pa dang ldan pas slon du gzhug go/_/de bzhin du rlung nad 'dres shing 'dus pa'i bad kan rgyas pa la ni sman snum pa dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa'i shas che ba dag gis slon du gzhug go/_/de slon pa ni
[\[211b.2\]]ji srid bad kan zad cing rgyun chad pa'am/_mkhris pa snang gi bar du skyug cing drang bar bya'o/_/shugs dal pi pi ling skyu ru/_/yungs kar rgyam tsha'i chu dag gis/_/yang dang yang ni slon du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu slon pa'i shugs dal zhing /_babs chung
[\[211b.3\]]bar gyur na/_pi pi ling dang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gu dang /_rgyam tsha'i chu dag blud la/_de yang dang yang du slon zhing skyug tu gzhug go/_/der ni slon par ma gyur pa'am/_/sdod pa dang bcas slon pa'am/_/sman ni 'ba' zhig byung gyur na/_/sbyor nyes de
[\[211b.4\]]ni mchil ma mang /_/g.yan pa thor bu rim sogs 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug pa'i gnas skabs der slon pa'i shugs ci'ang 'byung bar ma gyur pa'am/_yang na sdod pa'i gags dang bcas par slon pa'am/_sman 'ba' zhig byung bar gyur zhing nad
[\[211b.5\]]ma phyin pa sman nyi tshe skyugs par gyur na/_'di ni skyug sman gyi sbyor ba nyes shing ma rungs pa yin te/_sbyor ba nyes pa des mchil ma mang ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchil ma ni bad kan mchil snabs mang du 'dzag pa'o/_/sogs pa zhes smos pa ni yi
[\[211b.6\]]gar mi 'ong ba dang /_lus lci ba dang tshigs na ba dang /_rmya zhing snyom pa dang zug cing gzer ba dang /_spu langs pa la sogs pa 'byung ba bsdu'o/_/bder skyug bad kan mkhris pa dang /_/rlung ni rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba legs pa yin/_/zhes
[\[211b.7\]]bya ba la/_skyug sman gyi sbyor ba legs pa'i mtshan ma yang bde bar skyug cing gzer ba dang /_bad kan la sogs pa rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_bad kan slon pa med par 'byung ba dang /_de'i 'og tu mkhris pa/_de'i 'og tu rlung rim bzhin du 'byung ba dang /_
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]de bzhin du zug gzer chen po med pa dang /_yid dga' zhing gsang bag la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/skyug sman gyi sbyor ba legs pa yin no/_/sbyor ba drags pas/_/lbu ba tshon can khrag 'drar snang /_/slon nas khong rmya lus tsha
[\[212a.2\]]dang /_/lkog skam mgo 'khor mig mi mthong /_/rlung nad mi bzad ldang 'gyur zhing /_/srog gi khrag 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman gyi sbyor ba drags par gyur pa yang /_slon pa'i skyugs pa lbu ba dang /_mdog tshon can rma bya'i mjug
[\[212a.3\]]sgro ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa snang ba dang /_khrag lta bur skyug par 'gyur bas na/_lbu ba tshon can khrag 'drar snang /_/zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du slon nas khong rmya zhing shin du nyam chung ba dang /_de bzhin du yan lag thams cad tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gyur pa dang /_lkog
[\[212a.4\]]ma skam zhing gre ba zhum pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_mig gis mi mthong zhing mun pa lta bur snang ba dang /_rlung nad mi bzad pa ste/_kha yo ba dang /_rna ba gzer ba dang /_tshig thogs pa dang /_lce 'khums pa dang /_mig 'gyur ba dang /_'gram pa
[\[212a.5\]]'thams pa dang /_dran pa med pa dang /_gnyid yar ba la sogs pa'i nad mi bzad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yang na srog ces bya ba'i khrag 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can/_slon nyes pa'i nad de 'byung bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba legs pas
[\[212a.6\]]slon pa ni/_/yud tsam ngal bso dud pa gsum/_/gang yang rung bas bdug pa dang /_/de'i 'og snum gyi spyod pa bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu sbyor ba legs pas slon par gyur na rkang pa dang lag pa dang gdong dang mig legs par dag par byas shing phyis
[\[212a.7\]]la/_yud tsam zhig la ngal gso zhing dub pa bsal la/_rdza yang la sogs pas dbugs byung zhing sems gso ba byas nas/_de'i 'og tu gso ba bdug pa gsum po bdug pa'i cho ga las 'og nas bshad pa rnon po dang bar ma dang /_'jam pa'i dbye bas phye
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]ba'i gang yang rung ba de'i nus pa dang sbyar te/_ci rigs par rno ba dang bar ma dang 'jam pa dang gsum las gcig gis bdug par bya'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu snum gyi cho ga'i spyod pa'i/_kha lag chu dron gyis bkru zhing /_zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan cing bslab par bya'o/_/de
[\[212b.2\]]nas dgongs ka'am nad par ni/_/bkres tshe chu tshan gyis bkrus la/_/sA lu rtsa snar 'bras kyi ni/_/thug pa la sogs rim bzhin bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas slon zin pa dang /_dgongs ka ste nyi ma nub nas sam/_yang na de phyi de zhag gi nang par tho rangs
[\[212b.3\]]kyi slon gyis glongs pa'i lus zungs rnams rang gi gnas su legs par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_sngar slon pas bkres shing bru ba tsha bar gyur na chu dron pos khrus byas shing gtsang sbra byas la/_sA lu rtsa snar gyi 'bras kyi thug pa la sogs pa 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pa
[\[212b.4\]]'di bsten cing spyad par bya'o/_/de la thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa la bsten pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_'bras rak+ta sha li zhes bya ba la sogs pa btsos pa'i 'bras chan snum dang lan tshwa dang kha ba shas chung ba dang /_de'i 'tshal nan phal cher de dang rjes su mthun pa
[\[212b.5\]]btung bar bya ste/_me'i drod kyi stobs las dpags te/_dgongs ka'am nang par ltogs par gyur pa'i dus su cho ga 'di spyad par bya'o/_/thug pa gar po g.yos su ma byas pa'i/_/yu sha sha khu gsum dang gnyis dang gcig_/mchog dang bar
[\[212b.6\]]ma tha ma'i sbyang bas sbyangs/_/mi yis zas kyi dus su rim bzhin spyad/_/ces bya ba la/_thug pa ni 'bras thug rkyang pa la cung zad ska ba'o/_/de bas kyang ska zhing thur ma la chags pa ni thug pa gar po'o/_/g.yos su byas pa'i yu sha ni bca' sga dang pi pi ling
[\[212b.7\]]dang /_se 'bru dang go snyod dang shing kun la sogs pa ma btab par mon sran sde'u mung+ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bskol ba'i khu ba'o/_/sran mung+ga la sogs pa de nyid bskol ba'i khu ba la bca' sga la sogs pa btab pa ni g.yos su byas pa'i khu ba'o/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]sha khu ni sha dag gi khu ba g.yos su byas pa'o/_/'dir byas pa ni/_der ni sha las khu ba ste/_'bru las khu ba 'bras bu las/_/kha lo rtsa ba til tshigs skyur/_/phal cher skam pa la zhes bya/_/de dag snum sogs ldan dang med/_/g.yos
[\[213a.2\]]byas ma byas yin zhes bya/_/zhes 'byung ba yin no/_/thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po de dag rim bzhin du grangs ji lta ba bzhin du go rims ma 'chol bar gsum dang gnyis dang gcig tu byas nas/_zas kyi dus su mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma'i sbyang
[\[213a.3\]]bas sbyang bar mi bya ste/_skyes bus spyad cing bsten par bya'o/_/mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma'i sbyang ba de dag gis sbyangs shing nad bsal ba'i mis zas kyi dus gsum por thug pa rkyang rkyang po nas sha khu ba'i rim pa bzhin du so sor spyad par bya'o/_/de yang thug pa gsum po nam
[\[213a.4\]]sha khu'i bar du tshe tshad de/_mchog tu sbyang ba byas pa la gsum ste/_zas kyi dus su gsum bsten pa dang /_sbyang ba 'bring gis sbyong ba la gnyis te/_zas kyi dus gnyis gnyis te bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyang ba thams sbyang ba la gcig ste/_zas kyi
[\[213a.5\]]dus thug pa nas sha khu'i bar du re re spyad pas bsten par bya'o/_/de la nyi ma dang po'i dgongs ka thug pa btung bar bya'o/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la zas kyi dus gnyis su thug pa nyid btung bar byas te/_de ltar zas kyi dus gsum du thug pa spyad pa yin no/_/nyi ma gsum
[\[213a.6\]]pa la zas kyi dus gnyis su thug pa gar po spyad par bya'o/_/de yang sla ba ma yin pa thur ma la bde blag tu chags pa bza' bar bya ste/_de ltar na zas kyi dus gsum du thug pa gar po longs spyod pa yin no/_/nyi ma bzhi pa'i dgongs ka'i zas kyi dus gcig tu g.yos su
[\[213a.7\]]ma byas pa'i khu ba longs sbyad par bya'o/_/de yang nyi ma lnga pa'i zas kyi dus gnyis su g.yos su ma byas pa'i khu ba nyid btung bar bya ste/_de ltar na g.yos su ma byas pa'i khu ba zas kyi dus gsum du spyad pa yin no/_/zhag drug pa la zas kyi dus gnyis su g.yos su
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]byas pa'i khu ba bsten par bya'o/_/nyi ma bdun pa'i nang par gyi zas gcig la g.yos su byas pa'i khu ba zas kyi dus gsum du spyad par bya'o/_/zhag bdun pa'i dgongs ka zas kyi dus gcig tu sha khu dang nye bar longs spyad par bya'o/_/zhag brgyad pa'i zas kyi bar
[\[213b.2\]]dus gnyis su sha khu dang bsten par bya ste/_de ltar sha khu zas kyi dus gsum du bstan pa yin no/_/'di ni sbyang bar gyi thug pa rkyang rkyang po nas sha khu'i bar spyad pa'i rim pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyang ba che bas sbyangs pas zas kyi dus gnyis su thug pa la sogs pa spyad par
[\[213b.3\]]bya'o/_/nyi ma bzhi pa'i nang par yang g.yos su ma byas pa nyid do/_/de'i dgongs ka ni g.yos su byas pa'i khu ba ste/_lnga pa'i nang par yang g.yos su byas pa dang spyad par bya'o/_/de'i dgongs ka ni sha khu ste/_nyi ma drug pa'i nang par yang sha khu dang spyad par
[\[213b.4\]]bya'o/_/de'i dgongs ka phan chad ni zas nar mar bza' bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyang ba tha mas sbyangs pas zas kyi dus gcig tu thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pa spyad par bya ste/_nyin zhag dang po'i dgongs ka thug pa rkyang rkyang po spyad par bya'o/_/nyi ma gnyis
[\[213b.5\]]pa'i nang par thug pa gar po dgongs ka g.yos su ma byas pa'i sha nyi ma gsum pa'i nang par g.yos su bya ba'i khu ba/_dgongs ka sha khu de phan chad ni zas nar ma thams cad spyad la rag go/_/thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pa'i rim pas ci zhig byed ce na/_de'i
[\[213b.6\]]phyir smras pa ni/_/dper na me chung rtswa dang lci sogs kyis/_/rnam par sbar nas rim gyis mched pa na/_/che zhing brtan la thams cad mched par nus/_/sbyangs pa'i nad med thug sogs kyis de bzhin/_/zhes bya ba yin te/_dper na me shing med
[\[213b.7\]]cing phra ba cung zad cig gnas par gyur pa ni/_rtswa dang lci ba la sogs pa phra zhing zhib mor rnam par sbar zhing 'bud pa na/_rim gyis mched par gyur pa na chen por 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du brtan zhing mi sod par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mched par nus pa
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]ste/_dngos po sra zhing lci ba'i zas kyi rigs rnams kyang smin pa dang tshos par nus par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyangs par gyur pa'i pho ba'i nang gi me sbyangs pas nyam chung zhing stobs zhan pa thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pas gsos par gyur pa ni rim
[\[214a.2\]]gyis che ba dang brtan pa dang /_'ju zhing smin par byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/de la sbyang ba gsum po de gang zhig yin pa mi shes so zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_slon tshad chung dang 'bring dang chen po ni/_/bzhi dang drug dang lan brgyad slon par 'dod/_/de gnyis
[\[214a.3\]]bcu dang nyis ldab sum ldab 'khru/_/bre gang de bzhin nyis ldab bzhi ldab 'gyur/_/skyug sman mthar mkhris bkru sman las byed dang /_/bad kan mthar byung 'khru ba mchog tu bshad/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshad chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po go rims ji lta ba bzhin du slon
[\[214a.4\]]shugs bzhi dang /_drug dang brgyad slon pa dag tshe'i rig byed dran par byed pa dag mngon par 'dod cing ston pa yin no/_/de la slon pa chung tshad ni lan bzhi slon pa yin par 'dod do/_/slon tshad 'bring ni lan drug slon pa'o/_/slon pa che tshad ni lan brgyad slon pa'o/_/
[\[214a.5\]]'byung ba'i shugs de nyid bcu dang nyis ldab dang /_sum ldab ni 'khru ba'i tshad chung ngu dang /_'bring dang chen po yin par drang srong de nyid 'dod do/_/de la 'khru ba chung ba'i tshad ni lan bcu 'khru ba'o/_/'khru ba'i 'bring tshad ni/_bcu gnyis ldab ste lan nyi shu 'khru
[\[214a.6\]]bar 'dod do/_/'khru ba che tshad ni bcu'i sum ldab sum cu yin par 'dod do/_/de ltar na skyug sman dang bkru sman gnyis kyi 'byung ba'i grangs kyi tshad chung ngu dang chen po bshad pa yin no/_/bre la sogs pa'i tshad kyis gzhal ba'i tshad chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen
[\[214a.7\]]po smras pa ni bre gang la sogs pa yin te/_'khru ba'i tshad chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po ni rim bzhin du bre gang dang /_de nyid kyis nyis ldab dang /_de nyid kyis bzhi ldab yin no/_/zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/des na 'khru ba chung tshad ni bre gang ngo /_/'bring ni bre do'o/_/
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]chen po ni bre bzhi yin no/_/slob dpon gzhan dag ni/_skyug sman gyi mchog ni mkhris pa 'byung ba'i mthar thug pa yin par 'dod do/_/skyug sman gang gi mthar mkhris pa 'byung ba de ni/_skyug sman mthar ni mkhris pa'o/_/zhes bya'o/_/bkru sman gyi tshad bre gang du
[\[214b.2\]]yongs su chung ba las phyed do/_/des na slon pa'i chung tshad ni bre phyed do/_/'bring ni bre gang ngo /_/che tshad ni bre do'o/_/de bzhin du bad kan mtha' mar byung ba'i 'khru ba'i tshad ni mchog yin no/_/zhes srog bsrung ba'i slob dpon dag gis bshad do/_/'khru ba gnyis
[\[214b.3\]]gsum bshad dang bcas mi gtogs/_/'khru ba gzhal te slon pa 'thungs ma gtogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bring ni bre gang ngo /_/'khru ba'i shugs gnyis sam gsum la ni 'khru ba'i gsum zhes bya ba la/_de bshang ba dang bcas par 'byung bas na/_bshang
[\[214b.4\]]bcas te 'khru ba de gtogs shing tshad du bgrang bar mi rtsi zhing 'khru ba'i tshad la la gzhal zhing brtsis la 'khru ba'i grangs su bstan pa gang yin pa las de mi rtsi ste/_de'i 'og tu dngos po'i rigs gzhan de med pa 'khru ba'i shugs kyi dbang gis bshang ba'i sgo nas 'byung ba de nyid de'i
[\[214b.5\]]'og tu bre la sogs pa'i tshad kyis gzhal bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du slon zhing skyugs pa'i lus la slon pa'i phyir/_skyug sman chu la sogs pa rdzas gsher ba dang bsres te 'thungs pa gang yin pa kha nas slon te byung ba de skad du bshad pa'i grangs su mi rtsi'o/_/de'i 'og tu
[\[214b.6\]]dngos po gzhan dag slon pa'i shugs kyis kha'i sgo nas byung ba de nyid phan chad gzhal zhing brtsi bar bya'o/_/de nas slon pa de la ni/_/slar yang snum dang dugs byas te/_/bad kan dus 'das lto shes nas/_/legs par bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de
[\[214b.7\]]nas zhes bya ba ni/_bkra shis pa'i don nam/_de ma thag pa'i don te/_de nas de'i 'og tu slon pa'i skyes bu de slar yang zhes bya ba phyis yang snum dang dugs byas shing bde bar gnas pa sngar bshad pa'i chogs byas la/_bad kan gyi dus 'das pa dang lto na kha zas
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]med par shes shing rtogs nas sman gyi tshad ji ltar 'os pa las legs par bkru sman btang zhing 'thung du bcug la/_'khru bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa mang zhing lto snyi la/_/'o mas kyang ni 'khru bar byed/_/rlung shas che zhing lto sran/_/dur byid sogs kyis
[\[215a.2\]]kyang 'khru dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la mkhris pa mang zhing lto snyi ba gang yin pa de ni 'o mas kyang 'khru bar byed do/_/'dir 'o ma smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam du zad do/_/des na bu ram shing gi khu ba dang dar ba skyur po dang /_zho ga chu dang /_bu ram dang /_kri sar dang /_
[\[215a.3\]]zhun mar dang /_chang dang /_chu tshan dang /_pi lu dang /_rgun 'brum dang /_gla gor zho sha la sogs pas kyang 'khru bar byed do/_/de la rlung shas che zhing lto sra la 'khru bar dka' ba ni dur byid dang 'bras bu gsum dang /_nim pa dang /_ni li ni dang /_dan da'i 'bras
[\[215a.4\]]bu la sogs pas kyang 'khru bar dka' zhing rtsol ba chen pos gdong 'khru ba yin no/_/bkru sman mkhris la mngar dang bska/_/bad kan la ni kha bas bya/_/rlung la snum dro lan tshwa can/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa'i nad kyi yul la ni bkru sman mngar ba dang /_bska
[\[215a.5\]]ba btang na bkru ba la bsngags so zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o/_/de bzhin du bad kan zhes bya ba la mkhris pa rgyas pa dang 'dres pa'i bad kan la ni sman kha bas bkru ba bsngags pa yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa 'dres pa la ni sman snum pa dang /_dro ba dang /_lan tshwa
[\[215a.6\]]can gyi bkru sman gyis bkru ba bsngags pa yin no/_/mi 'khru na ni chu tshan blud/_/lag pa bsros pas de yi ni/_/lto ba legs par dugs bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyang ba'i sman gyis 'khru bar ma gyur na/_sman gyi nus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_chu tshan
[\[215a.7\]]blud pa dang /_de bzhin du skyes bu lag pa bsros pas de'i lto ba legs par dugs bya zhing bsro bar bya'o/_/ma 'khrus de zhag ldang zas zos/_/nyi ma gnyis par slar yang btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_sman des cung zhig 'khru ba'i nad bde mor ma phyin na mal nas
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]langs la/_phyi rol gyi sar dri ma gdon pa'i phyir 'gro bar byas la/_de nas de zhag gcig zan zos la/_nyi ma gnyis pa zhes bya ba phyi de nyin yang 'khru bar bya ba'i phyir yang sman btung bar bya'o/_/lto ba rab sra snum dag ni/_/zhag bcu'i bar du yang btung bas/_/
[\[215b.2\]]slar yang snum dang dugs kyis ni/_/lus sbyangs nas ni bkru sman gyi/_/sbyor ba legs par brtags pa dang /_/sngar gyi nyes pa dran par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi snum gyis zhen par ma gyur cing ma bslan bas rab tu sra ba zhig na/_zhag bcu'i bar du slar
[\[215b.3\]]yang snum gyi cho ga byas la/_lus nye bar sbyang zhing snum gyi dugs kyis btsos nas bkru sman gyi sbyor ba nad la sogs pa'i tshul la legs par brtags te bya ba dang /_de bzhin du sngar gyi nyes pa ci yang dran zhing ngos zin par byas la/_ma yengs par bkru sman btung
[\[215b.4\]]bar bya'o/_/bkru sman gyi sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_snying dang lto na yi ga 'chus/_/bad kan mkhris pa glongs pa dang /_/g.yan pa lus tsha thor bu dang /_/cham pas 'debs shing bshang rlung 'gags/_/sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/zhes bya ba
[\[215b.5\]]yin te/_bkru sman btang ba ma legs na/_snying dang lto ba na zhing mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yi ga 'chus pa ste zas la 'dod pa med pa dang /_de bzhin du bad kan dang mkhris pa glongs shing bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /_lus g.ya' zhing lus tsha
[\[215b.6\]]ba sna tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag tu thor bu 'byung ba dang /_cham pas 'debs pa dang /_de bzhin du bshang ba thur du 'byung ba'i rlung 'gags par 'gyur ba ni sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid yin par bshad do/_/sbyor legs
[\[215b.7\]]ji skad bshad go bzlog_/ces bya ba la/_bkru sman gyi sbyor ba legs na ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid snying dang lto ba na ba la sogs pa las go bzlog pa ste/_snying dang lto ba dag cing sang bag tu 'gyur ba dang /_zas yi gar 'ong ba la sogs
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bshang ba mkhris pa bad kan rlung /_/rim gyis 'khru zhing 'byung ba na/_/bad kan mkhris pa med chu 'khru/_/skya zhing gnag dang khrag dang bcas/_/yang na sha bkrus lta bu'am/_/tshil gyi dum bu 'dra nyid dam/_/gzhang
[\[216a.2\]]'byung skom dad che ba dang /_/mgo 'khor mig ni phugs su bros/_/bkru sman drags las 'byung ba yin/_/de bzhin skyug sman drags nad 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu shin tu 'khru drags pa la/_gnod pa 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bshang ba la sogs
[\[216a.3\]]pa 'byung ba na/_bad kan dang mkhris pa ni med pa'i dri ma'i chu 'ba' zhig 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du skya zhing dkar ba dang /_gnag cing snag tsha 'dra ba dang /_khrag dang bcas pa ste/_yang na sha bkrus pa lta bu ste/_bkrus pa'i sha 'dra ba dang /_de bzhin du
[\[216a.4\]]tshil gyi dum bu dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa dang /_de bzhin du gzhang 'byung zhing 'thon pa dang /_de bzhin du skom dad che zhing skom pas gdungs pa dang /_mgo 'khor ba dang /_de bzhin du mig phugs su bros shing rkongs su zhugs pa ste/_'di dag ni shin tu 'khru
[\[216a.5\]]drags pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du skyug sman drags pa'i nad kyi tshul sngar bshad pa ltar yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lus skem zhing rmya ba dang /_lus kyi khong tsha ba dang /_lkog ma bskams pa dang /_mig gis mi mthong nas 'chi ba'i bar du
[\[216a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/legs par 'khrus pa de la ni/_/dud pas bdug pa ma gtogs pa'i/_/cho ga skyug sman dang mtshungs pas/_/de nas slon dang 'dra bar bya/_/zas la rim gyis spyad nas ni/_/de 'og nar ma'i kha zas bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[216a.7\]]legs par 'khru zhing khrus kyi sbyor ba ji skad du bshad pa ltar 'khru ba'i skyes bu de la dud pas bdug pa'i cho ga ma gtogs pa/_cho ga gzhan skyug sman gyi skabs su bshad pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra bar nye bar sbyar bar bya ste/_'dir khyad par ni dud pas bdug pa
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa sngar bshad pa thams cad bya'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu slon dang 'dra bar bya ba ste/_ji ltar slon pa'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin du rim pa nyid kyis khrus btang ba'i 'og tu thug pa rkyang rkyang po la sogs pa sbyin pa'i kha zas kyi cho ga rim gyis spyad
[\[216b.2\]]cing bsten nas/_de'i 'og tu nar ma'i kha zas min pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa'i zas kyi cho ga bsten par spyad par bya'o/_/sman 'thungs me drod chung ba dang /_/ma dag nad kyis rmya ba dang /_/zhu ba'i mtshan ma ma mthong na/_/de yi nyin par smyung byas la/_/
[\[216b.3\]]snum dang dugs dang sman rnams kyis/_/glongs pa'i nad kyis nyen mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu sman 'thungs shing spyad nas/_me'i drod chung zhing me'i stobs chung ba dang /_ma dag pa ste/_nad ma phyin la legs par sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid ma skyes pa
[\[216b.4\]]dang /_nad kyis rmya ba ste/_nad kyi dugs sman rnams kyis nyam chung ba dang /_zhu ba'i mtshan ma mthong ste/_sman legs par zhu ba'i rtags mi snang na/_snum dang dugs la sogs pas glongs pa'i nad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur te/_de yang nad gang snum
[\[216b.5\]]gyis glongs shing bskyod pa dang dugs kyis glongs shing bskyod pa dang /_sman gyis glongs pa'i dbang gis nad bskyod pa de smyung ba byas nas des nyen zhing gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/sbyangs dang khrag ni dbyung ba dang /_/snum chog la sbyar smyung ba yis/_/me drod zhen pa
[\[216b.6\]]nyid 'gyur te/_/de bas thug sogs rim gyis spyad/_/ces bya ba la/_slon dang khrus la sogs pas sbyangs pa la sogs pas pho ba'i me drod zhen zhing stobs chung bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de bas na thug pa la sogs pa rim gyis spyod cing bstan par bya'o/_/de
[\[216b.7\]]la sbyangs pa ni skyug sman btang ba dang /_bkru sman btang bas nad phyin par byas pa'o/_/khrag dbyung ba ni gtar ga la sogs pas khrag dbyung ngo /_/snum gyi cho ga la sbyar ba ni snum gyi cho ga bstan pa'o/_/smyung ba ni zas bcad pa'o/_/de yang sman dpyad
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]kyi lung las smyung ba khyad par med pas bshad par zhes 'byung ba yin no/_/bad kan mkhris pa 'bri zhing chung /_/chang 'thungs rlung dang mkhris pa che/_/de la thug pa mi blud kyi/_/brta ba la sogs rim pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi
[\[217a.2\]]bad kan dang mkhris pa chung zhing phri bas chung bar gyur pa de ni bad kan mkhris pa bri zhing chung ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du gang chang 'thung ba la goms pa de ni chang 'thungs pa'o/_/de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas che ba de la thug pa mi drud kyi/_gsum po
[\[217a.3\]]de dag la brta ba la sogs pa'i rim pa phan te/_zas kyi dang por brta ba'i cho ga 'bras bu'i yos kyi phye las byas pa'i skyo ma sbyin par bya ste/_thug pa'i skabs su brta bar byed pa'i 'bras kyi skyo ma sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/skyug sman ma zhu bar nad 'byin/_/
[\[217a.4\]]bkru sman zhu nas 'byin pa yin/_/de yi phyir na skyug sman dag_/zhu ba la ni bsdad mi dgos/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman btang na ni ma zhu ba'i nad 'byin par byed do/_/bkru sman zhu zhing smin nas nad 'byin cing sel bar byed de/_de'i phyir skyug sman dag btang nas
[\[217a.5\]]zhu ba la bsdad mi dgos te gang yud tsam bsdad pa ma byung na yang myur ba nyid du slon zhing drang bar bya'o/_/steng dang 'og tu 'byung rigs pas/_/gang tshe phyin ci log gyur na/_/de tshe skyugs la rkang par ni/_/chu dron dag gis blugs par bya/_/lus kyi stod ni chu grang
[\[217a.6\]]blugs/_/'khru ba la ni de las bzlog_/ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni/_yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa las/_la la zhig gis 'dir bcug pa yin no/_/de'i don ni 'di yin te/_skyug sman gyis steng du 'byung ba dang /_bkru sman gyis 'og tu 'byung
[\[217a.7\]]ba'i rigs pa las/_gang gi tshe rgyu 'ga' zhig gis phyin ci log tu gyur te/_rkyen des skyug sman btang ba na/_'khru bar gyur pa dang /_bkru sman btang ba na slon par gyur pa de'i tshe/_'khru ba las phyin ci log tu gyur te/_slon par gyur pa ni/_chu dron po rkang
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]par blugs la/_chu grang mo ro stod du blugs par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe 'khru sman phyin ci log tu gyur pa las go bzlog pa'i dpyad bya ste/_rkang par chu grang mo blugs par bya la/_ro stod du chu dron mo blugs par bya'o/_/gang zhig nyam chung nad mang dang /_/nad smin pa
[\[217b.2\]]yis rang nyid ni/_/'khru bar byed la 'khru ba ni/_/kha zas byin la der 'khrur gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_gang zhig nyam chung ba la sogs pa dang /_nad smin te rang nyid 'khru ba de la ni kha zas kyis 'khrur gzhug gi_/_'khru ba'i sman sbyin par mi bya'o/_/sngar sbyangs
[\[217b.3\]]pas ni nyam chung dang /_/nad kyi dkyel chung lus zad ni/_/lto yi sra snyi mi shes la/_/sman ni 'jam zhing chung ngu blud/_/de mang 'thungs pa mchog yin gyi/_/gzhan du dgos par bcas mi rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_slar sbyang ba byas pa lus nyam chung bar gyur pa
[\[217b.4\]]dang /_de bzhin du nad kyi dkyel chung ba dang /_lus kyi sha zad cing sbeg pa dang /_de bzhin du lto sra snyi'i bye brag mi shes pa dag la/_sman 'jam zhing chung ba blud par bya ste/_gang gi phyir sman de dgos pa la ltos nas lan mang du 'thungs pa ni mchog yin gyi
[\[217b.5\]]gzhan du na lan cig mang du blud pa dgos pa dang bcas pas ni mi rung ste/_sbyor ba nyes pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro/_/nyam chung ba ni nad mang po/_/g.yos gyur cung zad cung zad cig_/sman ni 'jam pos lan mang zhig_/de ni nyung 'gyur zhi bar bya/_/ma bsal
[\[217b.6\]]de ni yun ring du/_/nyon mongs pa'am gsod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu nyam chung ba'i nad mang po g.yos par gyur ba ni/_cung zad cung zad cig sman 'jam pos yang dang yang du bsal bar byas nas/_nyam chung ba'i nad g.yos par gyur pa
[\[217b.7\]]de nyung ngur gyur pas ma bton par zhi bar byas pas zhi bar bya ste/_gang gi phyir zhe na/_mang po de dag g.yos pa nyung ngu nas bsal zhing zhi bar byas na/_nad de yun ring du nyon mongs shing /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'am/_gsod cing 'joms pa
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]nyid du byed par 'gyur ro/_/me drod chung dang lto sra la/_/thal sman rgyam tsha mar bcas pas/_/me yi drod ni bskyed nas su/_/rlung dang bad kan bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du skyes bu me drod chung bar gyur pa sbyang ba'i skabs la
[\[218a.2\]]bab na thal sman rnon po dang bcas pa'i mar ji skad bshad pas pho ba'i me drod bskyed nas sbyang ba bya'o/_/de bzhin du sra ba la rgyam tsha dang mar dang bcas pas rlung dang bad kan bsal la sbyang bar bya'o/_/rtsub cing rlung mang lto sra dang /_/rtag tu rtsol ba'i tshul can dang /_/me
[\[218a.3\]]drod rab tu che la sman/_/mi 'khru bar ni zhu bar 'gyur/_/de la sngar ni 'jam rtsi gtang /_/de nas snum pa'i bkru sman bya/_/sman ni rnon po'i reng bu yis/_/bshang ba cung zad dbyung bar bya/_/dri ma legs par 'khrus nas ni/_/snum 'khru bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[218a.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu rtsub pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du me drod rab tu che zhing sman de 'khru ba'i sman mi 'khru ba'i bya ba mi byed pa nyid du zhu zhing dengs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas de'i 'og tu snum pa'i bkru sman ni/_ni li ni'i mar la sogs pa las btang ba
[\[218a.5\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/yang na mi de lta bu de la sman rnon po'i reng bu byas pas bshang ba cung zad ces pa nyung shas cig phyung la/_de'i 'og tu bkru sman gtang ngo /_/de yang gang gi phyir reng bu mas gtong bas/_sman gyis bshang ba la sogs pa phyung ba'i 'og tu bkru sman
[\[218a.6\]]snum po btang na 'khru ba bde bar 'gyur ro/_/dug gis phog dang thor bu byung /_/mdze nad 'or nad me dbal dang /_/mig ser skya rbab za gus nyen/_/ha cang snum ches sbyang mi bya/_/kun la bkru sman snum bag btang /_/snum gyis zhen la rtsub pa btang /_/
[\[218a.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_dug gis phog pa nas gcin nad za gus nyen pa'i bar gyi nad pa la snum ha cang chen po sbyin par mi bya'i/_nyams las dpags la/_snum cung zad byin te/_gang la ji ltar 'tsham pa'i bkru sman phal cher rtsub pas khrus bya'o/_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]dug gis phog pa la sogs pa 'dir smos pa ma gtogs pa gzhan kun te/_thams cad la bkru sman snum bag can e raN+Da'i mar la sogs pa'am/_yang na bkru sman dang bskol bas sbyang bar bya'o/_/ji lta bu la snum gyi khrus sman des sbyang zhe na/_
[\[218b.2\]]'das ma thag pa'i snum gyis bsgo bar bstan pas rtsub pas bsgos shing yun ring por rdzas rtsub pos lus bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i bar de la/_snum pa'i bkru sman btang ngo /_/de la yang rtsub pa'i khrus sman du dur byid la sogs pa'i snum gyis bsgos pa'i
[\[218b.3\]]me yun du snum gyis bskyed pa la gtang ngo /_/skyug sman la sogs las rnams la/_/slar yang bar skabs bar skabs su/_/snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya/_/snum rjes la ni stobs bskyed bya/_/lus las nad rnams bsal ba ni/_/gos kyi dri ma
[\[218b.4\]]'khru dang mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa na/_bar skabs bar skabs te/_mdo mdor snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya ste/_skyug sman btang nas de'i zhag kha cig 'das pa'i skabs su snum dang dugs byas la/_de'i 'og tu khrus bya'o/_/de
[\[218b.5\]]ltar khrus byas nas yang 'dus te 'das pa dang /_snum dang dugs byas la/_de'i 'og tu mas gtong bar bya'o/_/de nas bar skabs su snum dang dugs byas la/_de'i 'og tu mgo nad kyi sbyang ba bya'o/_/de
[\[218b.6\]]ltar mgo'i nad sbyang ba sna sman la sogs pa byas nas/_snum 'ba' zhig stobs bskyed pa'i phyir gtang bar bya ste/_skyug sman la sogs pas stobs bri ba gang yin pa de bskyed par bya ba'i phyir de sbyin par bya ste/_gang gi phyir dri ma dang bcas pa'i
[\[218b.7\]]lus nad dang 'dres par gyur pa las/_nad de bsal zhing gdon par bya ste/_de ltar na lus bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar nad kyi dri ma dbyung zhe na/_gos dang mtshungs par te/_dper na dri dang bcas pa'i gos la dri ma med de spang ba la sogs
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]pa'i rnam pas 'khrud par byed pa de bzhin du snum dang dugs la sogs pas nad kyi dri ma slong ba'i thabs kyis nad slongs la/_de'i rjes la nad dbyung bar bya'o/_/snum dang dugs dag ma byas par/_/gang zhig sbyang ba'i las byed pa/_/shing skam 'gugs par byed pa ltar/_/
[\[219a.2\]]de yi lus ni ma rungs 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang snum dang dugs dag mang po byas shing ma bsten par gang zhig sbyang ba'i las skyug sman dang /_bkru sman la sogs pa byed par gyur pa dag ni/_nad des lus 'jig cing ma rungs par 'gyur ba ste/_dper na shing skam po 'gugs
[\[219a.3\]]shing sgur por byed pa chag pa dang 'dra'o/_/sbyang ba legs par nye bar bstan pas ni/_/blo gros gsal zhing dbang po stobs dang ldan/_/lus zungs brtan zhing khong pa'i me drod 'bar/_/na tshod dag kyang ring du 'jog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sbyang ba zhes bya ba skyug sman la sogs pa nas
[\[219a.4\]]sna la sogs pa mgo bo sbyang ba'i bar legs par cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par byas pas nye bar bsten zhing kun tu spyad pas blo gros te/_shes rab gsal zhing rno bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams kyi stobs rang rang gi yul la legs par 'jug nus pa
[\[219a.5\]]dang /_de bzhin du lus zungs te dngas ma la sogs pa brtan zhing sra ba dang /_de bzhin du khong pa'i me drod 'bar ba'i shing nyid du byed pa dang /_de bzhin du na tshod de lus kyi na tshod gzhon pa dag tu'ang yun ring du 'jog par byed cing gnas par byed de/_byed ces bya ba thams cad dang sbyar bar
[\[219a.6\]]bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slon dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las le'u bcwa brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas mas gtong ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[219a.7\]]'di brtsams pa'i dgos pa ni bad kan bsal ba'i phyir skyug sman bshad pa yin la/_mkhris pa bsal ba'i phyir ni bkru sman bshad pa yin la/_gnas skabs 'dir rlung bsal ba'i phyir/_mas gtong ba bshad pa'i skabs yin te/_de bas na de yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/bshang sgo nas gtong ba las su bya ba yin pas na/_mas gtong ba'i cho ga ste/_cho ga ni cho gar bya ba 'di ltar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i tshul gyi le'u ste/_de bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/rlung shas che ba'i nad rnams sam/_/rlung la
[\[219b.2\]]mas gtong bsngags pa ste/_/de ni gso ba thams cad kyi/_/mchog ste de yang rnam pa gsum/_/bkru drags 'jam rtsi mas gtong ngo /_/zhes bya ba la/_nad thams cad kyi nang na rlung gi shas che zhing rlung nad bdo ba'am/_rlung la zhes pa rlung 'ba' zhig ldang ba la yang mas gtong ba de
[\[219b.3\]]nyid kyis gso ba dang /_de bzhin du 'jam rtsi zhes bya ba snum gyi 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba 'dod cing bsngags pa yin no/_/de ni gso ba ste/_rlung gi nad gso ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog ste/_dam pa nyid do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_myur du bde ba 'phel ba la sogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[219b.4\]]mas gtong ba de yang rnam pa gsum ste/_mas gtong ba drag po ni ru ha zhes bya ba dang /_mas gtong ba a nu ba sa ste/_'jam rtsi dang mas gtong ba gong ma ste/_ud da ra ti zhes bya ba'o/_/de la ni ru ha ni nges par 'don pa ste/_nad ma lus pa 'byin par byed pa'o/_/a nu ba sa ni
[\[219b.5\]]rjes su gnas par byed pa ste/_bkru sman drag pos nad rnams rang gi gnas las bskyod cing glongs pa gang yin pa de dag gang gi rjes su ste de'i 'og tu rang gi gnas su gnas shing bde bar 'jog par byed pa de ni a nu ba sa ste 'jam rtsi'o/_/mas gtong ba gong ma ni bshang ba'i sgo la sogs
[\[219b.6\]]pa'i mar gyur pa pho ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba de nas sam/_der gtong bar byed pa de ni ud ta ra ba ti ste/_mas gtong ba gong ma zhes bya'o/_/de yis gso bya skran dang ni/_/lto sbos dreg nad mcher ba dang /_/'khru ba 'ba' zhig gzer nad dang /_/rims rnying bying dang cham pa dang /_/khu ba rlung dang dri ma
[\[219b.7\]]'gags/_/rlig rlugs rde'u nad zla mtshan 'jig_/rlung gi nad ni mi bzad gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman drag po des gso bar bya ba ni/_skran la sogs pa nas rlung gi nad mi bzad pa'i bar du gso zhing btso bar bya'o/_/dreg nad ni rlung dang khrag 'dres pa las gyur pa'i rkang nad do/_/'khru ba 'ba'
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]zhig ni be'u snabs la sogs pa dang /_ma 'dres par 'khru ba'o/_/rims rnying pa ni yun ring du lon pa'i rims bying bag tu 'dug pa'o/_/khu ba dang rlung dang dri ma 'gags pa ni de dag thogs pa'o/_/rlig rlugs ni de 'phel ches pa'o/_/zla
[\[220a.2\]]mtshan 'jig pa ni zla mtshan med pa'o/_/rlung gi nad mi bzad pa ni gso bar dka' ba'i rlung nad do/_/bkru drags mi bya snum drags dang /_/glo rdol shin tu skem pa dang /_/be'u snabs 'khru dang slon bro dang /_/sbyang byas sna sman gtong ba dang /_/dbugs mi bde
[\[220a.3\]]lud cham gzhang 'brum/_/skyigs bu lto sbos me drod chung /_/gzhang skrangs kha zas zos zin dang /_/lto 'gags bu ga chu yod dang /_/mdze dang gcin nad sbrang mdog dang /_/sbrum ma zla bdun yan chad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman drag po gtang du mi rung ba
[\[220a.4\]]ni snum shin tu drags pa la sogs pa nas sbrum ma dang /_zla ba brgyad pa'i mgo zug pa'i bar du'o/_/shin tu skem pa ni ha cang sbeg ches pa'o/_/be'u snabs 'khru ba ni ma zhu ba be'u snabs dang bcas par 'khru ba'o/_/slon bro ba ni skyug pa dag dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[220a.5\]]sbyang ba byas pa ni 'khru sman dang skyug sman btang pa'o/_/sna sman btang ba ni sna nas sman gyi sbyor ba byas pa'o/_/gzhang skrangs pa ni bshang ba'i lam skrangs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/kha zas zos zin pa ni zas la longs spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin du lto 'gags pa dang /_lto na bu ga yod pa dang /_lto na
[\[220a.6\]]chu mang po yod pa dang /_gcin nad sbrang mdog ni sbrang rtsi'i mdog lta bu'i gcin nad kyis nyen pa'o/_/de la snum drags pa la bkru sman drag po mas gtong na/_bsdus shing bsrul ba'i nad slongs pas dmu rdzing chags pa dang /_
[\[220a.7\]]skrangs pa'am/_brgyal bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/glo rdol ba dang shin tu skem pa la ni/_des lus shin tu dkrugs shing slongs bas zug gzer drag po myur du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/slon dang khrus byas pa la ni lus stong pa ste de skems par me ltar bsreg par
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/sna sman btang ba la ni steng gi rtsa sgo shin tu phye bas gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu slon pa la sogs pa ni rlung gis bkru sman drag po gyen du 'dren par 'gyur ro/_/gzhang 'brum yod pa la ni rgyu ma'i lam 'gags pas thur du rgyur mi ster ba'i
[\[220b.2\]]phyir srog la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/zas zos zin pa'i phyir la ni rang nad 'phel zhing ma zhu ba la sogs pa las 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/lto sbos pa dang lto 'gags pa la sogs pa ni rlung gis shas cher 'gags pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrum ma'i nyes pa ni sngar bshad
[\[220b.3\]]pa yin no/_/bkru drag bya nyid 'jam rtsi bya/_/khyad par du ni me drod che/_/rtsub dang rlung nad gcig pus nyen/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang la bkru sman drag po gtang bar bya ba de nyid la/_'jam rtsi bya ste/_de dag nyid la snum gyi cho ga mas gtong bar bya'o/_/de
[\[220b.4\]]las kyang khyad par du me drod che zhing khong pa'i drod che ba dang /_de bzhin du khong rtsub pa dang /_rlung nad gcig pus nyen cing nad gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i rlung nad kyis gzir zhing gnod pa la 'jam rtsi bya'o/_/'jam rtsi mi bya ba'ang de nyid do/_/de bzhin skya rbab mig ser
[\[220b.5\]]dang /_/tshil che cham btab zas ma zos/_/bshang ba 'khru bar byed pa dang /_/lto lci lto nad bad kan can/_/mchil ma mang dang shin tu sbom/_/lto na srin yod rlung 'khyims dang /_/dug dag 'thungs dang 'brum bus btab/_/rkang bam lkog ma'i lba ba can/_/zhes
[\[220b.6\]]bya ba la/_'jam rtsi mi bya ba'i yul yang /_gang sngar bkru sman drag po byar mi rung bar bshad pa de nyid yin no/_/gzhan de bzhin du 'jam rtsi byar mi rung ba ni/_skya rbab dang mig ser la sogs pas btab pa dag la yang byar mi rung ngo /_/rlung 'khyims
[\[220b.7\]]pa ni tshil gyi nang du zhen pa'i rlung ngo /_/'brum bu ni 'bras kyi phreng ba'o/_/de gnyis sbu gu gser sogs dang /_/shing rus 'od ma las byas pa/_/ba lang mjug 'dra bug rdol med/_/'jam zhing drang la kha zlum pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]drag po mas gtong ba dang /_'jam rtsi btang ba de gnyis kyi sbu gu ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gser la sogs pa zhes bya ba gser dang dngul dang zangs dang zha nye dang /_ro nye las byas pa'o/_/de bzhin du dbyibs ni ba lang gi mjug ma
[\[221a.2\]]ltar rim gyis phra ba'o/_/bug rdol med pa ni spel med pa'o/_/'jam pa ni rtsub pa med pa'o/_/drang ba ni ma yo ba'o/_/kha zlum pa ni rtse mo mi rno ba'o/_/lo gcig ma lon par sor lnga/_/lo tshad lo bdun pa yi bar/_/tshad ni sor drug yin par bshad/_/
[\[221a.3\]]lo bdun pa yi bdun nyid de/_/bcu gnyis pa la sor brgyad bya/_/bcu drug yan chad sor dgu ste/_/nyi shu yan chod sor bcu gnyis/_/lo gzhan dag la na tshod dang /_/stobs dang lus tshad brtags nas ni/_/tshad ni mngon par bskyed par bya/_/zhes bya
[\[221a.4\]]ba la/_byis pa lo gcig ma lon pa la gtong ba'i sbu gu ni srid sor lnga bya'o/_/lo tshang ste lo gcig lon pa'i byis pa nas lo bdun pa'i bar gyi byis pa'i gce'u'i tshad ni sor drug pa bya ba yin par bshad do/_/de nas byis pa lo drug lon pa la gce'u sor drug pa bya'o/_/
[\[221a.5\]]lo bdun rdzogs pa'i tshe ni sor bdun pa nyid bya'o/_/lo bcu gnyis lon pa la ni gce'u sor brgyad pa bya'o/_/lo bcu drug lon pa nas lo bcu dgu lon pa'i bar la gce'u sor dgu pa bya'o/_/lo nyi shu lon pa phan chad ni gce'u sor bcu gnyis pa bya la/_yang
[\[221a.6\]]lo gzhan de dag gi tshe na stobs dang lus kyi tshad brtags nas gce'u'i tshad mngon par skyed cing 'phel bar bya'o/_/de yang lo gcig ma lon pa la gce'u'i tshad sor lnga bya bar bshad la/_de rdzogs nas lo bcu drug lon pa'i bar la sor drug bya bar bshad pas/_
[\[221a.7\]]de'i lo gzhan dag la ni tshod gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin du stobs dang lus kyi tshad de brtags te bar skabs der na tshod la sogs pa skye ba bzhin du gce'u yang bskyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lo gzhan dag ni na tshod kyi bar gyi lo la yang bsgre bar bya'o/_/rtsa ba
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rang gi mthe bong mnyam/_/rtse mo mthe'u chung tshad du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gce'u'i rtsa ba'i gnas su rang gi mthe bo'i tshad ces pa/_nad pa'i mthe bong dang sbom gyi tshad mnyam par bya'o/_/rtse mo ste gce'u'i kha'i phyogs nad pa'i mthe'u chung dang sbom mnyam
[\[221b.2\]]par bya'o/_/lo gcig lon sor nas gzung ste/_/de yi phyed phyed kyis bskyed bya/_/gang zhig rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad/_/sor mo gsum rtse shong ba mchog_/mung+ga ma sha sran ma btsos/_/rgya shug 'bras shong rim bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_na tshod
[\[221b.3\]]ji skad bstan pa'i rim pas gce'u'i tshad bstan pa'i rim pa las ma 'chol bar byas/_byis pa lo gcig lon zhing tshang ba'i sor tshad nas bzung ste/_de'i phyed phyed bskyed par bya zhing /_ji srid du bu ga sor gsum par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bskyed par bya ste/_
[\[221b.4\]]de ni bu ga'i che tshad ste mchog yin pas na/_de las kyang lhag par mi bya ste/_lo gcig ma lon pa la ni rtsa ba'i bu ga sor gcig pas chung bar bya'o/_/rtse mo yang sran mung+ga shong ba bas cung zad chung bar bya/_de'i phyed phyed ces bya ba la/_de yi zhes bya
[\[221b.5\]]ba ni sor tshad la snyegs la/_des na sor gyi phyed phyed kyis bskyed cing /_'phel bar bya ba ni/_ji srid rtsa ba'i bu gar sor gsum shong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bskyed par bya'o/_/rtse mo'i bu ga ni lo gcig lon pa'i gce'u'i bu ga sran mung+ga ste/_
[\[221b.6\]]mon sran sde'u shong ba nas rgya shug gi bar du rim bzhin du bskyed par bya'o/_/mchog ces bya ba ni 'dir yang sbyar bar bya ste/_gang rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong ba'i tshad du byas pa'i gce'u'i bu ga ni che tshad yin pas de las lhag par ni mi bya'o/_/de bas
[\[221b.7\]]na lo gcig lon pa nas lo drug pa'i bar gyi gce'u'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad ni mung+ga shong ba tsam bya'o/_/lo bdun pa nas lo bcu gcig pa'i bar gyi gce'u'i bu ga ni ma sha shong ba'o/_/lo bcu gnyis pa nas bcwo lnga'i bar gyi ni sran ma skam po shong ba'o/_/
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]lo bcu drug pa nas bcu dgu pa'i bar du ni sran ma btsos pa shong ba'o/_/nyi shu lon pa yan chad ni gce'u'i bu ga ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu chung ngu shong ba tsam bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad kyi ni/_/mthar ni bu ga 'gegs par bya/_/
[\[222a.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_mthar zhes bya ba rtse mor rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad ji lta ba las de'i gag pa 'khor lo lta bu gang shing bsgrub par bya'o/_/rtse mor kha bkag ces bya ba ni gce'u de'i rtse mo'i kha ras bal la sogs pa'i sdong bu lta bus kha bkab ste/_rlung
[\[222a.3\]]la sogs pa nang du zhugs pa dgag pa'i phyir de ltar bya'o/_/gce rtsa rang gi sor gnyis kyis/_/chod par 'gag pa gnyis pa bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du gce'u de'i rtsa ba'i phyogs su rang gi zhes pa nad pa bdag nyid kyi sor gnyis kyis chod
[\[222a.4\]]par 'gag pa gnyis pa bya ste/_de la rkyal bu gdags shing bcing dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/der ni rkyal bu gdags bya ba/_/ra lug ma he la sogs pa'i/_/lgang pa legs mnyes sra ba dang /_/dmar btsos bu ga thag thug med/_/dri nga rtsa
[\[222a.5\]]ris med srab par/_/sman ni legs par blugs byas la/_/srad bus dam par bcing bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gag pa gnyis kyi bar du lug la sogs pa'i lgang ba'i rkyal bu legs par mnyes pa dang /_de bzhin du sra ba ste ma gas
[\[222a.6\]]pa dang dmar por btsos te tshon gzhan gyi kha dog med pa thag thug med cing mdud pa chags pa med cing rul ba la sogs pa'i dri nga ba med pa rtsa'i ri mo med pas srab ste mthug pa ma yin pa/_de lta bur sman bde bar blugs shing gzhag la/_srad bu sra bas legs
[\[222a.7\]]par dam du bcing bar bya'o/_/lgang med rkyal pa'i dpung pa'am/_/byin pa'i lpags sam ras stug bzang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gong du smos pa lta bu'i lgang pa med na rkyal pa'i dpung pa bcad pa'am/_byin pa'i pags pa legs par mnyes
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]pa de la bcing zhing gdags par bya'o/_/yang na ras stug cing bzang la bu ga med pa spra tshil la sogs pas bskus la/_chu thub pa las sman blugs pa'i snod bya'o/_/ni ru ha tshad dang po ni/_/lo gcig pa la srang gcig mchog_/ji srid srang ni
[\[222b.2\]]bcu gnyis bar/_/lo re srang res bskyed par bya/_/bcu gnyis pa nas bcwa brgyad bar/_/de yang bdun cu'i bar tshad 'di/_/de phan srang tshad nyi shu nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_ni ru ha ste bkru sman drag po mas gtod ba'i tshad ni lo gcig lon pa la
[\[222b.3\]]srang gcig mchog ste/_che tshad yin no/_/lo gcig ma lon pa srang gcig tu cung zad ma longs pa tshad yin no/_/de phan chad lo re re zhing srang re res bskyed de/_lo bcu gnyis pa'i bar la srang bcu gnyis gtang ba'i bar du bskyed par bya'o/_/ni ru
[\[222b.4\]]ha srang bcu gnyis byas pa de phan chad kyi lo re bzhin srang gnyis bskyed par bya'o/_/lo bcu gnyis lon pa nas/_bcu bdun lon pa'i bar la bya'o/_/bcwa brgyad pa ni srang nyi shu rtsa bzhi che tshad yin te/_de yang ni ru ha tshad 'di ni lo bcu bdun lon
[\[222b.5\]]pa'i bar gyi tshad yin no/_/lo bdun cu lon pa phan chad kyi ni srang nyi shu nyid che tshad yin no/_/zhes bya ba ni 'dir nges par bzung ba'i don no/_/che tshad srang nyi shu kho na yin gyi de las lhag pa mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/bkru sman drag tshad ji lta ba/_/
[\[222b.6\]]de yi bzhi cha 'jam rtsi'i tshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bkru sman drag po ni ru ha'i tshad ni tshod gang dang gang las ji ltar yin pa de dang de'i bzhi cha 'jam rtsi zhes bya ba/_snum gyi cho ga mas gtong ba'i tshad yin no/_/de yang lo dang po la ni ru ha'i tshad srang gcig
[\[222b.7\]]yin la/_tshad de'i bzhi cha zho gnyis la ni 'jam rtsi lo gcig pa la gtang ba'i tshad yin no/_/de bzhin du bcu gnyis pa la srang bcu gnyis ni ru ha'i tshad yin pa las/_de'i bzhi cha srang gsum 'jam rtsi'i tshad do/_/de bzhin du lo bcwa brgyad lon
[\[223a\]]
