[\[223a.1\]]pa'i tshad nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin la/_de'i bzhi cha ni srang drug ste/_de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/bkru sman drag bya snum dugs bya/_/sbyang byas nas kyang stobs thob pa/_/'jam rtsi gtang bar 'os pa nas/_/thog ma
[\[223a.2\]]nyid du 'jam rtsi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ni ru ha zhes bya ba bkru sman drag po gtang bar bya zhing 'os pa ste/_snum dang dugs bya ba ste/_dang po snum gyi cho ga byas la/_de'i 'og tu dugs bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyang bar bya ba ste/_bkru sman dang /_
[\[223a.3\]]skyug sman byas nas kyang slar stobs thob cing /_nyams stobs brtags pa dag 'jam rtsi gtang bar 'os shing rigs par shes nas/_dang po thog ma kho nar bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/dgun dpyid nyin par btang de las/_/gzhan
[\[223a.4\]]du mtshan btang la la 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_dgun zhes bya ba grang ba'i dus spyir grang ba ste/_dgun stod dang dgun smad kyi dus su 'jam rtsi nyin par gtang bar bya'o/_/de las gzhan du zhes pa gong ma las gzhan pa'i dus so ga dang /_dbyar dang ston
[\[223a.5\]]ka mtshan mo'i dus su 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/zhes srog 'tsho ba'i slob dpon la la 'dod do/_/sku byug khrus byas sngon thang las/_/bzhi gsum phan zhing yang ba dang /_/snum dang rtsub ches ma yin bza'/_/khu ba la sogs zos rjes btung /_/
[\[223a.6\]]bcags la bshang gci bsal nas ni/_/mal du bde bar gnas byas la/_/mtho dman med par mgo smad de/_/glo g.yon gyis ni phab nas su/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bkug nas ni/_/rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dang po bsku byug byas
[\[223a.7\]]la/_de'i 'og tu khrus bya ba yin pas na/_nad pa de bsku byug dang khrus bya'o/_/de nas sngon bsten zhing goms pa'i tha ma la bzhi cha gsum ste/_nar mar bza' ba'i thang las bzhi cha phri la/_bza' ba ni yang ba dang /_ha cang rtsub ches pa dang /_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]snum ches pa ma yin pa/_snum rtsub ran pa phan zhing gnod pa med pa'i zas bza' bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu 'tshal nan btung ba ni mung+ga'i khu ba la sogs pa gnod pa med cing rjes su mthun pa btung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bcags pa ste/_cung zad cig
[\[223b.2\]]phan tshun bcags pa dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba legs par bsil zhing dor ba dang /_de bzhin du rlung med pa'i khang pa'i nang du mal bde ba shin tu mtho ba dang /_shin tu dma' ba ma yin pa mgo smad pa ste/_rkang pa'i phyogs cung mtho bar glo
[\[223b.3\]]g.yon pa legs par phab la/_rkang pa g.yas pa bkug nas rkang pa g.yon pa legs par brkyang ba'i tshul de ltar gnas par byas la/_de nas de la gce'u gzhag par bya'o/_/de yang ji lta zhe na/_de nas de la gce'u kha dang /_/gzhang sgo
[\[223b.4\]]snum gyis bskus nas ni/_/gce'u lgang pa'i dbugs bton la/_/kha bcings lag pa mi 'dar bar/_/rgyab kyi phyogs su 'dug nas ni/_/shin tu myur dang dal min dang /_/ha cang shugs drag dal min par/_/ran par lan cig kho nar btsir/_/
[\[223b.5\]]rlung ni lhag par gnas pa na/_/lhag ma cung zad lus par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu skyes bu de la gce'u gzhug pa'i thabs ni/_gce'u kha ste rtse mo snum gyis bsku ba dang /_gzhang zhes bya ba bshang ba'i lam yang snum gyis bskus
[\[223b.6\]]te/_dbugs bton zhes pa lgang pa'i nang gi dbugs bton la/_gce'u'i kha bcings shing bsdams nas/_lag pa mi 'dar zhing brdabs bag tu ma gyur pas rgyab kyi phyogs nas de la mngon par phyogs par 'dug ste gtang bar bya'o/_/de'i
[\[223b.7\]]'og tu shin tu myur ba dang /_shin tu bul ba dang /_dam pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang shugs drag pa dang /_ha cang dal bar ma yin par lan cig kho nar btsir bar bya'o/_/yang nas yang du ni ma yin no/_/de yang lgang pa de'i zhabs na
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sman gyi lhag ma cung zad lus par bya'i/_rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du btsir bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyi lhag mar rlung yod pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang /_lgang pa de'i zhabs sman gyi lhag_/ma lus par ni blugs
[\[224a.2\]]pa yis/_/rlung zhugs nas ni rnam 'khrugs pas/_/gzer dang nad rnams skyed par 'gyur/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/btang nas lus ni gan rkyal gzhag_/rkub tsos lag pas brdab par bya/_/rting pas mjug tsos brdung bya zhing /_/rting pa bteg
[\[224a.3\]]la lan gsum gsig_/ces bya ba la/_'jam rtsi btang nas de'i lus gan rkyal du bzhag la/_'jam rtsi btang ba de'i rkub tsos lag pas brdab par bya zhing bsnun par bya'o/_/de bzhin du nad pa'i rting pa gnyis kyis mjug tsos brdung zhing brdeg par
[\[224a.4\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin du mal nas rting pa yar bteg ste/_lan gsum gyi bar du gsig cing gyen du drang bar bya'o/_/de nas lus ni brkyang nas ni/_/sngas dang bcas pa'i rting par ni/_/khu tshur gyis brdungs lus kyang ni/_/snum gyis bskus la mnye bar
[\[224a.5\]]bya/_/tshor bas nyen pas snum dag ni/_/myur du phyir 'byung mi byed do/_/gal te myur du phyir byung na/_/phan mi byed pas gzhan dag gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu nad pa'i lus brkyang bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du sngas bcug pa
[\[224a.6\]]la rting par khu tshur gyis brdungs la/_yan lag snum gyis byugs nas mnye bar bya ste/_gang gi phyir tshor ba mi bde bas nyen pas mas gtong ba'i snum ste/_myur ba kho nar phyir 'byung zhing 'dzag par mi byed do/_/gal te myur du phyir 'byung zhing ldog
[\[224a.7\]]par gyur na/_'jam rtsi gnyis pa sbyar zhing gtang bar bya ste/_gang gi phyir snum nang du chags na/_nad pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad sel ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur bas/_de myur du byung na bya ba de mi byed pa'i phyir/_gzhan dag gis bsnan
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dgos so/_/me drod che zhing snum byung na/_/dgongs ka kha zas yang ba sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_me drod shin tu che zhing snum phyir byung bar gyur na/_dgongs ka ste nyin par gyi mthar kha zas yang mo dag sbyin par bya'o/_/dbyung ba'i dus kyi dam pa ni/_/thun gsum yin
[\[224b.2\]]te de phan chad/_/nyin mtshan gcig ni bsdad nas su/_/de yi 'og tu reng bu yis/_/snum dbyung phyir ni 'bad bya ba/_/mas gtong ba ni rnon po bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jam rtsi dbyung ba'i dus kyi dam pa'am/_mchog ni thun gsum yin te/_de phan chad ces bya ba'i
[\[224b.3\]]'og tu nyin mtshan gcig 'das kyi bar du byung bar ma gyur na/_nyin mtshan gcig gi bar du bsdad nas/_de'i 'og tu reng bu sbyar bas 'jam rtsi snum dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir/_sman pas 'bad par bya ba'am/_mas gtong ba'i sman rnon po bya ba la 'bad par bya'o/_/shin tu
[\[224b.4\]]rtsub pas ma byung zhing /_/snyom bag la sogs nad med na/_/btang snyoms su ni gzhag par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shin tu lus kyi khong rtsub pa'i phyir/_snum ma byung zhing slar 'dzag par ma gyur la/_gal te snyom bag gam/_rmongs bag la sogs pa'i nad
[\[224b.5\]]kyi nyes pa yang med na btang snyoms su gzhag par bya'o/_/de byung ba la 'bad par mi bya'o/_/de nas mtshan 'das nang par ni/_/bca' sga 'u su bskol chu 'am/_/yang na chu tshan 'ba' zhig btung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu mtshan mo bde bar gnas pas
[\[224b.6\]]'das par byas la/_nang par gyi dus su bca' sga dang 'u su bskol ba'i chu tshan dro 'jam tsam btang ba'am/_yang na chu bskol ba tshan te 'ba' zhig btung bar bya ste/_de'i snum gyi lhag ma zhu ba dang /_rlung dang /_bad kan zhu ba'i phyed bya ba yin no/_/'jam rtsi btang
[\[224b.7\]]nas nyin gsum mam/_/nyin lnga lon nas slar btang ba'am/_/ji srid snum ni 'ju 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na rlung ni shas che dang /_/rtag tu rtsol byed me drod che/_/khong rtsub pa la nyin re btang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar 'jam rtsi btang nas mi de nyi ma gsum mam/_
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]nyi ma lnga nas slar yang 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na dus ji srid cig gis snum de bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur ba de'i tshad kyis btang ngo /_/yang nyin re yang btang du rung ste/_de nyid kyis na rlung shas che ba la sogs pa yin te/_rlung gi shas che zhing rlung nad
[\[225a.2\]]bdo ba dang /_de bzhin du rtag tu rtsol ba byed pa ste/_rgyun mi 'chad par las su bya ba'i rtsol ba drag pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin du me drod che ba dang /_skyes bu khong shin tu rtsub pa la nyin re ste zhag re rgyun mi 'chad par gtang bar bya'o/_/de ltar snum ni gsum mam bzhis/_/snum
[\[225a.3\]]gyur rtsa sgo sbyang ba'i phyir/_/mas gtong khrus kyis sbyang ba dang /_/snum med lus ni snum gyur gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar rim pa 'dis nad la sogs tshul la dpags te/_'jam rtsi'i snum gsum mam bzhis skyes bu'i lus kyi snum gyur nas rtsa sgo sbyang ba'i phyir zhes
[\[225a.4\]]pa rtsa snum gyi rgyu ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/_ni ru ha ste bkru sman drag po dang /_sbyang zhing zhi bar bya ba dang /_rlung shas che bas lus snum med par gyur pa'i lus la snum par bya zhing khong brta bar bya ba'i phyir snum gyi cho ga gtang bar bya'o/_/nyi ma gsum mam nyin lnga na/_/
[\[225a.5\]]tshes grangs bzang zhing dge ba la/_/nyin phyed cung zad yol ba'i tshe/_/gtor ma bkra shis cho ga bya/_/snum bsku dugs bya bshang gci ni/_/bsal zhing shin tu bkres min la/_/skyes bu'i nad dmigs sman la sogs/_/'bad de shes par byas nas ni/_/sman pas de la mkhas
[\[225a.6\]]pa ni/_/mang dang lhan cig mas gtong sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba'i nyi ma gsum mam nyi ma lnga na bya ba bsgrub cing bsngags pa'i tshes grangs dang /_byed pa dang /_thang cig dang /_rgyu skar bzang po dang /_nyin dge ba la nyi ma'i phyed cung zad yol zhing 'das pa'i tshe
[\[225a.7\]]gtor ma dang bkra shis kyi cho ga dag ji lta ba bzhin du byas shing shis pa brjod pa dang /_bde legs la sogs pa dge sbyong dang bram zes byas nas/_sman bkru sman drag po mas gtong zhing brtsam par bya ste/_de yang de la mkhas shing mas gtong ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba la mkhas
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa'i sman pa mang po dang lhan cig gros bya ba dang /_skyes bu nad pa'i nad kyi dmigs la sogs pa yang shes par byas la/_lus snum gyis bsku bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du dugs bya ba dang /_bshang ba dang gci ba bsal zhing dor ba dang /_shin tu bkres pas ma yin zhing ltogs pas
[\[225b.2\]]nyen pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du nad dmigs dang sman la sogs pa 'bad cing btsal bas shes shing rtogs par byas nas sman pas mas gtong ba'i cho ga la sbyar zhing brtag par bya'o/_/sman gyi srang ni nyi shu dang /_/po son cha brgyad lhan cig bskol/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba
[\[225b.3\]]bcu pa la sogs pa'i sman srang nyi shu 'og nas mas gtong ba'i cho ga'i skabs nas smos pa bskol ba dang /_de bzhin du po son cha'i 'bras bu brgyad lhan cig bskol bar bya ste/_po son cha brgyad la ni srang gcig tsam yod do/_/de ltar na sman srang nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_sman gyi
[\[225b.4\]]bcu drug 'gyur gyi chu dang sbyangs la de legs par bskol bar bya'o/_/de nas cha lugs dang bskol ba'i sman chu de/_brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bskol ba de yi bzhi cha yi/_/sman mar rlung la rjes su sbyar/_/mkhris pa bde bar gnas drug cha/_/bad kan shas cher
[\[225b.5\]]brgyad cha gcig_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar bskol ba de las snum gyi mar bzhi cha gcig rlung gi nad la rjes su sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa'i nad la ni bskol ba de las snga ma'i tshad las drug cha ste/_srang bcu bzhi gtang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bde bar gnas shing
[\[225b.6\]]tha mal par 'dug pa la yang drug cha nyid gtang bar bya'o/_/bad kan shas che zhing rgyas pa'i nad la ni de'i brgyad cha ste/_srang bcu gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na kun la sman gyi ni/_/brgyad cha gcig gam/_zhes bya ba la/_sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'dir yang sbyar bar bya ste/_kun la zhes bya ba rlung
[\[225b.7\]]dang mkhris pa dang /_de bzhin du bad kan te bde bar gnas pa la sman gyi brgyad cha gcig ste/_bskol ba'i gang brgyad cha gcig tu gyur pa srang bcu thams cad la sbyin par bya'o/_/ci nas kyang /_/mas gtong ska slar mi 'gyur bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na thams cad du sman bskol ba'i
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]brgyad cha gcig sbyin pa yin no/_/gzhan du sman gyi phye ma'am/_lde gu'i cha las mas gtong ba'i sman shin tu ska zhing 'byar ba yang ma yin la/_shin tu sla zhing 'dzag ches par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar sbyar bar bya'o/_/bu ram dag ni srang gcig dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang
[\[226a.2\]]mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_bde bar gnas pa'i mas gtong ba thams cad la/_bu ram srang gcig gzhug par bya ste smos pa ni/_de las yid ches pa'am/_chung ba yang rung ba'i don no/_/rigs pas sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha sogs/_/lhag ma/_zhes bya ba la/_rjes sbyar ba dang kun la
[\[226a.3\]]zhes bya ba la 'dir yang sbyar bar bya ste/_de la rigs pa ni sbyor ba ste/_bya ba'i thabs yin no/_/de lta bu'i rigs pa dang ldan pas sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha'am/_lce myang tsha la sogs pa lhag ma gang yin pa bkru sman drag pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa tshad ma bstan pa de thams cad la sbyar zhing gtang
[\[226a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/sogs pa'i sgras ni sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha las gzhan pa zho ga chu dang /_rang skyur gyi rtsab mo dang /_'o ma dang /_ba gcin la sogs pa bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba'i sde tshan du gtogs pa gzhan dag kyang bsdu'o/_/de kun snod gcig blugs/_bum par chu bskol rlangs
[\[226a.5\]]pa yis/_/bsro zhing gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/_/rkyal bu'i nang blugs mjug mar ni/_/gtong tshe shin tu tsha grang min/_/shin tu snum min rtsub pa min/_/shin tu rno min 'jam pa min/_/shin tu ska min sla ba'ang min/_/shin tu mang nyung tshad med pa'am/_/tsha che skyur ba'ang de dang 'dra/_/
[\[226a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_gong du smos pa de thams cad ma lus pa snod gcig tu blugs la/_bum par bskol ba'i rlangs pas bsro zhing tsha bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du gzar bu'am skyabs kun dkrugs shing bskyos par lug dang /_ma he la sogs pa'i lgang pa las byas pa'i rkyal bu'i nang du
[\[226a.7\]]blugs la sman de mas gtong ba'i don du mjug ma nas gtong zhing 'jud par byed pa'i tshe/_shin tu tsha ba ma yin pa dang /_shin tu grang pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du shin tu rtsub pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du ba gcin dang /_yungs kar la sogs pa shas che ba shin
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]tu rno ba ma yin pa dang /_'o ma mang po gtong bas shin tu 'jam pa ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du shin tu ska ba ma yin pa dang /_shin tu sla ba ma yin pa dang /_shin tu mang ba ma yin pa dang /_tshad las shin tu nyung ba ma yin pa dang /_de bzhin du shin tu tsha med pa'am/_che bar yang mi bya ba
[\[226b.2\]]dang /_de bzhin du kan dzi rang skyur la sogs pa skyur ba med pa'am/_de shas che ba'am/_de dang 'dra ste/_mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don no/_/de la mkhas pa gzhan smras pa/_/snum dang sbrang rtsi gnyis so sor/_/srang ni gsum gsum byas nas ni/_/rgyam tsha dag ni zho gnyis dang /_/nad med la
[\[226b.3\]]btang sman srang gnyis/_/khu ba'i sman ni lhag ma kun/_/srang bcu yongs su sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mas gtong ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa'i sman pa gzhan dag gis ni/_mas gtong ba'i cho ga gzhan dag 'chad cing ston te/_til mar la sogs pa'i snum dang /_de bzhin du
[\[226b.4\]]sbrang rtsi dag ni tshad srang gsum gsum du so sor bya ba ste/_snum srang gsum dang de bzhin du sbrang rtsi srang gsum dang /_de bzhin du rgyam tsha zho gnyis sbyar ba 'di ni nad med pa ste/_bde bar gnas pa la gtang ba yin no/_/zhes smras so/_/de bzhin du sman srang gnyis dang /_ku ba
[\[226b.5\]]bskol ba'i sman lhag ma srang bcur yongs su sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar na spyir srang bcwa brgyad mas gtong ba'i tshad yin par 'dod do/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha snum rnams dang /_/sman phye khu ba'i rim pa ni/_/mas gtong rkyal par bcug byas te/_/'di ni sbyor ba'i cho gar bshad/_/ces bya ba
[\[226b.6\]]la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba rim gyis bcos shing sbyang ste/_dang po sbrang rtsi sbyar zhing gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas ni rgyam tsha'o/_/de nas ni snum mo/_/de nas ni sman gyi phye ma'o/_/de nas ni sman gyi khu ba gzhug par bya ste/_gang gi phyir sman drag po mas gtong ba'i sbyor ba 'di ni sbyor ba'i
[\[226b.7\]]cho ga gcig tu bsres pa yin no zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do/_/gan rkyal bzhag nas btang ma thag_/sngas kyis brten te mas gtong la/_/yid ni gzhan du ma yengs pas/_/zhes bya ba la/_gan rkyal du bzhag nas sngas kyis brten te/_bkru sman drag po mas gtong ma thag
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'das pa'i dus gzhan gang du yang ma yengs pas mas gtong ba drag po'i nus pa lus la khyab pa'i phyir/_ni ru ha de la ma yengs par bya ste/_gang 'di nga la bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba ji tsam na slar 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu zhes bsam par bya'o/_/'khru ba tsog bus gtang bar
[\[227a.2\]]bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i rjes thogs la 'khru ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bkru sman drag pos phyir 'byung bar nye bar phyogs par gyur na/_tsog bus 'dug la/_khu drag po'i shugs btang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/'ong dus dam pa yud tsam ste/_/de las gzhan du 'chi byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman
[\[227a.3\]]drag po mas gtong ba de phyir 'ong zhing 'byung ba'i dus kyi dam pa'am mchog ni yud tsam ste/_chu tshod gnyis kyi nang yin pa las/_de las gzhan zhing 'das pa'i dus su sdod par byed na/_ni ru has 'chi bar 'gyur bar byed pa yin no/_/de la bcos pa'i thabs gyur snum/_/thal sman pa
[\[227a.4\]]gcin khu skyur sbyar/_/myur bas snum rno dro ba yi/_/mas gtong gzhan dag gtang bar bya/_/yang na sman gyi reng bu dang /_/btang zhing dugs la sogs pa bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba de phyir 'ong bar gyur ba la bcos shing gso ba'i thabs ni myur zhing rings par
[\[227a.5\]]mas gtong ba snga ma las gzhan pa snum pa dang rno ba dang /_dro ba'i mtshan nyid can dang /_de bzhin du thur du 'byin par byed pa'i snum dang /_thal sman rnon po dang /_ba gcin la sogs pa dang sbyar ba dag kyang gtang bar bya'o/_/yang na de myur du 'khru ba'i phyir sman gyi reng bu myur du gzhug
[\[227a.6\]]par bya'o/_/de la sman gyi reng bu ni po son cha'i 'bras bu las byas pa'o/_/de bzhin du sngangs shing skrag par bya ba dang /_dugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa yang myur du dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/rang nyid 'ong bar gyur na ni/_/mas gtong gnyis pa btang ba'am/_/lan gsum lan bzhi'i
[\[227a.7\]]bar du ste/_/ji srid legs par gyur par gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de rang nyid 'ong zhing mas gtong ba gcig 'ong bar gyur na/_mas gtong ba gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du lan gsum pa'am/_lan bzhi pa'i bar du yang gtang bar bya'o/_/yang ji srid legs par 'khru bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]bar du gtang ste/_grangs nges par chad pa med de/_mas gtong ba de dag tsam du ma zad kyi/_bkru sman drag po legs par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bskyed par bya ba'i phyir mang po yang gtang bar bya ba yin no/_/de yi sbyor legs bkru sman dang /_/'dra bar shes bya/_zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman
[\[227b.2\]]drag po mas gtong ba de'i rjes la bkru sman gyi sbyor ba legs pa dang /_sbyor ba nyes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba'i sbyor ba 'di la yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/sbyor ba nyes pa las snying dang lto ba ma dag pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa la
[\[227b.3\]]sogs pa yin la/_sbyor ba legs pa las ji skad bshad pa'i skyon med pa'o/_/sbyor ba drags pa ni bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang bshang gci skyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no/_/sbyor legs na/_/chu dron 'jam pos bkrus nas ni/_/sha khu 'bras chan cung zad sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dag
[\[227b.4\]]pa'i sbyor ba'am/_sbyor ba legs par gyur na/_skyes bu de cung zad dro bas bkrus la skam sa'i sha'i khu ba dang 'bras chan nyung zad cig sbyin par bya'o/_/mas gtong drag po'i nad rnams kyi/_/dri ma bskyod bar byung gyur pa/_/de ni chu dron gyis bkru dang /_/kha zas tshul bzhin zos pas 'byang /_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[227b.5\]]skyes bu bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba'i nad rnams kyi dri mas bskyod cing 'byung bar bya'o/_/nad de chu dron po 'jam pos bkru ba dang /_de bzhin du kha zas tshul bzhin du zos pas byang zhing dag par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rlung gis nyam thag na/_/slar yang 'phral du 'jam rtsi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te
[\[227b.6\]]rlung gi nad kyis nyam thag cing gnod par gyur na/_slar yang 'phral du dus de'i tshe nyid 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya ste/_snum gyi ji lta bu bzhin du gso zhing bcos pa nyid du bya'o/_/de ni legs dang ma legs dang /_/drags pa snum 'thungs 'drar shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jam rtsi'i sbyor ba legs pa dang /_ma
[\[227b.7\]]legs pa dang /_drags pa rnam pa gsum/_snum 'thungs pa dang tshul 'dra bar 'gyur te/_de yang 'di ltar/_rlung ni bde rgyu me drod 'bar/_/bshang ba snum zhing mi sril/_/snum mi 'dod cing snyoms gyur pa/_/snum legs yin te rtsub mo bzlog_/snum drags pa yis skya rbab dang /_/sna dang kha rkub las 'dzag
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di dag gi sbyor ba legs pa dang /_ma legs pa dang /_drags par gyur pa yin no/_/gang zhig dus ni cung zad gnas/_/bshang dang bcas par 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/thur du dbugs dang snum lhan cig_/'byung 'gyur 'jam rtsi legs pa yin/_/zhes bya
[\[228a.2\]]ba la/_snum gang zhig dus cung zad cig gnas nas bshang ba dang bcas par lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin du dbugs kyi rgyu ba legs par 'byung bar 'gyur na/_'jam rtsi'i sbyor ba legs pa yin no/_/bad kan la ni mas gtong ba'i/_/'jam rtsi gcig gam gsum gtang bya/_/mkhris
[\[228a.3\]]pa la ni lnga 'am bdun/_/rlung la dgu 'am bcu gcig gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi nad la ni mas gtong ba'i snum gyi 'jam rtsi gcig gam gsum zhig gtang bar bya'o/_/mkhris ba'i nad la ni 'jam rtsi lnga'am bdun gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i nad la ni dgu'am bcu gcig gtang
[\[228a.4\]]bar bya'o/_/slar yang de las zung min pa/_/mas gtong rjes la bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan shas che ba'i nad la gcig gam gsum btang bas sbyor ba legs pa'i mtshan nyid ma byung na yang mas gtong ba de'i rjes la bya la/_de yang zung ma them par bya ste/_gcig dang gsum dang lnga
[\[228a.5\]]dang bdun dang dgu dang /_bcu gcig la sogs pa ni zung ma yin no/_/gnyis dang bzhi dang drug dang brgyad la sogs pa ni zung ste/_zung ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar 'jam rtsi btang ba'i rjes la sbyor ba legs par gyur na yang mas gtong ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/
[\[228a.6\]]bad mkhris rlung la rim bzhin zas/_/yu sha 'o ma sha khu gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi nad dang ldan pa la ni/_de'i zas yu sha ste sran mung+ga'i khu ba la sogs pa g.yos byas pa dang lhan cig gtang bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa'i nad yod pa la ni zas 'o ma dang lhan cig gtang bar bya'o/_/
[\[228a.7\]]rlung gi nad yod pa la ni zas sha khu dang lhan cig gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung 'joms sman ni legs bskol ba/_/dur byid rgyam tshar bcas par bya/_/snum mngar skyur sha khu dron sbyar/_/mas gtong gcig ni rlung la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung nad la ni mas gtong gcig tu bshad/_de yang
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rlung 'joms pa'i sman ni bi da ri la sogs pa legs par bskol ba las byas pa dur byid dang /_rgyam tsha gnyis kyi lde gu dang bcas shing sbyar ba dang /_de bzhin du til mar la sogs pa'i snum dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du sman mngar ba dang skyur ba dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du sha khu
[\[228b.2\]]dron po dang sbyar ba'i mas gtong bas rlung sel bar byed pa yin no/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan bskol/_/shug sogs kha ra dkar dang bcas/_/mngar bsil bu ram shing khu mar/_/'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas mkhris sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa'i nad la ni mas gtong ba gnyis te/_n+ya gro
[\[228b.3\]]d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba dang /_shug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan khar dkar po'i lde gu dang bcas pa la de bzhin du mngar ba dang bsil ba dang /_bu ram shing gi khu ba dang mar dang /_'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa gnyis kyis mkhris pa sel bar byed pa yin no/_/dong ga la
[\[228b.4\]]sogs bskol ba dang /_/dug mo nyung sogs bcas pa gsum/_/rtsub dang sbrang rtsi ba gcin bcas/_/rno zhing dro kha bad kan sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi skabs su mas gtong ba gsum yod de/_dong ga bskol ba'i dug mo yungs la sogs pa'i lde gu dang bcas pa gsum la/_
[\[228b.5\]]de bzhin du rtsub pa dang sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang bcas pa rno ba dang /_kha ba'i sman rnams so/_/gsum po 'dus pa'i nad la yang /_/gang phyir rim bzhin sel ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa'i nad la ni mas gtong ba gsum nyid du bshad de/_sngar bshad pa'i rlung dang mkhris pa dang
[\[228b.6\]]bad kan sel ba'i gsum po nyid yin par bstan no/_/de yang gang gi phyir mas gtong ba rnams kyis rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rim bzhin du sel zhing 'joms te/_de la mas gtong ba gcig btang bas ni rlung sel te/_gnyis pas ni mkhris pa'o/_/gsum pas ni bad kan no/_/
[\[228b.7\]]gsum po de las gzhan pa yi/_/mas gtong gso zhes gzhan mi 'dod/_/gang phyir slar yang sbyin bya yi/_/nyes pa bzhi po yod ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mas gtong ba gsum po de dag las gzhan pa'i mas gtong ba bzhi par ni gso ba shes shing sman dpyad kyi lung la
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]mkhas pa'i srog 'tsho ba'i slob dpon gzhan dag mi 'dod cing khas len par mi byed de/_gang gi phyir sngar bshad pa'i nad dmigs gsum la mas gtong ba grangs ji lta ba bzhin yin pa'am/_slar yang gang zhig gso bar bya ba'i sbyin pa'i nyes pa'am/_nad bzhi pa yod
[\[229a.2\]]pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/nad bskyod dag par byed pa dang /_/zhi bar bya ba'i rim pa yis/_/mas gtong gsum po nyid brtag ces/_/de skad gzhan dag smra ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pa gzhan dag ni mas gtong ba gsum po nyid du brtag par bya'o/_/zhes de skad smra ba yin te/_
[\[229a.3\]]mas gtong ba gcig ni nad rnams bskyod pa la brtag cing sbyar bar bya'o/_/gnyis pa ni nad rnams dag par byed pa yin no/_/gsum pa ni nad rnams zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/de ltar nad bskyod cing bsdu ba dang /_nad sbyong zhing dag par byed pa dang /_nad rnams zhi bar byed pas
[\[229a.4\]]na zhi ba ste/_de ltar gsum yin no zhes zer ro/_/nad dang sman sogs stobs las ni/_/'di dag thams cad tshad mas gzhal/_/zhes bya ba la/_slob dpon la la ni gzhung tshad ma can yin la/_la la'i gzhung tshad ma med pa ni ma yin te/_gzhan du na thams cad tshad mas
[\[229a.5\]]gzhal ba yin no/_/ji lta zhe na/_nad dang nad sman sogs las ni/_/zhes bya ba ste/_nad kyi stobs la sman gyi stobs las dpags pa yin te/_sogs pa'i sgras ni yul dang dus dang lus kyi stobs dang lus tshad dang kha zas dang goms pa dang snying stobs dang /_rang bzhin gyi
[\[229a.6\]]stobs kyi nus pa las dpags pa yin te/_gzhung 'di ni kun la kha bskang dgos pa'i lhag ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/gang gso ba shes pa'i slob dpon mas gtong ba gzhan du 'dod pa de thams cad kyi gzhung yang 'di nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no/_/bkru sman
[\[229a.7\]]drag btang legs mtshan ma/_/ma mthong bar du 'phro mi bcad/_/ces bya ba la/_ji srid bkru sman drag po btang ba'i mtshan ma legs par ma mthong zhing /_ma byung ba de srid kyi bar du ni ru ha btang ba'i 'phro bcad par mi bya ste/_de na ji srid mtshan ma legs par mthong bar gyur
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pa de srid kyi bar du bkru sman drag po gtang bar bya'o/_/zhes ston pa yin no/_/'di dag ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste/_'jam rtsi gtong ba'i tshe na yang ji srid 'jam rtsi legs par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ma byung ba de srid kyi bar du mas gtong ba 'phro mi bcad kyi/_de byung gi bar du 'jam rtsi gtang
[\[229b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/gang nye bar mtshon pa tsam du gzhan pa 'di 'jam rtsi la yang bya ba'i phyir/_gzhung rtsom par byed pas 'dir yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa las 'di skad smras pa yin te/_dang por snum gcig tha mar lnga/_/bkru sman drag po bcu gnyis te/_/'jam rtsir bcas pa mas gtong
[\[229b.3\]]ba'i/_/las ni sum cur bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dang drug pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_bcu pa dang bcu gnyis pa dang /_bcu bzhi pa dang /_bcu drug pa dang /_bcwa brgyad pa dang /_nyi shu pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzhes
[\[229b.4\]]bya ba dang /_de bzhin du bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba bcu gnyis te/_gsum pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_bcu gcig pa dang /_bcu gsum pa dang /_bco lnga pa dang /_bcu bdun pa dang /_bcu dgu pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa gsum pa dang /_nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes
[\[229b.5\]]bya ba dang /_'jam rtsir bcas pa zhes bya ba ste/_cho ga 'dis ni mas gtong ba'i las sum cur bshad pa yin no/_/dus ni bco lnga 'dir gcig ni/_/thog ma'i snum ste tha mar gsum/_/dugs dang mas gtong lnga par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mas gtong ba'i dus ni bcwa lnga ste/_ji lta zhe
[\[229b.6\]]na/_thog mar te dang po snum gyi gcig dang /_mtha' ma snum gyi lan gsum ste/_bcu gsum pa dang /_bcu bzhi pa/_bcwa lnga pa dang /_de bzhin du sman drug ste/_gnyis pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_drug pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_bcu pa dang /_bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba dang /_ji lta bu zhe na/_
[\[229b.7\]]mas gtong ba'i 'jam rtsi lnga ste/_gsum pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_bcu gcig pa zhes bya bas bar du bcad cing chod pa'i bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba ste/_de ltar na mas gtong ba'i dus bcwa lnga yin no/_/mas gtong sbyor 'dir brgyad yin te/_/ni ru ha dang snum
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]gsum dang /_/thog ma tha ma gnyi ga'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mas gtong ba'i sbyor ba 'dir brgyad yin te/_sbyor ba 'di thog ma dang tha ma gnyi ga ste/_dang po dang brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i snum gyi las dang /_ni ru ha gsum ste/_gnyis pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_drug pa dang /_snum
[\[230a.2\]]gsum ste/_gsum pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_bdun pa zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar na spyir brgyad ni sbyor ba yin no/_/'jam rtsi'am bkru sman mas gtong drag_/gcig pu lhag par bsten mi bya/_/'jam rtsis nad glongs me drod 'joms/_/ni ru has rlung skyed 'jigs yod/_/de bas snum rjes
[\[230a.3\]]bkru drag gtang /_/khrus drag btang nas 'jam rtsi bya/_/de ltar rim pas snum sbyang bya/_/mas gtong las ni nyes gsum sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar na ni ru ha ste bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba'i thog mar 'jam rtsi bya la/_de'i 'og tu bkru sman drag po mas gtang bar bya la/_de'i
[\[230a.4\]]'og tu 'jam rtsi'i rgyun mi 'chad par ni ru ha gcig pu bsten par mi bya zhing /_'jam rtsi 'ba' zhig rgyun mi 'chad par ha cang drags par mi bya zhing /_bsten par mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir 'jam rtsi rgyun du bsten drags pas ni/_nad glongs pas khams 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /_de
[\[230a.5\]]bzhin du me'i drod 'joms pas pho ba'i me drod kyis zas 'ju mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ni ru ha bsten drags pas rlung nad skyed par byed do/_/rlung gi nad ldang ba'i 'jigs pa yod do zhes bya ba'i don no/_/de bas na bkru sman drag po mas gtong bar bya ba'i skyes bu la ni/_'jam rtsi gsum
[\[230a.6\]]gyi sbyor ba mas gtong bar bya la/_gang 'jam rtsi bya ba de la ni bkru sman drag po gtang bar bya dgos te/_nad glongs pa dang me drod 'joms pa des bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na rigs pa 'di'i rim pas snum gyi mas gtang ba byas pa dang /_de'i 'og tu ni ru ha bya la/_de
[\[230a.7\]]lta bu'i sbyang ba byas nas/_mas gtong ba'i las des nad gzhi gsum gyi nyes pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/snum gyi tshad ni chung ngu yi/_/tshad dang de ni mnyam byas pa'i/_/snum tshad 'jam rtsi'i tshad du bshad/_/de ni byis rgan lam dang khur/_/bud med rtsol zhen pas du ba dang /_/rlung
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]nad kyis gzhom me drod chung /_/rgyal po phyug po la bde ba/_/yin pas rtag tu bsten par bya/_/nad 'joms yang ba med pa dang /_/stobs skyed bshang ba bde bar 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_snum las zhun mar 'ba' zhig btung ba'i chung ngu thun gnyis kyis 'ju bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan
[\[230b.2\]]nyid can gyi tshad dang mnyam par byas pa'i snum gyi tshad/_'jam rtsi'i tshad du bshad de/_de ni 'jam rtsi'i chung tshad ces bya ba la tshad de ni byis pa dang rgan po la sogs pas dus rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsten cing goms par bya'o/_/de bsten cing goms par byed pa ni nad med
[\[230b.3\]]par byed pa dang /_bde ba yin pas byis pa la sogs pa la yang gtong du rung bas goms par spyad par bya'o/_/de bzhin du nad 'joms pa ste/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan yang 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du yang 'di ni yang ba med par byed pa dang /_kha lag chu dron
[\[230b.4\]]gyis bkru zhing /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis sngar bshad pa'i 'dam ga mi dgos pa yin la/_de nyid kyis na byis pa la sogs pa la bde ba'i bdag nyid can yin no/_/de bzhin du stobs skyed par byed pa yin te/_nus pa skyed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du bshang ba bde bar 'byung
[\[230b.5\]]bar byed pa yin no/_/gang zhig btang bas bshang ba bde blag tu 'byung bar byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/mas gtong bud med ro smad kyi/_/mngal dang mo mtshan nad rnams la/_/bkrus drags gnyis gsum gyis dag par/_/mas gtong gong mas gtong bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[230b.6\]]'dir mas gtong ba'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyogs gcig 'bab pa'i phyogs nas gtang ba ste/_de ni gcin sri ba la sogs pa'i nad gang dag yod pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang ma ning gi mtshan nas gtang ba gong ma gtang bar bya'o/_/de dag thams cad kyang lan gnyis sam
[\[230b.7\]]lan gsum du bkru sman drag po mas gtong bas dag cing skyon bsal ba la/_mas gtong ba gong ma gtang bar bya'o/_/de yi gce'u nad pa yi/_/sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya/_/snum zhing ba lang mjug ma 'dra/_/rtsa ba dbus su gag pa gdags/_/rtse mo yungs kar shong
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]ba tsam/_/'jam pa gser la sogs las byas/_/kun da sri zhing so ma na/_/me tog rtse mo ltar zlum phra/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i zhes bya ba ni/_'das ma thag pa'i mas gtong ba gong ma la snyegs te/_de'i gce'u ni nad pa gang yin pa'i tshad kyis gzhal la/_de yang sor
[\[231a.2\]]bcu gnyis su bya'o/_/de bzhin du zlum pa dang /_ba lang gi mjug ma ltar rtse mo rim gyis phra ba dang /_de bzhin du rtsa ba dang /_dbus te bar du gag pa gdags par bya ste/_'dir gag pa gcig ni dbus su bya/_de yang tshad nang du nub pa'i tshad las thal bar gags byed nus pa tsam la/_
[\[231a.3\]]gnyis pa rtsa bar gnas par bya ba ni rkyal bu la gdags pa la sogs pa yin no/_/yang de bzhin du de'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad yungs kar shong ba tsam la bya'o/_/'jam bag ni rtsub bag med pa'o/_/gser la sogs pa las byas pa ni mas gtong ba dag gi tshe rgyu dang mtshungs par bya'o/_/
[\[231a.4\]]de bzhin du me tog kun da la sogs pa'i rtse mo kha ma phye ba ltar byin gyis phra zhing zlum pa'o/_/gang la me tog dang 'bras bu chags pa'i de'i rtsa ba phra mo ste de la bya'o/_/de yi rkyal bu 'jam zhing yang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mas gtong ba gong ma de'i rkyal bu ni/_ra skyes la sogs pa'i
[\[231a.5\]]lgang pa 'jam zhing mnyen la yang zhing chung ngu gdags par bya'o/_/tshad srang phyed dam gang rigs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jam rtsi gong ma de'i tshad ni snum gtong ba na srang phyed bya ba'am gang rigs par bya ba ste/_nad la sogs pa'i tshad las dpags nas ji ltar 'os pa bya ba ste/_
[\[231a.6\]]des na nad kyi tshod las dpags te/_srang phyed pas chung bar yang bya'o zhes bya ba'i don no/_/de nas khrus byas zan zos la/_/'jam rtsi gtong ba'i cho ga bya/_/khri stegs pus mnyam 'jam pa la/_/drang zhing bde bar 'dug nas ni/_/pho mtshan bteg cing drang bar bya/_/
[\[231a.7\]]sbubs sbyang phyir ni thur ma ni/_/'jam pa rim gyis gzhug par bya/_/de dag pho mtshan dang 'tsham pa/_/'bras bu'i mthar thug par btang ba/_/mi 'dar 'jam rtsi gtong ltar bya/_/btsir te btang la snum rjes bya/_/'jam rtsi'i rim pa bzhin du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]tu legs par khrus byas shing zan ran par zos pa'i skyes bu de'i pho mtshan du dang por thur ma phra mo bcug la/_de'i 'og tu gce'u gzhug par bya'o/_/'jam rtsi gtong ba'i chogs bya ba ste/_sngar bshad pa'i mas gtong ba'i chogs bya ba'o/_/de bzhin du khri'i stegs pus mo dang
[\[231b.2\]]dpangs mnyam zhing 'jam pa'i steng du/_drang zhing lus ma yo bar bde bar 'dug pa de bzhin du pho mtshan dga' bas bteg cing ldang bar byas la/_drang zhing ma yo bar byas nas gci ba'i lam gyi sbubs dag par bya ba'i phyir thur ma 'jam po rim gyis dal bar gzhug par bya'i/_
[\[231b.3\]]cig car gzhug par mi bya'o/_/de nas thur ma des pho mtshan gyi sbubs dag par byas pa'i rjes la/_pho mtshan dang 'tsham pa'i gce'u 'bras bu'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gtang bar bya la/_de yang lag pa mi 'dar bar mjug mar 'jam rtsi gtong ba dang tshul 'dra bar byas la btsir
[\[231b.4\]]ba dang /_btang ba dang snum gyi rjes la bya ba dag ni/_'jam rtsi'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya ba 'di la phan pa yin no/_/de yi rim pa 'di yin te/_/btang nas lus ni gan rkyal gzhag_/rkub tsos lag pas brdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/mas gtong
[\[231b.5\]]cho ga 'di yis ni/_/gsum mam bzhi yi bar du gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga 'dis mas gtong ba'i cho ga gong ma lan gsum bzhi'i bar du gtang bar bya'o/_/lhag ma 'jam rtsi ji lta bar/_/'di la thams cad sbyar bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_cho ga
[\[231b.6\]]thams cad 'jam rtsi dang 'dra bar bya ba ste/_sbyor ba legs pa dang sbyor ba ma legs pa dang /_sbyor ba drags pa dang /_de bzhin du de'i gnod pa bsal ba'i sman la sogs pa gang dag yin pa 'di la yang sbyar bar bya zhing shes par byas la brtag par bya'o/_/bud
[\[231b.7\]]med zla mtshan dus su ni/_/mngal bye ba las chags par 'gyur/_/de phyir de tshe gtang bar bya/_/rab na dus min par yang gtang /_/mo mtshan nyams dang gzer ba dang /_/mngal khrag rtag tu 'byung gtang ba/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]dus su 'jam rtsi gong ma gtang bar bya'o/_/zla mtshan dang po 'dzag pa nas zhag bcu gnyis kyi bar du bud med kyi zla mtshan gyi dus yin te/_dus de'i bar du de'i mas gtong ba'i las bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_dus de'i tshe mas gtong ba gong ma nas snum gtang ba
[\[232a.2\]]gang yin pa de mngal bye bas der chags par 'gyur zhing len par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe bud med gyi mngal gyi kha bye nas gnas pa yin no/_/de ji ltar de'i tshe mngal chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du mas gtong ba yang de'i tshe chags kyi gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin no/_/de yang gzhung las dper
[\[232a.3\]]na nyi ma nub gyur na dus ma yin te/_zla mtshan rgyu ba'i dus ma yin yang mas gtong ba gong ma gtang bar bya'o/_/mo mtshan nyams par gyur pa la sogs pa la yang gtang bar bya ste/_mo mtshan nyams pa las ni gnas de las 'chugs shing zhig pa'o/_/de bzhin du mngal
[\[232a.4\]]na ba ste/_mngal gyi nad rnams mang po 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du mo mtshan gzer zhing zug pa dang /_de bzhin du mngal nas rtag tu khrag 'dzag cing /_kha dog sna tshogs pa'i khrag dus ring por 'dzag pa'i nad ni/_mngal khrag rtag tu 'byung ba ste/_de la yang gtang bar bya'o/_/
[\[232a.5\]]gce'u sor bcu rtse mo yi/_/bu ga mung+ga shong sor bzhi/_/mngal gyi gnas su gtang bar bya/_/sor gnyis gcin 'bab lam du gtang /_/gcin 'gags pa yi nad rnams la/_/bu mo rnams la sor gcig gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal chags su rung ba'i bud med thams
[\[232a.6\]]cad dang /_chags su mi rung ba'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mas gtong ba'i gong ma'i gce'u tshad ni spyir sor bcu bya'o/_/gcin 'gags pa'i nad yod pa'i bu mo shin tu chung ngu rnams la gcin 'bab pa'i lam du sor gcig gtang bar bya zhing gzhug par bya'o/_/'bring tshad srang ni
[\[232a.7\]]gcig pa ste/_/bu mo rnams la srang phyed nyid/_/ces bya ba la/_bud med rnams kyi mas gtong gong ma'i 'bring tshad ni srang phyed bya'o/_/bu mo rnams te bu mo chung ngu rnams kyi 'bring tshad ni srang phyed nyid yin no/_/mal du gan rkyal 'dug nas ni/_/brla ni legs
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]par bskum nas su/_/pus mo brtod de nyin zhag ni/_/gcig la lan gsum lan bzhi btang /_/de ltar mas gtong zhag gsum la/_/snum gyi tshad ni bskyed par bya/_/de nas zhag gsum ngal bso nas/_/slar yang zhag gsum gtong bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud
[\[232b.2\]]med de mal du gan rkyal du byas te/_'dug cing gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du brla legs par bskum pa dang /_pus mo legs par brtod de/_de la nyin zhag gcig la lan gsum mam lan bzhi'i bar du mas gtong ba gong ma bya'o/_/de bzhin du zhag gnyis sam gsum gyi
[\[232b.3\]]rim gyis ci rigs par nyin re zhing snum chad bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas zhag gsum ngal bso zhing 'phro bcad la/_slar yang cho ga 'di nyid kyis zhag gsum gtong bar bya'o/_/skyug sman byas zla phyed bkru sman/_/de nas zla phyed nas bkru drag_/bkrus drag 'phral la 'jam
[\[232b.4\]]rtsi gtang /_/khrus btang zhag bdun nas 'jam rtsi/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngon du skyug sman byas nas zla ba phyed 'das pa dang /_bkru sman bya'o/_/de nas bkru sman btang ba'i zla ba phyed nas bkru sman drag po gtang bar bya'o/_/bkru sman drag po mas gtong ba bya ste/_'phral
[\[232b.5\]]de ring por mi thogs par 'jam rtsi btang ngo /_/bkru sman btang nas zhag bdun lon nas 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya ste/_de ltar na bkru sman btang ba dang /_ni ru ha gtong ba'i bar du 'jim rtsi gtang ngo /_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/dper na le brgan sogs btsos pa'i/_/
[\[232b.6\]]gos ni chu las tshos len ltar/_/de bzhin bangs par byas lus la/_/mas gtong bas ni nad rnams 'byin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dper na le brgan rtsi la sogs pa dang bsres pa'i chu la sogs der ras tshos len par byed cing chu 'dor bar byed pa de bzhin du lus snum la sogs
[\[232b.7\]]pas bangs par byas pa las mas gtong bas na nad kyi gnod pa rnams sel zhing 'byin par byed cing lus gnod pa med pa la sbyor bar byed do/_/lus kyi yan lag nang grol dag tu song nad dang /_/gnad dang lus stod yan lag kun khyab nas/_/gang zhig
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]yod pa de las skye ba'i rgyu/_/rlung ma gtogs pa gzhan dag yod ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi yan lag ni khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams nas/_pags pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin du lag ngar la sogs pa'i lus kyi yan lag
[\[233a.2\]]nang grol ma gtogs pa kun la bya'o/_/de bzhin du nang grol gyi phyogs thams cad du khyab cing song ba'i nad dag dang /_de bzhin du gnad dang lus kyi stod na gnas pa'i nad pa'i yan lag dngos su na lus kyi stod yan lag gi gnad thams cad la khyab cing gnas
[\[233a.3\]]pa'i nad gang dag yod pa'i nad de rnams skye ba'i rgyu'am/_'byung ba'i rlung ma gtogs pa gzhan gang yod pa ma yin te/_nad kyi rgyu gnyis pa med do zhes bya ba'i don no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i phyir smras pa ni/_bshang dang bad kan mkhris sogs nad sogs pa/_
[\[233a.4\]]gang phyir 'thor zhing sdud par byed pa yin/_/de ni rab 'phel gyur la zhi bya'i phyir/_/'jam rtsi ma gtogs sman gzhan gang yang med/_/de bas gso ba ma lus las ma btang /_/gso ba'i phyed yin zhes ni la la 'dod/_/de bzhin nad rnying glo bur skyed
[\[233a.5\]]byed la/_/gtar ga khrag dbyung sman nyid 'gyur ba yin/_/rnam pa de gnyis byed pa na/_/'thor zhing sdud par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba dang bad kan mkhris pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni/_bshang ba dang bad kan mkhris pa la sogs
[\[233a.6\]]te/_sogs pa smos pa ni/_lus kyi tshad gtogs pa dngas ma la sogs pa'o/_/de dag nyid kyis ni lus dri ma can du byed pas na nad do/_/de rnams la sogs pa ni bshang ba la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa yin te/_gang gi phyir 'thor zhing rgyas
[\[233a.7\]]par byed la/_nad rnying pa'i tshigs su gnas pa phan tshun 'thor zhing 'byed par byed pa dang /_sdud par yang byed de/_phan tshun 'thor te gnas pa rnams phung po gcig tu byed pa'o/_/de lta bu'i rlung de rab tu 'phel zhing rnam par 'khrugs pa ldang bar
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gyur pa zhi zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dpyad bya na/_'jam rtsi la sogs pa mas gtong ba ma gtogs pa'i sman gzhan dag yod pa ma yin no/_/snum dang dugs gzhan dag yod na yang nus pa chung ba yin no/_/gang gi phyir 'jam rtsi yon tan de lta bu yod
[\[233b.2\]]pa de bas na/_rgyu de'i phyir gso ba ma lus shing mtha' dag las mas gtong ba ni gso ba'am nad bcos pa'i thabs kyi phyed yin no zhes bshad de/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dag gtar ga bya ba'i nad rnams kyang
[\[233b.3\]]rtsa ba nas 'byin to/_/de bas na de las brtsams te/_nad ma lus pa dang rlung gi nad rnams thams cad mas gtong bas gso zhing bcos par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/de'i phyir tshe'i rig byed shes pa'i srog 'tsho ba'i slob dpon gzhan dag ni gso ba'i thabs ma lus
[\[233b.4\]]pa mas gtong bar 'dug pas khas 'che'o/_/la la dag ni mas gtong ba'i gso ba'i phyir yin no/_/zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du gtar gas khrag dbyung ba yang /_nad rnying pa dang glo bur bas btab pa'i nad rnams la gtar gas dbyung ba'i gso ba'i phyed dam/_
[\[233b.5\]]gso ba ma lus par gyur pa yin no/_/zhes zer ro/_/de bzhin du rnying gzhi gnas pa dang /_glo bur ba gsar du byung ba dag la ni nad rnying glo bur ba zhes bya ste/_de dag skyed par byed pa yin pas na skyed byed de/_khrag la bya la de rab tu zhi zhing bsal ba la ni gtar gas
[\[233b.6\]]khrag dbyung zhing khrag 'don pa nyid sman du 'gyur ba yin pas na khrag las gyur pa'i nad kyi gso ba'i phyed dam/_gso ba rangs pa ni gtar gas khrag dbyung ba yin no/_/zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa ste/_mas gtong ba 'ba' zhig gso ba yin par ma zad de/_gtar gas khrag
[\[233b.7\]]dbyung ba yang gso ba phyed dam/_ma lus pa yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]de nas sman sna nas gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/'di brtsams pa'i 'grel pa 'di yin te/_gang gi phyir skyug sman la sogs pas lus kyi nang na yod pa'i nad ji ltar sel bar byed pa de bzhin du sna nas gtang ba'i sman yang sna'i sgo nas btang
[\[234a.2\]]bas lus kyi nang na song ba'i nad de phyir 'byin par byed de/_des skyug sman la sogs pa bzhi po nad phyir 'byin par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du sna nas gtang ba zhes bya ba'i lnga pa yang dag pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no/_/yang na lus ni yan lag thams cad la khyab pa yin pas de gso ba sngar bshad pa
[\[234a.3\]]yin la/_de ni thur mas bcos pa'i rgyud kyi le'u ston pa yin la/_de las 'dir ni sna nas gtong bar byed pa'i sman yin pas na sna sman te/_sna nas sman gtang ba dang sna'i las dang sman sna nas gtang ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob pa yin no/_/de'i cho ga ni 'di ltar bya'o zhes bya ba'i
[\[234a.4\]]tshul te/_de'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don no/_/nam tshong yan chad nad rnams la/_/lhag par sna nas gtang ba phan/_/sna ni glad pa'i sgo yin te/_/des na de nas nad de 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur
[\[234a.5\]]pa gang dag yod pa'i yul de thams cad la lhag pa'am khyad par du sna nas gtang ba phan pa yin no/_/yang der skyug sman la sogs pa'i thabs med pa ma yin mod kyi khyad par ram lhag par sna nas gtang ba mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sna ni glad pa'am mgo bo'i sgo nas
[\[234a.6\]]'jug pa'i gnas de'i rgyu des na sna nas gtang ba zhes pa'i lam de nas sman bsten cing btang na/_rna ba'i gsang gi bar du phyin nas/_glad pa dang /_rna ba dang /_lkog ma la sogs pa'i rtsa'i sgo rnams khyab pas/_nam tshod yan chad kyi nad ma lus pa de 'joms te/_mgor khyab
[\[234a.7\]]pa'i nad sel ba yin no/_/de ni rnam pa gsum ste/_bkru ba dang brta ba dang zhi bar byed pa'o/_/de las kyang bkru ba ni/_/bkru sman glad pa'i nad rnams dang /_blong bag lkog nad mchi ma 'dzag_/skrang dang thor bu srin rmen bu/_/mdze smyo cham pas btab la gtang /_/zhes bya
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ba la/_bkru sman sna nas btang ba ni glad pa'i nad la sogs pa la gtang bar bya'o/_/bkru sman ni mgo bo'i nad bkru zhing sbyang ba'i sman no/_/blong bag ni sems mi gsal ba'o/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa ni mig nas rdzi bor 'byung ba la sogs pa'o/_/srin bus spyi bo dang mtshul bar khyab pa'o/_/
[\[234b.2\]]cham pa ni sna'i nad do/_/brta ba rlung las byung gzer dang /_/glad pa phyed na skad 'gags dang /_/sna dang kha skam tshig mi thon/_/mig dbye dpung pa bskyod dka' gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas btang ba'i sman brta bar bya ba gang yin pa ni/_rlung las byung ba'i mgo bo'i gzer nad
[\[234b.3\]]rnams dang /_de bzhin du nyi ma phyed kyi bar du glad pa na ba dang /_skad 'gags shing nyams pa dang /_de bzhin du kha dang sna skam pa dang /_tshig mi thon zhing skad brda sprod mi nus pa dang /_mig dbye bar dka' ba'i mig nad dang /_de bzhin du rlung gi nad dpung pa bskyod par dka' ba dag
[\[234b.4\]]la btang zhing sbyar bar bya'o/_/zhi ba mig sngon gdong lpags nad/_/skra yi skyon mig dmar la gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas gtang ba zhi bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni/_'og nas rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa'i mig gi nad sngon por gyur pa la sogs pa'i nad la yang gtang
[\[234b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/dang por rang sbyor ji lta'i snum/_/sman gyi lde gu sogs bskol dang /_/shing mngar rgyam tsha chang rnying sogs/_/ci rigs par ni bskol la gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas gtang bar bshad pa'i sman dang po ni rang gi sbyor ba ji lta ba gang dang 'phrod cing 'tsham pa'i
[\[234b.6\]]snum rnon po yungs mar la sogs pa dang ci rigs par bskol zhing mgo bo'i bkru sman rnams dang ci rigs par bskol ba dang /_de bzhin du sman phye dang sman khu la sogs pa mgo bo'i bkru sman las 'brel pa las ci rigs par sla ba dang zhib pa dang /_lde gur bsres shing
[\[234b.7\]]sbyar ba dang /_de bzhin du shing mngar dang rgyam tshwa dang /_chang rnying la sogs pa dang sbyar te/_bskol ba gtang bar bya'o/_/brta ba 'u su'i khu ba dang /_/sha khu khrag dang thang chu sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas gtang ba'i sman brta bar byed pa ni 'u su'i khu ba de bzhin du sha khu dang khrag
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]dang de bzhin du kha pu ra zhes bya ba'i thang chu dang sbyar la gtang bar bya'o/_/'ang zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i sgras ni rang sbyor ba ji lta ba'i snum mngar ba dang /_snum pa'i sman la btsos pa brta ba'i sman sna nas gtang ba las sbyar bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i don to/_/zhi ba
[\[235a.2\]]snga ma 'o ma dang /_/chu dang bcas pa sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas gtang ba'i sman zhi ba ni snga ma zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad pa'i rang gi sbyor ba ji lta ba'i snum dang /_rang gi sman gang dag yin pa'i khu ba la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin du 'o ma dang chu dang bcas pa sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[235a.3\]]tshad can dang ni tshad phran te/_/'di yi snum tshad rnam pa gnyis/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas gtang ba'i sman gsum po 'di la snum gyi sman mar gtang ba'i khyad par gyi tshad ni/_tshad kyi dbye ba las rnam pa gnyis te/_tshad can dang /_tshad med do/_/lde gu la sogs btsir ba yi/_/rno de spyi bo'i
[\[235a.4\]]bkru sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lde gu dang sman bskol ba'i khu ba la sogs pa sbyar ba'i sman ras bal gyi ye'u la sogs pas gtong ba de ni btsir ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re lde gur byas pa'i sman btsos pa las khu ba btsir te/_'dzag par byas pa las bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/btsir
[\[235a.5\]]ba de sman rnon po'i lde gu bskol ba la sogs pas btang ba ni spyi bo'i bkru sman zhes bya'o/_/phye ma bud pa'i bkru sman te/_/sbu gu sor drug kha gnyis pa/_/nang na sman dang bcas pa dag_/kha yi dbugs kyis bus te gtang /_/des ni mgo nad mang po yang /_/phye ma yin bas 'byin
[\[235a.6\]]par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'khru bar 'gyur ba'i sman las sbyar ba'i phye ma ni bud par bya ba yin pas na bud pa'i bkru sman zhes bya ste/_phye ma de kha'i rlung gis bus la sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/gang gis btang zhe na/_sbu gu sor drug yod pa kha gnyis yod pa dang /_de bzhin du nang
[\[235a.7\]]na sman dang bcas shing sman phye ma blugs pa de kha'i dbugs kyis bus te gtang ngo /_/bud pa'i bkru sman des ni mgo bo'i bad kan las byung ba mang po yang phyi nas 'byin cing /_nang nas phyir 'don par byed do/_/mdzub mo'i tshigs ni gnyis pa'i bar/_/smyugs pa phyir phyung gyur pa las/_/
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]thigs pa bcu 'am brgyad dam drug_/ji srid 'dzag par gyur pa dag_/sna nas gtong tshad che 'bring chung /_/rim pa de nyid kyis shes bya/_/lde gu la sogs thigs pa ni/_/gnyis kyis phri ste gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdzub mo ni mthe bong la nye ba'i sor mo ste/_de'i tshigs
[\[235b.2\]]gnyis kyi bar du/_dang po smyugs shing spyings la phyir phyung ste/_bteg par gyur pa las thigs pa'i tshad ji tsam zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la thigs pa zhes bya la/_thigs pa de las snum gyi tshad che chung du bya ba ni thigs pa bcu ni che tshad yin la/_thigs pa brgyad
[\[235b.3\]]ni 'bring tshad la/_thigs pa drug ni chung tshad do/_/tshad 'di dag nyid las che dang 'bring dang chung ngu ni rim gyis thigs pa gnyis kyis chung zhing phra ba'i lde gu la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba snar blugs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/chu dang chang dang sbyar dug mar/_/'thung ba'am
[\[235b.4\]]'thung bar 'dod pa dang /_/kha zas 'dod dang mgo bkrus dang /_/'khru bar 'dod dang gtar ga byas/_/cham sar shugs 'ongs kyis gzir dang /_/bu btsas lung pa dbugs mi bde/_/sbyang byas mas gtong cho ga byas/_/de bzhin dus min yul rmugs la/_/sna
[\[235b.5\]]sman gtang bar mi bya ste/_/tshabs che'i nad sogs ma gtogs so/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman sna nas byar mi rung ba ni chu dang chang dang dug dang mar 'thungs pa nas/_mas gtong ba'i cho ga byas pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i yul rmugs pa la gtang bar mi bya ste/_dus ma
[\[235b.6\]]yin pa'i yul rmugs pa ni dbyar ma gtogs pa'i dus gzhan gyi tshe/_yul rmugs shing rlung dang grang lhags dang char 'bab par 'khrigs pa'i nyin mo ni dus min yul rmugs zhes bya'o/_/ci de dag gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du gtang bar mi bya'am zhes rtogs na/_de'i phyir
[\[235b.7\]]smras pa ni/_tshabs chen nad sogs ma gtogs so/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/de gso bar byed pa'i nad tshabs po che ma gtogs te/_nad tshabs che ba'i tshe na ni chu dang chang dang dug dang mar la sogs pa 'thungs su zin kyang gtang bar bya'o/_/zhes bya bar sbyar ro/_/des na dus
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]gang gi tshe sna nas btang bas smin par bya zhe na/_/de nas sna nas sman btang ba/_/bad kan nad par mkhris nyin phyed/_/rlung can phyi 'phred mtshan mo gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni/_bkra shis pa ston par byed pa yin par
[\[236a.2\]]sbyar ro/_/de la sna sman gtang ba'i dus ni bad kan nam/_bad kan las gyur pa'i nad ni bad kan gyi dus nang par gyi tshe nyid sna nas gtang ba'i sman gtang bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa 'khrugs sam de las byung ba'i nad rnams la mkhris pa'i dus nyi ma phyed kyi tshe gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung
[\[236a.3\]]gi nad dam/_de las byung ba'i nad rnams la rlung ldang ba'i dus phyi 'phred de/_phyi dro dang mtshan mo'i dus su sman sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/nad med pa la ston ka dang /_/dpyid kyi tshe na snga dro gtang /_/dgun ni phyed dus so ga'i tshe/_/phyi 'phred dbyar ni nyi dron bcas/_/
[\[236a.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_nad med cing tha mal par gnas pa la ni ston ka dang dpyid ka'i tshe snga dro ste/_nyi ma'i snga dro'i cha la gtang bar bya'o/_/nad med par gnas pa la dgun gyi tshe ste/_dgun stod dang /_dgun smad grang ba'i dus su ni/_nyi ma phyed la sman sna nas gtang bar
[\[236a.5\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin du so ga'i tshe ni phyi 'phred de phyi dro'i dus su ni sman sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dbyar gyi nyi ma dron po dang bcas pa'i skabs su nad med pa la sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/glad pa rlung nad kyis thebs dang /_/skyigs bus btab dang mgo 'dar
[\[236a.6\]]dang /_/gnye'u rengs skad ni 'gags pa la/_/nyin re nang par dgongs ka gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_glad par rlung nad zhugs shing mgo bo rlung gi nad kyis thebs pa dang /_de bzhin du mgo 'dar zhing 'dar ba zhes bya ba'i rlung gi mgo nad dang /_gnye'u rengs shing
[\[236a.7\]]'gyur mi shes pa dang /_skad 'gags shing skad gdangs nyams pa la/_nyin re zhing nang par dgongs ka ste/_snga dro dang phyi dro sna nas sman gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhan la nyin res bar bcad la/_/nyi ma bdun du de spyad bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_glad pa gang nad kyis thebs pa dang /_
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]skad 'gags shing skad la sogs pa'i nad ma gtogs pa gzhan dag la ni/_nyin re zhing sna nas gtang ba'i sman mi bya'o/_gzhan du na nyin re res bar bcad pa ste/_nyi ma re res bar bcad cing thag chod par byas la/_sman gtang bar bya ste/_tshul 'di lta bus sna nas gtang
[\[236b.2\]]ba'i sman zhag bdun gyi bar du gtang bar bya zhing spyad par bya'o/_/rtag tu bya ba'i las byas nas/_/dang por mgo snum bsku dugs byas/_/rlung med mal du gnas nas ni/_/nam tshong yan chad dugs kyang bya/_/de nas gan rkyal lus drang brkyang /_/rkang pa lag pa legs
[\[236b.3\]]brkyang la/_/rkang pa cung zad bstod nas su/_/mgo bo yid tsam smad par bya/_/sna bug gcig ni rab bkag la/_/rim gyis yongs su blugs bya ba/_/sman ni chu dron gyis bsros la/_/sbu gu'am ras bal gyis blugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas sna nas gtang ba la 'os
[\[236b.4\]]pa'i skyes bus/_rtag tu bya ba la sogs bshang ba dang gci ba dang por byas la/_yang dang por mgo bo snum gyis bskus la/_de'i 'og tu mgo bo'i dugs ran pa tsam byas pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung med pa'i gnas su mal bting ba la gnas shing 'dug nas/_nam tshong yan
[\[236b.5\]]chad dugs kyang byas la/_de nas de'i 'og tu gan rkyal du 'dug ste/_lus drang zhing ma yo bar brkyang la/_rkang pa dang lag pa yang legs par brkyang bar gyur pa dang /_sna nas sman gtang bar bya'o/_/yang de bzhin du de'i rkang pa cung zad bstod de/_gang gi rkang
[\[236b.6\]]pa mtho bar gyur pa de lta bur khri la sogs pa bca' bar bya'o/_/de nyid kyis na mgo bo yang yid tsam smad par gyur pa dang /_sna khung gcig bkag cing bcad la/_sna khung gnyis pa gdangs shing phye ste/_gnas pa la sna nas gtang ba'i sman blugs par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sna khung
[\[236b.7\]]gnyis par yang rim gyis sna sman sbu gu mchu can nam/_srin bal gyi ye'us blugs par bya'o/_/blugs nas rkang mthil phrag pa dang /_/lag pa rna ba la sogs mnye/_/rim gyis brngubs la glo gnyis su/_/mchil mdor ba de nas ni/_/sman ni zad par gyur gyi bar/_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]lan gnyis lan gsum snar btang spyad/_/ces bya ba la/_der sman blugs pa dang /_rkang mthil dang phrag pa dang /_lag pa dang rna ba la mnye bar bya zhing /_de nas de'i 'og tu rim gyis brngubs la/_glo g.yas g.yon gnyis su
[\[237a.2\]]mchil ma dor bar bya'o/_/de nas sna g.yas nas bcug pa'i sman brngubs pa'i mchil ma g.yon logs su dor bar bya la/_g.yon gyi ni g.yas su'o/_/de ltar 'dis sman sna nas gtang ba la lan gnyis lan gsum du spyad par bya'o/_/gal te brgyal gyur
[\[237a.3\]]bsil ba'i chus/_/mgo bo ma gtogs gtor bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman sna nas gtong ba na/_gal te brgyal zhing mi dran par gyur te/_sman gyi stobs ma goms pas brgyal bar gyur te/_mgo bo ma gtogs par gzhan du chu bsil bas kyang gtor bar bya'o/_/
[\[237a.4\]]bkru sman 'og tu snum dag ni/_/nad sogs tshul las dpags te gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sna sman btang ba'i bkru sman byas pa'i 'og tu/_sna nas gtang ba snum pa gtang bar bya'i/_rtsub pa ni ma yin la/_de yang nad la sogs pa'i tshul las dpags shing
[\[237a.5\]]shes par byas la/_de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sman til mar la sogs pa gang yang rung ba gtang bar bya'o/_/sna sman btang mthar gan rkyal du/_/grangs brgyar de la bsdad par bya/_/dud pas brngubs la chu dron 'jam/_/gre ba mtshul pa dag phyir bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[237a.6\]]skyes bu sna nas sman byas shing btang zin nas/_mthar gan rkyal du grangs brgya rdzogs kyi bar du bsdad par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phan par byed cing rjes su mthun pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dud pa brngubs la/_chu cung zad dro ba 'jam po mkhur bar bcang ba gre ba dang mtshul pa
[\[237a.7\]]dag pa'i phyir ro/_/snum btang legs gyur dbugs bde rgyu/_/gnyid log sad de dbang po gsal/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la spyir snum btang ba legs par gyur na dbugs bde bar 'byin pa sngon du 'gro bas dbugs rgyu ba dang /_de bzhin du bde bar gnyid log cing bde
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bar sad pa dang /_dbang po rnams bde zhing rnam par gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/nyes pas mgo rtsub mi 'gyur skam/_/sna dang kha skam klad stong snyam/_/zhes bya ba la/_snum gyi sna sman nyes pas mgo rtsub cing mi 'gyur bar har har por 'dug par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[237b.2\]]skam pa dang /_de bzhin du sna dang kha skam par 'gyur ba dang /_klad pa stong pa snyam sems par 'gyur ro/_/snum drags g.yan dang lci ba nyid/_/mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/zhes bya ba la/_spyi bor sna nas snum btang drags par gyur na/_shin tu g.ya' bar
[\[237b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_mgo lci ba nyid dang /_mchil ma dang snabs mang ba dang /_cham pas 'debs shing yi ga 'chus par 'gyur ro/_/legs bkrus mig gsal yang ba dang /_/kha dang skad ni dag par 'gyur/_/'khrus nyes nad ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/bkrus drags
[\[237b.4\]]khong ni rmya bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo bo'i bkru sman legs shing sbyor ba phyin ci ma log par gyur na/_mig gsal zhing yang ba dang /_kha dang skad gdangs dag cing gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo de'i bkru sman nyes shing ma legs par gyur na/_nad kyi
[\[237b.5\]]dkyel 'phel zhing slar sogs par 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo'i khrus shin tu drags par gyur na/_khong rmya zhing nyam chung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad chung glo rdol rid pa dang /_/byis pa rgan po skyid par gnas/_/dus min char 'bab par yang gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas
[\[237b.6\]]gtang ba'i sman tshad chung ngu ni/_glo rdol ba la sogs pa la yang gtang bar bya la/_de bzhin du dus ma yin par yul rmugs pa la yang gtang du rung ngo /_/de la glo rdol ba ni glo nas khrag byung ba'am/_brang gi sha zad pa'o/_/rid pa ni mi ro skam po ltar skem pa'o/_/byis pa ni lo
[\[237b.7\]]bcu drug man chad do/_/rgan po ni bdun cu yan chad lon pa'o/_/skyid par gnas pa ni rtag tu bde zhing gzhon sha can du gnas pa'o/_/de ni cham pas drag btab dang /_/chang 'thungs rna ba 'on pa dang /_/glad rgyas srin bu zhugs pa dang /_/nad bsdus phyir ni ma phyung la/_tshad chung ba
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ni gtang mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nas gtang ba'i sman tshad chung ngu de ni cham pa drag pos btab pa dang /_de bzhin du chang 'thungs pa ste/_gang gis dus de nyid kyi tshe 'thungs pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba 'on zhing sgra 'dzin pa la zhen pa dang /_de bzhin du glad
[\[238a.2\]]rgyas la srin bu zhugs pa dang /_de bzhin du nad mang po khong du bsdus pa'am/_spyir nad mang bar gyur pa dang /_nad bsdus nas phyir ma byung bar gyur pa la yang gtang bar mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir tshad chen po nas chung ba ni dman pa nyid yin pa'i phyir nus pa chung ba yin no/_/
[\[238a.3\]]nyin mtshan zas zos slon gnyid nyal/_/mtha' dang bud med la mngal dub/_/mgo bskus mkhur bkang dbo ba'i rjes/_/bshang gci mig sman btang rjes dang /_/so shing gi rjes dgod pa yi/_/rjes la thigs pa gnyis pa gtang /_/lnga yis dbang po'i bu ga
[\[238a.4\]]dag_/gsum gyis rim bzhin ngal ba sel/_/lnga bos mig ni gsal bar byed/_/so brtan rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshad chung ngu btang ba'i dus ni bcwa lnga pa 'di dag ste/_mtshan mo zas zos pa'i rjes la sogs pa la gtang bar bya la/_tshad chung
[\[238a.5\]]ngu 'di ni thigs pa gnyis te/_lan gnyis thigs pa'i tshad yin la/_de yang dang po'i lnga'i mtha' mar btang na bu ga rnams sbyangs shing dag par byed de/_de yang mtshan mo'i mtha' dang /_zas zos pa'i mtha' dang /_slon pa'i mtha' dang /_nyin par nyal ba'i
[\[238a.6\]]mthar btang na dbang po'i bu ga rnams gsal zhing dag par 'gyur ro/_/gsum gyis rim bzhin ngal ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la ni/_bud med kyis dub pa'i mtha' dang lam gyis dub pa'i mtha' dang /_ngal chad pa'i mtha' ste/_mtha' gsum por btang na ngal ba de gsum
[\[238a.7\]]sel bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga btang mig ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo bkrus pa'i rjes dang /_mkhur ba bkang nas pho ba'i rjes dang /_bshang ba btang ba'i rjes dang /_gci ba btang ba'i rjes dang /_mig sman btang ba'i rjes la btang na mig gsal zhing
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/so shing zos pa'i rjes la btang na so brtan par 'gyur ro/_/dgod pa'i rjes la thigs pa gnyis btang na rlung zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/sna sman lo bdun ma lon dang /_/brgyad cu 'das la gtang mi bya/_/bco brgyad ma lon dud mi bdug_/
[\[238b.2\]]mkhur bkang lnga ma lon la min/_/lo bcu ma lon sbyang mi gtang /_/bdun cu 'das la'ang mi bya'o/_/skyes nas rgas pa'i bar du ni/_/tshad chung mas gtong lta bur bsngags/_/de ni rtag tu bsten gyur na/_/tshad che ba ltar yon tan skyed/_/'di la bdam pa gang yang med/_/
[\[238b.3\]]gnod las tshad chen ltar 'jigs med/_/ces bya ba la/_sman sna nas gtang ba ni/_byis pa lo bdun ma lon pa dang /_lo brgyad cu yan chad 'das pa'i nad pa la gtang bar mi bya'o/_/bco brgyad ma lon dud mi bdug_/ces bya ba ni/_mi lo bco brgyad ma lon pa man chad
[\[238b.4\]]ni dud pas bdug pa'i sman gtang bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du mkhur ba bkang nas dbo ba'i sman yang lo lnga ma lon pa man chad la gtang bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du lo bcu ma lon pa la bkru sman gyis sbyang ba mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du lo bdun cu yan chad 'das pa'i na tshod
[\[238b.5\]]dang ldan pa la sbyang ba mi bya'o/_/dgag pa 'di bkru sman btang ba'i skabs yin par shes par bya'o/_/skyug sman ni ma yin te byis pa ni phal cher 'o ma dang mar za bas bad kan las byung ba'i nad yod pas na nad thams cad bkru sman bsngags pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa'i
[\[238b.6\]]phyir ro/_/yang tshad rab tu chung ba thigs pa gnyis pa ni 'di ni skyes nas zhes bya ba byis pa lo gcig ma lon pa nas/_'chi ba nas rgas pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar la tshad chung ngu bsten pa bsngags pa yin te/_de yang ji ltar mas gtong ba skyes nas rgas pa'i bar du gtang du
[\[238b.7\]]rung zhing bsngags pa yin pa dang 'dra bar tshad chung ngu 'di bsngags pa yin no/_/tshad chung ngu de rtag tu bsten cing rgyun du goms par byas na/_thun tshad che ba dang 'dra bar yon tan skyed par byed pa yin te/_de bas na skyes nas rgas kyi bar du bsngags pa yin no/_/sna nas gtang
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ba'i sman chung ngu 'di la ni sngar gyi tshad du bstan pa'i che 'bring chung gsum ltar bdam pa yod pa ma yin te/_snum gyi cho ga'i skabs nas bshad pa'i cho ga lta bu bsten cing bsrung mi dgos so/_/yang tshad chen po btang ba las gnod pa 'byung ba'i 'jigs
[\[239a.2\]]pa yod pa ltar 'di ltar 'di la de lta bu'i gnod pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sna sman don du til mar nyid/_/rtag tu bsten pa bsngags pa yin/_/mgo ni bad kan gnas yin phyir/_/snum gzhan bder gnas la mi bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_bde bar nad med par gnas pa'i skabs
[\[239a.3\]]su sna nas gtang ba'i sman gyi don du til mar nyid bsngags pa yin gyi/_mar la sogs pa'i snum gzhan rtag tu bsten pa bsngags pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mgo bo ni bad kan gyi gnas yin pa'i phyir snum gzhan mi bsngags kyi til mar ni bad kan sel ba yin
[\[239a.4\]]bas/_de'i phyir snum gzhan mar la sogs pa nad med pa'i skabs su gtang ba bsngags pa ma yin no/_/myur byed ring zhig byed pa dang /_/yon tan che dang chung byed pa'i/_/khyad par tshad chen tshad chung dang /_/gal te med par gyur na ni/_/gang zhig spang bcas gnod bcas
[\[239a.5\]]pa'i/_/tshad chen dag ni su zhig ston/_/snum dngas btung ba rtag bshad du/_/spyil bu rlung dang tshad par gnas/_/'jam rtsi tshad can mas gtong tshad/_/de dang 'dra bar rnam par bstan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di ni yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa las gzhung rtsom par byed pas
[\[239a.6\]]bshad pa/_'dir la la zhig gis bcug pa yin mod kyi/_'on kyang 'dir bshad par bya ste/_gal te tshad che ba sngar rnam pa gsum du bsten pa dang /_tshad chung ngu thigs pa gnyis pa de dag la khyad par med par gyur na/_spang bar bya zhing nyes dmigs dang bcas pa'i tshad
[\[239a.7\]]chen pos nad pa gso bar glen pa su zhig byed de/_tshad chung 'dis chog mod/_/des na 'di gnyis la yon tan gyi khyad par ci yod ce na/_de'i phyir myur byed ces bya ba la sogs pa smras pa yin te/_tshad che ba dang chung ba gnyis ni/_gnyis pa khyad par grangs ji lta ba bzhin du
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]myur du byed pa dang /_ring zhig na byed pa dang /_yon tan che ba dang /_chung bar byed pa'i khyad par mchog ste tha ma dag yod pa ma yin te/_de yang che tshad gsum po ni snum gyi las la sogs pa myur du byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du 'di nyid yon tan shas che bar byed pa yin/_de
[\[239b.2\]]bzhin du chung zhing dman par yang byed pa ste/_de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par yod pa la brten nas/_tshad chen por bshad pa gsum pa ni spang ba dang bcas shing gnod pa dang bcas su zin kyang /_tshad chen po dag bya ba kho na ston pa yin te/_de bzhin du skabs
[\[239b.3\]]kyis gzhan dag kyang bshad pa yin te/_snum dngas ma btung ba ni spang bar bya ba dang bcas shing /_mi mthun pa'i skabs gnod pa'i skabs spang ba med pa ma yin yang /_'on kyang zhun mar la sogs pa'i snum dngas ma bsten par bshad pa ni myur du byed pa dang /_yon
[\[239b.4\]]tan che ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du spyil bur gnas nas bcud kyis len nye bar bsten pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung dang /_tshad par gnas nas rlung dang nyi tshan gyi cho gas bcud kyis len bsten par byed pa de gnyis la khyad par med par gyur na spyil bur gnas pa'i cho ga spang ba dang /_
[\[239b.5\]]gnod pa dang bcas pa su zhig ston par byed na/_gang gi phyir spyil bu la gnas pa ni myur bar byed pa dang /_yon tan che ba yin la/_rlung dang tshad par gnas pa ni ring zhig na byed pa dang /_yon tan chung ba yin te/_tshad 'di gnyis kyi khyad par yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de bzhin
[\[239b.6\]]du 'jam rtse mas gtong ba'i tshad kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad pa yin te/_des na 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba ni myur du byed pa dang /_yon tan che ba yin la/_'jam rtsi tshad shin tu chung ba'i mas gtong ba ni ring zhig na byed pa dang /_yon tan chung ba yin na/_de bas na khyad par 'di
[\[239b.7\]]gnyis la brten nas 'jam rtsi tshad dang ldan pa dag ni spang bar bya ba dang /_gnod pa dang bcas su zin kyang bshad pa yin gyi/_mas gtong ba chung ngu chung ngus byed pa gcig bu ma bshad de/_'di gnyis ni 'bras bu khyad par yod pa yin no/_/dza la sgron shing dzi ban ti/_/
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gla sgang shing tsha pu shel tsi/_/go bi tsan+dan skyer pa'i rtsa/_/shing mngar gla ba a ka ru/_/nye'u shing bil ba puN+Da rI/_/ut+pal mu ra par+Ni gnyis/_/bri ha ti gnyis byi dang ga_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra sug smel dang /_/ha re Nu ka pad+ma yi/_/ge sar dang ni ba la ste/_/
[\[240a.2\]]sman ni 'di rnams cha snyoms la/_/char pa'i chus ni bskol bar bya/_/til mar las ni sman gyi khu/_/bcu 'gyur lhag byas de las ni/_/til mar chu dang bskol bya ba/_/lan bcu nyid ni bskol nas ni/_/tshos pa yi ni bcu cha la/_/de mnyam ra yi 'o ma blugs/_/snar
[\[240a.3\]]btang til mar yon tan che/_/thigs phran zhes bya 'di bsten bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dza la zhes bya ba ni rtswa sman pa la ka'o/_/dzi ban ti ni grags par zad do/_/go bi ni shi ri ba'o/_/gla ba ni ba ri pe la'o/_/nye'u shing ni sha ta pa ri'o/_/puN+Da rI ni pra puN+Da rI ka'o/_/ut+pa
[\[240a.4\]]la ni ut+pal sngon po'o/_/mu ra ni gan da mu ra'o/_/par+Ni gnyis ni sa la par+Ni dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni'o/_/bri ha ti gnyis ni bri ha ti dang /_kaN+Da ka ri'o/_/ha re Nu ka ni re Nu ka'o/_/pad+ma'i ge sar ni pad+ma'i snying po'i ge sar ro/_/ba la ni grags par zad do/_/sman 'di rnams legs
[\[240a.5\]]par cha snyoms la/_de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi char pa'i chu dang bskol ba ji srid til mar gyi bcu 'gyur lus par 'gyur gyi bar du bskol bar bya'o/_/de ltar sman gyi khu ba til mar gyi bcu 'gyur lus par byas la/_de'i 'og tu bskol ba'i chu til mar gyi bcu 'gyur yod pa la/_de
[\[240a.6\]]la til mar cha gcig dang /_lan bcu'i bar du bskol bar bya'o/_lhag pa'am ma tshang ba ma yin no/_/'di nyid ces bya ba nges par gzung ba smos pa yin no/_/de la til mar chos pa'i tshad ni ci nas sman bskol ba'i chu de bcu cha re re dang so sor bskol bas rdzogs kyi bar du bskol nas/_
[\[240a.7\]]til mar de tshos par gyur pa de ltar bya'o/_/tshos pa bcu cha de dang mnyam pa'i ra'i 'o ma blugs par bya ste/_gang dang mnyam zhe na/_til mar dang bskol ba'i chu dang mnyam par bya'o/_/de yang 'di skad ston pa yin te/_dza la dang sgron shing la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam srang sum
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]cu rtsa gnyis pa phrag brgya ste/_sum stong nyis brgya bskol la bskol ba'i sman khu lhag ma srang sum cu nyi shu lus par byas te/_de'i bcu cha sman khu srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bskol ba bcu po'i skabs su
[\[240b.2\]]til mar dang mar dang mnyam pa'i ra'i 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhug par bya'o/_/sna nas gtang ba'i til mar 'di ni yon tan che zhing bsten par bya ba yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad la/_'di'i ming ni thigs phran zhes bya ste/_mgo bo'i cha'i rtsa phran rnams su thigs pa
[\[240b.3\]]phra mos nang du 'jug par nus pa'i phyir/_til mar 'di la thigs phran gyi til mar zhes don dang ldan pa'i ming btags pa yin no/_/sna nas gtang ba'i sman bsten pas/_/phrag pa mgrin pa dpung mgo ni/_/mkhregs shing mtho la pags mdog gsal/_/dbang brtan skra dkar
[\[240b.4\]]med par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar bstan pa'i sna nas gtang ba'i sman bsten cing goms par byas pas ni/_skyes bu de phrag pa dang /_mgrin pa dang dpung mgo mtho zhing sra la mkhregs par 'gyur ba dang /_pags pa'i mdog gsal zhing dngas par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[240b.5\]]de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i dbang po brtan zhing yul 'dzin par nus pa dang /_skra dkar med cing rgas sra ba nyid du 'gyur ba kho na yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la
[\[240b.6\]]dga' bas rnam par sbyar ba las/_le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas sman gyi dud pa gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di brtsams pa'i 'grel pa ni 'di yin te/_sngar bshad pa'i sman sna nas gtang ba'i rjes la/_
[\[240b.7\]]dud pa brngubs te/_mkhur ba bkang nas dbo bar bya'o/_/zhes sngar bshad pas na/_dud pa de'i cho ga 'di dang 'di ltar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis le'u bshad pa yin no/_/nam tshong yan chad bad rlung las/_/byung ba'i nad rnams mi skye dang /_/skyes pa rnams ni
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]bsal ba'i phyir/_/mkhas pas rtag tu dud pa brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_nam tshong yan chad kyi bad kan las byung ba'i nad dang /_rlung las byung ba'i nad dang /_de bzhin du bad kan dang rlung las byung ba'i nad rnams mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang /_de bzhin
[\[241a.2\]]du skyes shing byung ba rnams bsal zhing gzhom bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu mkhas pa bdag la phan par 'dod pas rtag par dus thams cad du dud pa'i sman brngub cing btung bar bya'o/_/de ni 'jam dang bar ma rno/_/rlung dang bad rlung bad kan la/_/zhes bya ba la/_dud pa de ni 'jam
[\[241a.3\]]pa dang bar ma dang /_rno ba'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yod do/_/de las 'jam zhing snum pa ni/_bad kan cung zad dang ldan pa'i rlung nad la gtang bar bya'o/_/bar pa ni rlung dang bad kan 'dres pa'i cha mnyam pa la gtang bar bya'o/_/rnon po ni bad kan la gtang bar bya'o/_/de
[\[241a.4\]]la 'jam pa ni brtas par byed pa dang /_snum pa dang /_'jam pa zhes bya ba rnam grangs yin no/_/bar ma ni zhi bar byed pa dang /_sbyor ba can zhes bya ba rnam grangs yin no/_/rno ba ni sbyor ba dang bkru ba zhes bya ba rnam grangs yin no/_/gtang ngo mkhris khrag gis nyen dang /_/
[\[241a.5\]]khrus btang dmu rdzing za khu dang /_/rab rib sbos dang stod rlung nad/_/lkog nad mas gtong byas pa dang /_/nya dang chang dang 'o ma zho/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang dug 'thungs sogs/_/mgo nad skya rbab nad can ni/_/mtshan gnyid ma log la mi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_dud pa de ni
[\[241a.6\]]mkhris pa dang khrag gi nad kyis nyen pa dang /_bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa la gtang bar mi bya'o/_/stod kyi rlung nad ni ro stod kyi rlung nad do/_/lkog nad ni lkog ma 'gags pa la sogs pa'o/_/nya dang chang 'thungs pa la sogs pa mtshan mo gnyid kyis ma log pa la du ba'i
[\[241a.7\]]sman gtang bar mi bya'o/_/gal te dud pa cher brngubs na/_/khrag dang mkhris 'phel 'on long dang /_/skom dang brgyal dang rmongs par byed/_/der ni bsil ba'i cho ga phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_dud pa gsum po dus ma yin par brngubs pa dang /_bkag pa'i gnas
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]la brngubs pa dang /_sbyor ba nongs pas brngubs pa dang /_/cher brngubs shing lhag par brngubs pa ni/_khrag dang mkhris pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du 'on ba ste rna ba'i dbang po la gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_mig long zhing mthong ba nyams pa dang /_skom
[\[241b.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du brgyal zhing 'bog pa dang /_rmongs shing myos par byed do/_/khrag dang mkhris pa 'phel ba la sogs pa der ni bsil ba'i cho ga ste/_sman kha nas btang ba dang /_mig bsku ba dang /_mig sman dang /_chus gtor ba dang /_zas dang skom
[\[241b.3\]]pa'i cho ga thams cad bsil bar byas pas phan no/_/bkres sbrid glal dang bshang gci bsal/_/bud med bsten dang gtar ga btab/_/dgod dang so shing bcas pa yi/_/mthar ni dud pa 'jam po gtang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgyad kyi mthar/_dud pa 'jam
[\[241b.4\]]po rngub cing gtang bar bya'o/_/dus 'di dag nas mtshan zas zos/_/sna sman rjes la bar ma brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_dus brgyad po 'di dag nyid kyi tshe dang mtshan mo'i mtha' dang zas zos pa'i mtha' dang /_sna sman btang ba'i rjes la dud pa bar ma brngub tu rung ste/_dud pa
[\[241b.5\]]'jam po gtang ba'i dus brgyad dang mtshan mo'i mtha' la sogs par du ba brngub par bya'o/_/gnyid log sna sman mig sman khrus/_/slon pa'i rjes la rnon pos bkru/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnyid log pa la sogs pa'i rjes la sman rnon pos mgo bo bkrus pa'i dud pa brngub par
[\[241b.6\]]bya'o/_/mas gtong gce'u 'drar byas pa yi/_/dud gce'u sbubs gsum drang por bya/_/rtsa ba mtheb shong rtse mo ni/_/rgya shug shong ba'i tshad du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_du ba brngub ba'i gce'u ni/_mas gtong ba'i gce'u'i rgyu dang 'dra bar bya la/_de bzhin du sbubs
[\[241b.7\]]gsum po ste/_nang gi khong sbubs dang kha gsum par bya ba dang /_drang zhing ya yo med par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du rtsa ba'i sbom mthe bo shong ba tsam bya ba dang /_rtse mo'i bu ga rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong bar bya'o/_/de yi tshad ni rngub byed pa'i/_/sor ni nyi shu sum cu gnyis/_/
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bzhi bcu rno dang bar ma dang /_/'jam po la ni rim bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnon po la sogs pa'i du ba gsum la/_de'i gce'u'i tshad ni rim pa bzhin/_du ba rnon po gtong ba la rngub par byed pa'i nad pa'i sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi bya'o/_/bar ma la sogs
[\[242a.2\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/'jam po la ni rim bzhin bya/_de ltar gce'u ring pos ni thag ring po nas 'jug pa'i gce'u'i sbubs nas/_phra mo rim gyis gzhug pas khyab cing bde bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/drang por 'dug cing de la sems/_/kha gdangs nas ni lan
[\[242a.3\]]gsum brngub/_/sna khung re re bkag nas ni/_/snar ni dud pa brngub par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dud pa gtong ba'i tshe drang por 'dug cing /_ma yo bar gnas par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du de la sems pa ste/_dud pa brngub pa la sogs pa la ma yengs pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[242a.4\]]du kha gdangs shing mchu dang so phye nas du ba lan gsum brngub cing btang la/_sna khung ya gcig bkag nas sna khung gcig nas dud pa brngub pa'o/_/de bzhin du sna khung gnyis re re nas bkag cing lan gsum brngub par bya'o/_/mgo dang snar gtogs nad bskyod pa/_/
[\[242a.5\]]dang por sna nas brngub par bya/_/bskyod pa'i don du kha nas brngub/_/gre bar gtogs pa de las bzlog_/ces bya ba la/_mgo dang snar gtogs pa'i nad bskyod cing bsdus la/_rang nyid bskyod pa'i nad la ni/_dang por te thog mar sna nas brngubs la/_phyis kha
[\[242a.6\]]nas brngub par bya'o/_/gre ba'i nad la ni de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis brngub par bya ste/_gre ba'i nad bskyod cing glongs pa la ni dang por kha nas dud pa brngubs la/_phyis sna nas brngub par bya'o/_/gre ba'i nad ma bskyod cing ma bsdus pa ni/_de bskyod par bya ba'i phyir dang po sna nas
[\[242a.7\]]dud pa brngubs la/_phyis kha nas brngub par bya'o/_/du ba kha nyid nas slon gyi/_/snar slon mig la gnod par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sna nas brngub pa'i dud pa dang /_kha nas brngub pa'i dud pa ni gnyi ga yang kha nyid nas slon phyir gdon par bya'i mig la 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir sna
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]nas slon par mi bya'o/_/dud pa brngub dang 'byin pa yis/_/lan ni gsum gsum brngub par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_du ba brngub pa ni lan gsum gsum brngub pa dang /_'byin pa'i tshul gyis brngub par bya'o/_/'jam po nyin gcig lan cig gtang /_/bar ma lan gnyis sbyor ba ni/_/
[\[242b.2\]]lan gsum lan bzhi gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_du ba 'jam po ni nyi ma rangs pa la rang gi gtang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la lan cig gtang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyor ba'i dud ba rnon po ni nyin gcig la rang gi gtang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la lan gsum mam bzhi gtang bar
[\[242b.3\]]bya'o/_/der sman gu gul a ka ru/_/gla sgrang rdo dreg s+tho ne ya/_/spang spos u shir ba la ka_/shing tsha ko na ti shing mngar dang /_/bil rkang e la ba lu ka_/pog dkar shi ri pe sta ka_/bya ma ka gla ba sbra tshil/_/pog nag gur gum ma sha dang /_/kun tu ru dang nas dang
[\[242b.4\]]til/_/snum bcas 'bras bu snying po dang /_/tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang mar/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la sman gyi du ba gsum po de dag gi nang nas du ba 'jam po'i sman 'phrod ni/_gu gul nas mar gyi bar yin no/_/rdo dreg ni shel la yang ste/_pha bong gi drag pa'o/_/yang na
[\[242b.5\]]brag zhun la bya'o/_/s+tho ne ya ni te la pa to ka'o/_/spang spos ni na la ka'o/_/kon ti ni ta re nu ka'o/_/bil ba'i rkang ni bil ba'i nang ngo /_/e la ba lu ka ni hi ri ba lu ka'o/_/shi ri be+e tsusta ka ni shi ri be+e sta ka ste/_thang shing gi thang chu'o/_/pog dkar po ni sardza ra sa'o/_/
[\[242b.6\]]bya ma ka ni da ba d+hag d+ha'o/_/gla ba ni man bya ma'o/_/pog nag po ni sa la ki'o/_/ma sha ni mon sran gre'u'o/_/snum dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu ni star ga'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'o/_/de bzhin du snying po ni shing sA la dang /_a ka ru dang /_thang shing dang /_shing sha pa la
[\[242b.7\]]sogs pa'i snying po'i khu ba'i snum mo/_/yang de bzhin du tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang mar dang sbyar ba las dud pa'i sman bya'o/_/zhi ba pog nag rgya skyegs dang /_/rgun 'brum pad+ma ut+pa la/_/n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad+tha/_/u dum+bAr blag sha dang /_/seng phrom shun pa ka ra dang /_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]shing mngar klu shing shug pa btsod/_/dri las rgya spos ru rta bskol/_/zhes bya ba la/_zhi bar byed pa'i du ba'i sman ni pog nag po dang /_rgya skyegs la sogs pa la bya ste/_n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa shing lnga'i shun lpags las sbyar ro/_/klu shing gi shun
[\[243a.2\]]lpags ni nA ga ge sar gyi shing gi shun pa'o/_/shug pa ni he ma pad+ma kha'o/_/btsod ni man dzi ta'o/_/dri'i rdzas rnams las rgya spos dang /_ru rta bskol ba ma gtogs par byas pa'i dri'i rdzas thams cad do/_/rnon po dzo ti sma ti dang /_/skyer pa dang ni rtsa ba bcu/_/ldong ros
[\[243a.3\]]ba bla rgya skyegs dang /_/gi ri gar dkar 'bras bu gsum/_/dri yi sman la ro rno ba'i/_/mgo bo'i bkru sman sde tshan no/_/zhes bya ba la/_du ba'i sman rnon po la/_dzo ti la sogs pa'i sman rnams yin te/_dzo ti sma ti ni grang gu ni ka'o/_/rtsa ba bcu ni rtsa ba lnga pa che chung
