[\[285a.3\]]no/_/gtsags spyad kyis gtar ga gdab cing rma'i las su bya ba byed pas na gtar ga gdab pa'i las te/_de'i cho ga ni 'di dang 'di ltar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i tshul te de bshad par bya'o/_/rma ni phal cher dang po ni/_/skrangs dang smin las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[285a.4\]]de bas de nyid gso bya ste/_/de bsil byug blugs khrag dbyung dang /_/legs par sbyang ba la sogs pa/_/smin par 'gyur las 'bad de bsrung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rma'i mtshan nyid phal cher mang du dang po skrangs shing smin pa las rma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[285a.5\]]de bas na skrangs pa de nyid gso zhing zhi bar bya ba dang /_smin par 'gyur ba las bsrung bar bya ste/_ci nas kyang skrangs pa de smin cing rnags par mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'bad pa dang ldan pas bsrung bar bya'o/_/de ji ltar bsrung bar bya zhe na/_de ni bsil dang zhes
[\[285a.6\]]bya ba la sogs pa ste/_skrangs pa de tsan+dan gyi lde gu la sogs pa bsil sman gyis byug pa dang /_bsil sman la sogs pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pa dang /_de bzhin du gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /_skyugs sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa btang bas legs
[\[285a.7\]]par sbyang bar byas la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad dmigs ji lta ba dang mthun pa'i gso dpyad kyis smin cing rnags par gyur pa las bsrung bar bya'o/_/thor bu ma smin skrangs drod chung /_/mdog 'dra sra zhing brtan par gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_thor bu'am skrangs
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pa'i tshabs chung ba dang /_drod dam tsha bar shas chung ba dang /_de bzhin mdog ni 'dra ba ste/_pags pa'i mdog ma nyams shing mnyam pa dang /_sra zhing mnyen bag med pa dang /_brtan zhing mi yo bar gnas pa yin no/_/smin tshe mdog ni 'gyur ba dang /_/
[\[285b.2\]]dmar zhing rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug_/gas pa lta bu'i nad bcas dang /_/yan lag snyom zhing glal bcas dang /_/lus grugs 'khrugs tsha yi ga 'chus/_/rims 'debs skom dad gnyid med dang /_/mar 'khyags bzhag na 'ju ba dang /_/rma ltar
[\[285b.3\]]reg na mi bzod do/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs par gyur pa de smin par byed pa'i tshe ni/_mdog 'gyur zhing pags pa'i mdog dang mi 'dra ba dang /_de bzhin du mdog rtsa dmar dang /_rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug ste/_rlung gis khengs shing mi 'gyur bar
[\[285b.4\]]gnas pas na rkyal pa bus pa lta bur 'dug pa dang de bzhin du gas pa lta bu ste/_bcag pa'am bkas pa lta bu'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /_nad dang bcas pa de khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems pa dang /_de bzhin du yan lag thams cad glal 'byung ba dang bcas par
[\[285b.5\]]gnas pas lus grugs shing dkrum pa lta bur sems pa dang de bzhin du lus 'khrugs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste/_'khrugs pa ni tshig brjod par mi nus pa'i nad kyi tshor ba rang gi nyams kyis myong ba'i tshul du ma dang ldan pa'i khams 'khrugs pa'i nad 'byung ba'o/_/tsha
[\[285b.6\]]ba ni lus dang yan lag thams cad mi bzad par tsha ba'o/_/yi ga 'chus pa ni zas la 'dod pa med cing /_mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_skom dad kyis gdungs pa dang /_gnyid med cing yer ba ste/_de dag dang ldan
[\[285b.7\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mar 'khyags shing 'thas par gyur pa de'i steng du bzhag na 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rma byung ba ltar skrangs pa smin par byed pa de'i tshe/_reg na mi bzod pa yin no/_/smin gyur na ba'i shugs chung zhing /_/rnyid cing skya la
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]gnyer ma 'du/_/mtha' ma 'jum zhing dbus su mtho/_/g.ya' dang skrangs pa la sogs chung /_/rkyal pa yi ni chu lta bur/_/reg na rnag ni phan tshun rgyu/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs pa de smin cing rnags par gyur na na ba'i shugs chung ba ste/_nad
[\[286a.2\]]kyi rtsom pa shas chung ba dang /_de bzhin du rnyid cing snyi ba dang /_mdog skya zhing dkar ba dang /_gnyer ma'i tshogs 'du ba dang /_de bzhin du mtha' ma thog thag 'jum zhing dma' la dbus ma'i phyogs mtho zhing 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du g.ya'
[\[286a.3\]]ba dang /_skrangs pa la sogs pa chung zhing zhi ba dang /_rkyal pa'i nang du chu blugs pa ltar gnas shing /_reg cing mnan na rnag gi tshogs phan tshun rgyu zhing 'khrugs pa yin no/_/rlung min min mkhris min tsha/_/med de bad kan med mi skrang /_/khrag med dmar bar
[\[286a.4\]]mi 'gyur te/_/de bas nad khrag dang bcas smin/_/zhes bya ba la/_smin cing rnags pa de la rlung ma yin zhing /_rlung nad med pa ni/_na zhing zug par mi 'gyur la/_mkhris pa ma yin par ni tsha zhing drod bag mi 'byung zhing /_bad kan med pas ni skrangs pa
[\[286a.5\]]'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_khrag med dmar bar ni mi 'gyur te/_de bas na rgyu de'i phyir na zhes pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang khrag dang bcas na/_skrangs shing smin par 'gyur ro/_/smin pa thal drags khong stong dang /_/nad kyis zos pas
[\[286a.6\]]bags pa srab/_/gnyer ma 'jum zhing mdog gnag la/_/ba spu rnams ni 'byi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs smin zin nas thal drags shing dus shin tu 'das pa ni/_skrangs pa'i gnas na khong stong du 'gyur ba nad las byung ba'i rnag gis zos shing zad
[\[286a.7\]]par byas pa dang /_pags pa srab cing rdol bar nye ba dang /_gnyer ma 'jum zhing pags pa 'dus pa dang /_mdog gnag cing dri ma can du gnas pa dang /_ba spu rnams kyi tshogs 'byi zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/bad kan shas che'i skrangs pa ni/_/smin
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]pa gting ring khrag gis gang /_/de bas smin rtags gsal ma yin/_/skrangs pa gang du bsil gyur cing /_/pags mdog mi 'gyur nad tshabs chung /_/rdo ltar reg na sra ba yin/_/mkhas pas the tshom med par de/_/khrag gi smin pa zhes bshad bya/_/zhes
[\[286b.2\]]bya ba la/_yang bad kan las byung ba'i skrangs pa la ni/_smin pa gting ring zhing zab pas brtag par dka' ba dang /_khrag gis gang bar gyur pa yin te/_de bas na de'i smin pa'i rtags sam/_mtshan ma ni gsal ba ma yin te/_shes par dka' ba yin no/_/
[\[286b.3\]]yang skrangs pa'i rnam pa gang du skrangs bag bsil zhing reg na grang bar gyur la/_pags pa'i mdog kyang gzhan du ma 'gyur te/_cha 'dra ba dang /_nad tshabs chung ba dang /_rdo ltar reg na sra zhing mkhrang bag tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mkhas pas the tshom dang dogs pa med
[\[286b.4\]]pa nyid du khrag las gyur pa'i rma smin no zhes bshad cing the tshom med pa nyid du bya'o/_/snying stobs nyam chung byis pa dang /_/thor bu smin pa'i tshabs che ba'am/_/gnad dang rus tshigs la sogs par/_/'byung ba ma gtogs gzhan dag dral/_/zhes bya ba la/_snying
[\[286b.5\]]stobs chung zhing phog snya zhan pa dang /_de bzhin du nyam chung ba dang /_byis pa lta bu mtshon gdab mi bzod pa dang /_smin pa'i tshabs che zhing thal drags pa dang /_de bzhin du gnad dang rus tshigs la gnas pa'i skrangs pa la ni/_rno ba dang tsha ba'i sman gyis brtol zhing
[\[286b.6\]]dral bar bya'o/_/de yang 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma las/_gu gul zar ma ba las so/_/khron bu dang ni phug ron rtug_/thal sman 'phrod dang thal sman rno/_/skrangs pa smin gyur brtol bar bya/_/zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no/_/gzhan zhes bya ba skrangs pa'i
[\[286b.7\]]rnam pa gong du smos pa ma gtogs pa gzhan dag ni gtsags bus dral ba nyid du bya'o/_/ma smin brtol na rtsa rgyus la/_/gnod cing khrag ni mang du 'byung /_/nad tshabs rab 'phel rma gyes pa'am/_/rma 'byung thor bu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]pa ma smin pa brtol zhing dral na/_/rtsa dang rgyus pa la gnod cing ma rungs par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du khrag gi tshogs mang du 'byung zhing 'bab pa dang /_de bzhin du nad tshabs rab tu 'phel zhing tshor bar 'gyur ba dang /_rma'i kha gyes shing bye bar 'gyur ba
[\[287a.2\]]ba'am/_yang na rma rdol ba las byung ba'i thor bu'am/_me dbal gyi nad du 'gyur ro/_/rnag ni nang du gnas gyur pa/_/'phel bas rtsa rgyus sha dang ni/_/khrag rnams myur du sreg byed de/_/rtswa skam la ni me dang mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs pa de smin pa thal
[\[287a.3\]]drags kyang /_dral zhing brtol ba ma byas par nang du gnas par gyur pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bas rtsa la sogs pa bsreg cing za bar byed de/_dper na me mched pas rtswa'i tshogs bsregs pa dang 'dra'o/_/gang zhig ma smin brtol ba dang /_/gang zhig smin kyang btang snyoms
[\[287a.4\]]'jog_/khyad par mi shes de dag ni/_/sme sha can 'drar shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pa gang gis skrangs pa ma smin pa dag kyang mi shes pa'i dbang gis brtol zhing dral bar byed la yang sman pa gang zhig skrangs pa de smin zin kyang mi shes pa nyid kyis btang snyoms su
[\[287a.5\]]'jog cing brtol bar mi byed pa nyid de/_de gnyi ga yang khyad par mi shes shing ma brtags par byed pa yin pas sme sha can te/_khyi sha za ba'i rigs ngan dang 'dra bar dmad par bya ba yin no/_/rma brtol ba yi dang por ni/_/kha zas phan ba sbyin par bya/_/tshor ba mi
[\[287a.6\]]bzad bzed 'gyur bas/_/chang 'thung pa la chang blud bya/_/zas zos pas ni mi brgyal zhing /_/nang du mtshon btab tshor mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma brtol zhing gtsags bu 'debs pa'i las byed pa'i dang por re zhig 'di dag ma byas pa'i mtshon gyi las mi bya ste/_de
[\[287a.7\]]yang thog ma kho nar nad pa de'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir/_kha zas phan zhing mngon par dga' ba sbyin pa dang /_yang mtshon gyis btab pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pa drag po de bzod par 'gyur bas/_chang 'thung ba zhig yin na chang rnying pa blud par bya'o/_/de ltar na das zan zos shing
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]longs spyad pas ni brgyal zhing 'bog par mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin du chang rnying pa rnon po 'thungs pas ni nang du mtshon gyis btab cing brtol ba tshor bar mi 'gyur zhing /_de'i sdug bsngal ba rnags nus par 'gyur ro/_/rum du bu shi rde'u chags dang /_/kha nad dmu rdzing can
[\[287b.2\]]ma gtogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa rum du bu shi ba la sogs pa ni ma gtogs te/_bud med rum du bu shi ba dang /_gcin nad rde'us 'gags pa dang /_kha'i nad rnams yod pa dang /_lto dmu rdzing can la mtshon gdab par mi bya'o/_/de nas yo byad kun bsags
[\[287b.3\]]te/_/nad pa shar du kha bstan la/_/sman pa mngon phyogs bsdams nas ni/_/gnad sogs ma gtogs gtsags bus gdab/_/sha shugs rjes mthun shin tu rno/_/gtsags bu rnag phyin bar du gdab/_/de ni cig car gdab bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de
[\[287b.4\]]nas zhes bya ba ni/_bkra shis pa'i don du smos pa yin te/_yo byad kun bsags te zhes bya ba ni/_de'i tshe dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad bsags pa ste/_cha spyad rnams dang /_gtsags spyad rnams dang /_thal sman dang /_'dzum bu'i ma mchu dang /_ras bal dang /_chu'am
[\[287b.5\]]ras bal sbangs pa'i gos kyi dum bu dang /_lo ma dang /_srad bu dang /_bags pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_snum dang /_ska ba'i lde gu dang /_til gyi lde gu dang /_ldugs pa'i sman dang /_chu'i bum pa dang /_chu tshan dang /_chu dron dang /_zas dang /_bsil yab la sogs pa
[\[287b.6\]]rma la dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad bsag cing nyer bsdogs su bya'o/_/de nas nad pa kha shar du bstan te/_sman pa de la mngon par phyogs shing bltas nas/_legs par bsdams te/_gtsags bu myur du gdab par bya'o/_/de yang nad la sogs par gdab pa ste/_gnad
[\[287b.7\]]dang /_rtsa dang /_chu ba dang /_rus pa'i tshigs dang /_rtsa bo che rnams spang bar bya'o/_/de yang sha shugs dang rjes su mthun par byas la/_shin tu rno ba'i gtsags bu gdab pa ni/_rnag phyin zhing snang bar gyur gyi bar du btang la/_de yang cig car te/_lan cig
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]kho na gdab par bya'o/_/smin pa chen po yod kyang ni/_/rma zheng sor gnyis dral ba'am/_/sor gnyis pa'i zabs sor gsum gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_smin pa shin tu che ba la ni/_rma zhing sor gnyis gdab par bya ba'am/_sor gnyis pa'i bar
[\[288a.2\]]ram zabs brtags la sor gsum par gdab par bya'o/_/mdzub mo chu ba spu dag gis/_/gnas phyogs ji bzhin brtags pa'am/_/rma tshol gyis ni legs btsal zhing /_/kun tu legs par brtag par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma tshol gyis kun tu legs par btsal zhing
[\[288a.3\]]brtags la bya ba'am/_mdzub mo la sogs pas gnas dang phyogs gang na ji ltar yod pa legs par brtag cing btsal bar bya ste/_rma'i kha bye zhing gyes pa'i phyogs su mdzub mo g.yon pas brtag par byas la/_kha shin tu bye ba ni ma yin la/_sha'i gting zab pa dag ni/_rma tshol
[\[288a.4\]]gyi thur mas legs par btsal bar bya la/_gzhan dag la ni smyug ma'i sbu gu'am/_pad+ma'i chu ba la sogs pas brtag par bya la/_kha shin tu zlum pa la ni phag gi sbus brtag cing btsal nas rma btod par bya'o/_/gang nas gang du 'gro 'gyur ba/_/gang du mtho ba shes byas la/_/
[\[288a.5\]]de dang der ni rma btod de/_/legs phye phug ni med par bya/_/chu dang zheng du ci nas kyang /_/nad ni gnas par mi 'gyur bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi phyogs gang du rma tshol 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi phyogs der rma btod par bya'o/_/yang na gang du skrang ba'i phyogs mtho bar snang bas shes
[\[288a.6\]]par byas la/_phyogs de dang der rma btod par bya'o/_/de yang legs par phye ba ste/_logs phan tshun gyi bye brag legs par shes shing /_phyed par 'gyur bar btod pa dang /_de bzhin du phugs 'chas pa ste/_rnag la sogs pa brten pa'i gnas med par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du chu ste
[\[288a.7\]]srid dang /_zheng ste rgyar ci nas kyang rnag la sogs pa'i nad gnas par mi 'gyur zhing /_chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ste de ltar bya'o/_/sman pa dpa' brtan las la myur/_/mtshon rno mi rtul mi 'dar la/_/kun tu rmongs par ma gyur pa/_/gtsags bus
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]'debs pa'i las la bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pa dpa' ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni/_sman dpyad kyi mtshon gyi las byed pa la bsngags shing 'dod par bya ba yin no/_/de la dpa' ba ni rtul phod pa'o/_/brtan pa ni bag tsha ba med cing mi 'gyur ba'o/_/las la myur
[\[288b.2\]]ba ni lag bzo bas gtsags bu'i las myur du byed pa'o/_/mtshon rno ba ni legs par bdar ba dang /_kha snyoms shing legs pa'o/_/mi rtul ba ni las chud mi 'dza' ba'o/_/mi 'dar ba ni lag pa mi 'dar ba'o/_/kun tu ma rmongs pa ni bya ba la mkhas pa'o/_/gyen du gcad
[\[288b.3\]]rtsa 'phral smin rtsa/_/rnyil dang ske rtsa lto spos dang /_/mchan khung dang ni mig sbubs mchu/_/mkhur tshos brla drung chu so rtsa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_dpral ba la sogs pa'i rtsa ni gtsags bu kha drang por bstan te gyen du gdab par bya'o/_/gzhan dag gyen du bcad na ni/_/rtsa dang
[\[288b.4\]]chu ba ma rungs 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_phyogs gzhan dag tu rtsa gyen du bcad na/_rtsa dang chu ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro/_/gtsags bus btab nas nad pa ni/_/tshig snyan chu ni bsil ba yis/_/dbugs phyung nas ni de'i 'og rma/_/sor mos kun nas btsir ba dang /_/ska
[\[288b.5\]]ba'i chu yis legs bkru zhing /_/sman chur bcug pa'i gos kyis phyi/_/gu gul yungs kar a ka ru/_/shing kun ka ra rgyam tsha dang /_/shu dag nim pa'i lo ma ni/_/mar du sbyar bas bdug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gtsags bu btab zin kyang de'i 'og tu nad pa la de'i tshe smra bar 'os
[\[288b.6\]]pa'i tshig snyan pa brjod pa dang /_de bzhin du chu bsil ba gtor ba la sogs pas dbugs phyung nas/_de'i 'og tu rnag la sogs pa'i skyon bsal bar bya ba'i phyir rma de sor mos kun nas bcing bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu nad dmigs ji ltar 'tsham pa'i sman chu ska ba la sogs pas legs par
[\[288b.7\]]bkru zhing sbyangs nas/_de'i rjes la ras la sogs pa'i gos kyis chu legs par bsal zhing /_de nas rma de gu gul nas nim pa'i lo ma'i bar gyi sman mar dang sbrus shing sbyar ba'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/_/til gyi lde gu mar sbrang rtsi/_/rang gi sman ni ji lta bas/_/byugs shing
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]de nas rma tshangs gzhug_/de nyid kyis ni de g.yogs la/_/mar dang phyer sbrus bsku ba dang /_/de'i 'og kog tse stug po ni/_/gzhag ste shin tu ma yengs pas/_/gos kyis legs par bcings byas te/_/glo dang g.yas dang g.yon dag gam/_/steng dang 'og tu ma
[\[289a.2\]]song bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu rma'i nang du gro mde'u tshul du ras gtsang ma'i rma tshangs su byas pa dang /_ras bal la sogs pa'i sdong bu rma'i nang du gzhug tu rung ba bcug la/_de'i 'og tu nad dmigs ji lta ba'i sman gyi lde gu byug cing bsku bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du til gyi
[\[289a.3\]]lde gu dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi bsku zhing til gyi lde gu dang mar dang sbrang rtsi de nyid kyis/_rma'i nang na gnas pa'i rma tshangs rmar bcug pa'i ras dum la sogs pa de nyid kyis g.yogs par bya'o/_/de 'ba' zhig gis de g.yogs par ma zad kyi/_snod kyi nang du phye dang mar dang chur sbrus
[\[289a.4\]]shing lag pa'i rtse mos mnyes pa'i zan gyis kyang g.yogs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og rma'i tho skor gyi steng du gos rim pa mang po las byas pa mthug po gzhag pa/_shin tu ma yengs pas gos kyi dum bus legs par bcing zhing dkri bar bya la/_de yang glo g.yas sam g.yon du ma
[\[289a.5\]]'phyugs par bya ba dang /_rma'i steng ngam dbus su ma song bar drang zhing ya yo med par rma dkri zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/rma tshangs kog tse dkris mar bcas/_/phra zhing sra la gtsang ba la/_/spos kyis bdugs shing 'jam la mnyen/_/kham khum med cing rma la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[289a.6\]]gong du smos pa'i rma tshangs nang du gzhug pa'i ras dang /_kog tse dang /_dkri ba'i ras ni sra zhing mi 'chad pa dang /_gtsang zhing bkrus pa las byas la/_de yang gu gul la sogs pa'i spos kyis bdug pa dang /_'jam zhing reg na bde ba dang /_mnyen zhing 'jar ba dang /_kham
[\[289a.7\]]khum med cing blta ba tshigs dang bral ba'i rma la phan pa de lta bu dag bya'o/_/bcings nas de yi 'og tu ste/_/gnod pa bzlog phyir bsrung bar bya/_/de rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin/_/lag smi gu ha a ti gu ha/_/spang spos pra ma tsa ri ni/_/tsha tra a ti tsha tra dang /_/dU ra ba shu dag
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]yungs kar dag_/rtag tu de yi spyi bor gdags/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma bcing ba'i bar gyi las de dag byas nas/_de'i 'og tu nad pa de dag la gdon la sogs pa'i gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir bsrung bar bya'o/_/yang gnod sbyin la sogs pa de rnams la gtor ma'i kha zas ci rigs par
[\[289b.2\]]sbyin pa dang /_rtag par dus thams cad du sman 'di dag spyi bor gdags par bya ste/_lag smi zhes bya ba sha mi dang /_gu ha zhes bya ba kr-iSh+Na pa r+Ni dang /_a ti gu ha zhes bya bas la pa r+Ni dang /_spang spos zhes bya ba man ji ste/_ming gi rnam grangs dzA ti la zhes bya ba dang /_pra ma tsa ri zhes bya ba
[\[289b.3\]]bram aSh+Ti ka zhes bya ba'i shing dang /_shu dag ste sman pa tsa dang /_tsha tra zhes pa sha ta puSh+pa dang /_a ti tsha tra zhes bya ba bi sha ni ki dang /_dUr ba dang /_yungs kar rnams gdags par bya'o/_/de nas snum gyi cho gar bshad/_nyin re'i kun spyod bshad pa bstan/_/zhes bya ba de'i 'og
[\[289b.4\]]tu skyes bu dman ma de la snum gyi bshad pa zhes pa snum btung ba'i cho ga'i skabs su bshad pa/_kha la chu dron gyis kun tu spyod pa bya ba la sogs pa dang /_nyin re zhing spyad par bya ba'i le'u'i skabs su bshad pa'i kun tu spyod pa ston cing bsgo bar bya'o/_/nyin par gnyid log rma g.ya' zhing /_/
[\[289b.5\]]kha dmar na skrangs rnag 'khyims 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman ma smin par gnyid log pa ni rma g.ya' ba dang /_na ba dang /_skrangs pa dang /_rnag 'khyims par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bud med dran nam reg pa'am/_/mthong bas khu ba byung gyur na/_/ma phrad na yang 'khrag pa
[\[289b.6\]]las/_/byung ba'i skyon ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med dang ma phrad du zin kyang /_de dran pa la sogs pa nyid kyis khu ba byung bar gyur na/_'khrig pa las byung ba'i skyon rma bye ba la sogs pa 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kha zas dag ni gang goms las/_/
[\[289b.7\]]nas dang gro dang drug cu pa/_/sran chung mud ga tu ba ri/_/ni shan na ga dzi wan ti/_/la phug gzhon nu bar ta ka_/rgya sne'u tan du li ya ka_/ka ra be+e la kar ko ta/_/ka tu ka la ba to la/_/rgyam tsha se 'bru skyu ru ra/_/chu bskol ba ni bsgrangs pa dang /_/'bras rnying chang dang snum
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]nyung zad/_/zos rjes chu tshan btung ba dang /_skam sa'i sha ni zos gyur na/_/rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa sman ma de rjes su mthun zhing goms pa'i kha zas zos pas myur zhing rings par rma 'tsho zhing bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de la
[\[290a.2\]]nas la sogs pa ni bza' ba'i don du'o/_/sran chung la sogs pa ni sran khu yu sha dang tshod ma'i don du sbyar ro/_/tu ba ri ni sran ma a ru ka'o/_/ni shan ni ka dang /_dzi ba na ti la sogs pa ni tshod ma'i don du'o/_/rgyam tsha dang se 'bru la sogs pa spos kyi don du'o/_/chu bskol
[\[290a.3\]]ba bsgrangs pa ni btung ba'i don du'o/_/'bras rnying pa ni lo gcig ma lon pa'i 'bras de'i chan no/_/snum can ni snum cung zad yod pa'o/_/de'i rjes la 'tshal nan ni chu tshan btung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du skam sa'i sha 'ur bya la sogs pa'i sha bza' ba ste/_de dag gis rma myur du
[\[290a.4\]]'tsho zhing 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/dus su ran par bza' ba dang /_/phan pa zos na bde 'ju 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar rjes su mthun pa'i kha zas ji ltar 'os pa'i dus su ran zhing 'tsham par bza' ba dang /_phan pa zos na bde blag tu 'ju zhing smin par 'gyur ro/_/ma zhu ba yis
[\[290a.5\]]rlung la sogs/_/ldang zhing nad ni stobs chen 'gyur/_/de las skrangs dang rnags ba dang /_/tsha dang spos par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas ma zhu zhing smin par ma gyur pa las ni/_rlung la sogs pa ldang zhing stobs dang ldan pa nad tshabs chen por 'gyur ro/_/de ldang
[\[290a.6\]]ba de las rma skrangs pa dang na ba la sogs pas nad pa nyen par 'gyur ro/_/'bru sar til dang ma sha dang /_/chang dang rlan can las byung sha_/'o ma bu ram shing las gyur/_/skyur dang lan tshwa tsha ba dang /_/gzhan gang 'khru ba gcod byed dang /_/tsha dang bsil dang lci ba yang /_/
[\[290a.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_'bru sar pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan rma yod pa'i skyes bus spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du chang dang srog chags gsher sar gnas pa'i sha dang /_'o ma las gyur pa dang /_zho dang /_dar ba dang /_phrum dang /_thud la sogs pa dang bu ram shing las gyur pa ste/_bu ram phra mo
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]la sogs pa dang /_skyur dang /_lan tshwa dang /_tsha ba'i bza' btung dang /_gzhan yang gang dag 'khru ba gcod cing 'gags par byed pa dang /_tsha ba'i shas che ba dang /_bsil ba dang /_grang ba dang /_lci ba de dag kyang spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/'bru sar la sogs sde tshan 'di/_/rma
[\[290b.2\]]dang ldan pa'i nad kun skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i 'bru sar pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan 'di ni rma dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dman pa'i nad kun skyed pa ste/_nad gzhi gsum char skyed pa'am/_rma red cing 'drul ba la sogs pa nad skyed par byed pa yin no/_/chang ni rno ba tshe rtsub 'gyur/_/
[\[290b.3\]]rma la myur du gnod par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'bru sar pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan 'di ni bshad ma thag par chang spang bar bya ba nyid yin par bstan zin pa las/_'dir yang chang spang bar bstan pa ni shin tu nyes pa che ba'i phyir yang smos pa yin te/_'bru sar pa la sogs pa zos pas
[\[290b.4\]]rma la gnod par 'gyur mod kyi/_de bas kyang chang ni rno ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_skyur ba yin pas de la gnod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir rma la shin tu myur bar gnod par byed kyi/_gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin no/_/yang chang khyad par can rno ba dang /_rtsub pa dang /_skyur ba gang
[\[290b.5\]]yin pa de nyid ni rma la shin tu myur bar gnod par byed pa yin gyi/_snum pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gzhan dag ni de lta ma yin no/_/de yang rgyud gzhan las/_phal cher snum bcas mngar ba dang /_shin tu rno dang rtsub ma yin/_/dngas shing btung bar sla ba dag_/rgun chang dag las
[\[290b.6\]]de mchog yin/_/zhes bshad pa yin no/_/de bas na chang snum pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni/_dman ma lan 'ga' zhig nyung zhing byin pa ni rma la gnod par mi 'gyur gyi/_chang rno ba dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni shin tu gnod pa yin no/_/zhes bshad
[\[290b.7\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_'dir yang smos pa yin no/_/ba la ur shi ras g.yab cing /_/'di ni bskyod par mi bya la/_/drag shul mi gzugs 'phrug mi bya/_/bskyod pa'i tshe na bag bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma de sman ba la ka dang /_ur shi ras g.yab pa dang /_rma 'di bskyod cing
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bskul bar mi bya ba dang /_drag shul du gzugs shing brdeg par mi bya ba dang /_sen mo la sogs pas 'phrug par mi bya'o/_/yang de bzhin du bskyod cing bskul ba'i tshe na yang bya ba thams cad du rma legs par bsrung zhing bag bya'o/_/mdza' dang bram ze rgan
[\[291a.2\]]sogs kyi/_/gtam ni yid la dga' ba mnyan/_/nad las thar ba'i re bcas pas/_/rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_grogs mdza' ba dang /_bram ze dang /_rgan po la sogs pa'i gtam yid la dga' ba dag mnyan pa dang /_nad las myur du thar bar 'gyur
[\[291a.3\]]ro/_/zhes re ba dang bcas shing dga' bas rma myur du 'tsho bas 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gsum lon tshe rma yi tshas/_/slar yang bkru sogs las rnams ni/_/snga ma bzhin bya/_zhes bya ba la/_de ltar byas na nyi ma gsum lon pa'i tshe slar yang rma'i las snga ma bzhin
[\[291a.4\]]du bya ste/_gong gi bshad pa dang mthun par bya'i/_cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/_/de bzhin du/_nyin zhag gnyis par mi bya'o/_/tshabs cher na zhing mi 'byar la/_/rma ni yun ring zhig na 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_snga ma bzhin du nyi ma gnyis pa la rma bkrol zhing bkru ba la
[\[291a.5\]]sogs pa'i las mi bya ste/_de ltar byas na rma tshabs cher na zhing /_mi bzad par na ba dang /_rma mi 'byar zhing rmen bu skye ba dang /_rma yun ring du zhig na 'tsho zhing 'drub par 'gyur ro/_/rma tshangs sam ni lde gus glan/_/snum ches rtsub ches dam pa dang /_/lhod drags bzhag nyes
[\[291a.6\]]mi bya ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma'i nang du zhugs pa'i rma tshangs ras la sogs pa'i gos kyi dum bu rma'i nang du gzhug tu rung ba de snum ches pa dang /_rtsub ches pa dang /_de bzhin du dam zhing drag tu bcing ba dang /_lhod drags pa dang /_bzhag nyes pa dag mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sman gyi
[\[291a.7\]]lde gus rma glan pa yang /_snum ches pa dang dam ches pa dang /_lhod ches pa dang /_bzhag nyes par mi bya'o/_/snum ches rma ni red par 'gyur/_/rtsub ches sha chad shin tu na/_/gas shing khrag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dam dang lhod drags bzhag nyes pas/_/rma yi kha
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]ni 'drud par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_snum shin tu drags shing shas che na rma red par 'gyur zhing rnag dang chu ser 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rtsub ches pa ni sha bcad pa dang /_shin tu na bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du pags pa gas pa dang /_khrag 'bab cing 'byung bar
[\[291b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rma tshangs dang lde gu shin tu dam pa dang /_shin tu lhod drags pa dang /_bzhag nyes pas ni/_rma'i kha phan tshun 'drud cing 'dar ba dang thug par 'gyur ro/_/rma ni rnag bcas skrangs shing mtho/_/rgyu bcas rnag phugs 'chas pa dag_/rma tshangs 'jam
[\[291b.3\]]po nang gnas pa/_rma yi skyon ni dag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rma gang rnag dang bcas par gnas pa dang /_de bzhin du skrangs shing mtho bar gnas pa dang /_rgyu ba dang bcas pa ste/_sha la sogs pa rnag gis zos pas bu ga'i rnam pa ring du 'gro ba las/_rgyu dang
[\[291b.4\]]bcas pa zhes bshad do/_/rnag ni phugs nang na 'chas shing 'thums pa yod pa ni rnag phugs 'chas pa ste/_de lta bu'i rma gang yin pa dag_/rma tshangs 'jam po nang na gnas shing bcug pas rma'i skyon de dag dag cing sbyong bar byed pas de'i phyir/_de'i rma'i nang du gzhug
[\[291b.5\]]par bya'o/_/skrangs pa ha cang ma smin brtol/_/smin zhing rnags par 'gyur ba spyad/_/phan pa'i sman dang zas sbyin dkri/_/shin tu rmar mi gnod pas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs pa ha cang ma smin pa la legs par ma brtags par gal te skrangs pa de mtshon gyis brtol
[\[291b.6\]]bar gyur na/_smin cing rnags pa'i thabs kyis yang dag par gso bar bya ste/_de yang phal cher lan tshwa dang /_skyur ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_dro ba'i lde gu'i sman rnams dang /_de bzhin du zas smin cing rnags par 'gyur ba'i bza' ba dang /_de bzhin du smin par 'gyur
[\[291b.7\]]ba'i lo ma la sogs pa dag gis gso bar bya la/_de dag kyang rma la shin tu mi gnod par bya ba ste/_lan 'ga' rma smin par bya ba'i phyir/_rma la cung zad gnod pa btang du zin kyang skyon du mi 'gyur ba ni yod do/_/snad pa'i rma ni gsar du byung /_/ral zhing kha bye 'phral
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]du btsem/_/rmen bu chen po bkas pa dang /_/rna shal bu ga chad pa btsem/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma de'i mod kho na la mtshon gyis dral zhing snad pa las byung ba ral zhing kha bye ba dang /_de bzhin du rmen bu chen po bkas pa las byung ba dang /_de bzhin rna shal gyi bu ga chad pa'ang
[\[292a.2\]]btsem par bya'o/_/mgo dang mig phugs sna dang mchu/_/mkhur tshos rna ba dpung pa brla/_/mgul pa dpral ba rlig pa dpyi/_/pho mtshan gzhang dang lto ba sogs/_/phugs ring ba na gnas rnams dang /_/sha che mi 'gul ma yin dang /_/chu so mchan khung la sogs dang /_/sha chung mgul
[\[292a.3\]]pa'i rma dag dang /_/dbugs dbyung zug rngu yod pa dang /_/thal sman dug med tshig mi btsem/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo bo dang mig phugs la sogs par gnas pa'i rma btsem par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du so dang /_mchan khung la sogs pa'i lus kyi gnas kyi rma btsem par mi bya'o/_/
[\[292a.4\]]de bzhin du sha chung ba dang /_mgul pa'i rma dag kyang btsem par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du dbugs rgyu zhing rgyu ba dang /_nang na zug rngu yod pa'i rma yang btsem par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du thal sman dang /_dug dang mes tshig pa'i rma yang btsem par mi bya'o/_/btsem pa rus dum khrag skam
[\[292a.5\]]dang /_/rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni/_/sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba yang /_/rang gi gnas su glan pa dang /_/rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzags la/_/skud pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem/_/zhes bya ba la/_btsem par bya ba ni rus tshigs gsum du gnas las goms pa gang
[\[292a.6\]]yin pa dang /_khrag skam po la sogs pa lag pas bsal zhing bton la/_de bzhin du sha chad mtshon gyis dbral te dum bur 'phyang ba de yang rang gi gnas su glan zhing sbyar ba dang /_de bzhin du rus pa dang tshigs la sogs pa byung zhing 'bur ba slar gzhug pa dang /_khrag gi rgyun
[\[292a.7\]]gzags shing spyad la/_ci rigs par ras kyi skud pa'am/_shing shun a sman ta ka dang mur ba dang /_gso ma la sogs pa'i skud pa 'jam po'am/_rgyus pa las byas pa'i skud pas legs par btsem par bya'o/_/srubs ni nye ba'am ring mi bya/_/blang ba che ba'am chung mi bya/_/
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_de ltar btsem pa na/_rma las ha cang nye ba'am/_thag ring ba nas btsem par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du rma'i gnas las srubs kyi blang ba kham chung bar mi bya'o/_/de nas spro bsring byas nas mthar/_/rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang /_/skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang /_/'bras
[\[292b.2\]]bu gsum dang sa la ki_/_seng phrom mngar dang snum bcas pas/_/bskus la bcing sogs sngon bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar btsem pa'i rjes thogs la/_nad pa spro bsring zhing dbugs phyung ste/_de nas de'i 'og tu rma kha sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba'i skyer pa dang /_zar ma
[\[292b.3\]]la sogs pa'i lde gu byug cing bsku ba dang /_de'i 'og tu bcing ba dang /_dud pas bdug pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/rma kha khrag ni med gyur gang /_/de ni cung zad brud byas te/_/rma 'byor pa nyid khrag yin pas/_/phyung ste legs par drub par bya/_/zhes
[\[292b.4\]]bya ba la/_rma gang zhig kha'i phyogs na khrag med par gyur pa de ni cung zad tsam brud cing /_mtshon gyis gtses la khrag dbyung ba dang btsem par bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_rma 'di 'byor zhing 'tsho bar byed pa ni khrag nyid yin pas na/_de phyung ste drub par bya ste/_de la bcing ba yul
[\[292b.5\]]la sogs/_/brtags nas nges par sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dis rma bcing zhing dkri bar bya ba yin pas na bcing ba ste/_de ni yul la sogs pa zhes pa/_yul dang nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa la brtags nas/_rang gi blos legs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/
[\[292b.6\]]bal gos pags pa dar gsum dro/_/zar ma'i ras ni bsil ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bal gyi gos yin pas na bal gos te/_snam bu dang la ba'o/_/pags pa'i rnam pa 'jam zhing dro ba'o/_/dar ni zab dar te/_bcing ba gsum po 'di dag ni nus
[\[292b.7\]]pa dro ba yin no/_/zar ma'i ras dang gsor sa ni bsil ba yin no/_/dro grang ran pa shing bal 'dab/_/ras bal rgyus pa shing shun yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dro ba dang grang ba gnyis ka'i rang bzhin ran pa ni shing bal 'dab ma dang /_ras bal
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]dang rgyus pa dang /_shing shun las byas pa'i chings ma ste/_rgyu de dag las skud pa'i tshul du byas pa'i rnam pas dkris pa'o/_/zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis/_/bad kan tshil ches rma la glan/_/chag thur shing byang
[\[293a.2\]]pags pa dang /_/shing shun smyig tshal sogs pas bcing /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang tshil ches pa'i rma la ni/_zangs ma dang lcags la sogs pa glan zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/rkang lag gi rus pa chag grugs su gyur pa la ni/_shing byang
[\[293a.3\]]la sogs pas bcing bar bya'o/_/dbyibs ni rang ming mthun pa yi/_/chings ma bcwa lnga rnams bya ste/_/shubs dang bkra shis lhod par bcing /_/mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing /_/mda' lcags khri dang dam bcing dang /_/sgye'u bla
[\[293a.4\]]re lkog shal dang /_/'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang /_/yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar/_/zhes bya ba ni/_dbyibs kyi rnam pa rang gi ming ji skad btags pa dang /_rjes su mthun pa'i chings ma sgye'u dang /_bkra shis nas yan lag
[\[293a.5\]]lnga'i bar bcwa lnga po de dag bcing ba'i don du sbyar bar bya'o/_/de dag kyang shubs ni mdzub shubs 'dra ba ste/_sor mo'i tshigs gsum pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bkra shis ni g.yung drung lta bu zur bzhi pa ste/_rus pa'i tshigs dang /_smin ma dang /_
[\[293a.6\]]nu ma'i bar dang /_mchan khung dang /_rna bar glan bar bya'o/_/lhod par bya ba ni/_rtswa la sogs pa las lhas bar bya ste/_de dag ni mgul ba dang /_pho mtshan la sogs pa la rma byung ba la glan par bya'o/_/mthar chags su bcing ba ni ras bal la
[\[293a.7\]]sogs pa zheng chung la ring ba ste/_de ni ming gi grar sbyar bar bya'o/_/zlum por bcing ba ni srad bu ste/_de ni yan lag thams cad bcing ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/mda' lcags ni gang ring por byas pa ste/_de yang lag ngar la sogs pa la sbyar bar
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]bya'o/_/khri ni khri rkang bzhi par byas pa ste/_de ni 'gram pa dang mur 'gram dang mkhur tshos snad pa la sbyar ro/_/dam du bcing ba ni khyad par du 'dug mi shes par bcing ba ste/_de ni lto ba dang brla'i rgyab tu glan zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/sgye'u ni so
[\[293b.2\]]rtsi la sogs pa'i 'jud pa'i sgye'u phran te/_de ni sor mo dang pho mtshan gyi rtsa la nad yod pa dang /_gcin nad za khu can la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bla re ni nyi tshan la sogs pa'i gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir/_ras bal la sogs pas khebs pa lta bu ste/_
[\[293b.3\]]pho mtshan skrangs pa la sogs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ba lang gi lkog ma lta bu ni/_lkog mar lkog shal ltar 'phyang ba ste/_de ni lus kyi yan lag 'phyang ba las gyur bar sbyar bar bya'o/_/'ur mthil lta bu ni zhing pa rnams bya skrod pa'i phyir/_'ur
[\[293b.4\]]rdo 'phen pa'i rdo'i gnas su byed pa 'ur mthil zhes bya'o/_de ni rna dang chu dang ko sko nad pa la sbyar zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/zur du glan pa ni gang du byang gcig dbus su skabs btod de/_rma gnyi ga 'dab chags su bcing du rung ba'o/_/de ni rma gnyis
[\[293b.5\]]'dab chags su byung ba la glan par bya'o/_/zlum po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ltar zlum por byas pa ste/_de ni yan lag zlum bor snang cing chag pa la glan par bya'o/_/yan lag lnga pa ni/_shing byang la sogs pa gang yan lag bzhi po yod cing gyen du dbyung ba
[\[293b.6\]]bya ste/_de ni nam tshong yan chad snad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de las gang zhig gang legs 'byor/_/de ni de ru legs par sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_bcing ba de dag gi nang nas/_chings ma gang zhig lus kyi phyogs gang dang legs par 'byor zhing 'byar la
[\[293b.7\]]'tsham pa'i chings ma shugs la sogs pa de dag ni/_lus kyi phyogs de ru legs par sbyar zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/brla dang mjug tsos mchan khung dang /_/chu so spyi bor dam du bcing /_/zhes bya ba la/_brla dang mjug tsos la sogs pa ni lus kyi
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]phyogs su rma byung ba la ni dam zhing sra bar bcing bar bya'o/_/lhod par bcing bar mi bya'o/_/lag ngar gdong dang rna ba dang /_/rgyab dang rtsib logs mgul pa lto/_/pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing /_/zhes bya ba la/_lag
[\[294a.2\]]ngar la sogs pa'i lus kyi phyogs su ni bcing ba dam lhod ran par bya la/_de bzhin du pho mtshan dang rlig pa yang ran pa tsam du bcing bar bya'o/_/mig dang tshigs su lhod par bcing /_/zhes bya ba la/_mig gi phyogs dang rus pa'i tshigs rnams su chings
[\[294a.3\]]ma lhod par bcing ngo /_/lhod bcings rma ni bad kan dang /_/rlung shas che la ran par bcing /_/zhes bya ba la/_lhod par bcing ba mig dang tshigs la rma bad kan dang rlung gi shas che ba yod na lhod par na tsam du bcing ngo /_/ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing /_/
[\[294a.4\]]dam zhing shin tu dam par bcing /_/zhes bya ba la/_ran par bcing pa'i gnas lag ngar la sogs par/_bad kan dang rlung gi shas che ba'i rma yod na/_ran par mi bcing gi dam du bcing bar bya'o/_/dam du bcing ba'i gnas brla dang mjug tsos la sogs
[\[294a.5\]]pa'i rma bad kan dang rlung las byung ba yin na/_shin tu shas cher dam du bcing bar bya'o/_/dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe/_/zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang rlung gi shas che ba'i rma de gnyis las dgun zhes bya ba
[\[294a.6\]]dgun stod dang dgun smad/_de bzhin du dpyid kyi tshe ste/_zla ba drug la ni zhag gsum nas dgrol zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni/_/dam bcing gnas su ran par bcing /_/ran bcing gnas su lhod par bcing /_/lhod bcing
[\[294a.7\]]gnas su bcing mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rma la ni dam du bcing ba'i gnas brla la sogs par dam du mi bcing ran bar bcing bar bya'o/_/ran par bcing ba'i gnas lag ngar la sogs par ni lhod par bcing bar bya'o/_/lhod par
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]bcing ba'i gnas mig dang tshigs su khrag dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rma byung na de bcing bar mi bya'o/_/de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe/_/snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i rma de gnyis la so ga dang ston ka'i tshe ni nyin re zhing
[\[294b.2\]]snga dro dang phyi dro'i dus su dgrol zhing bcing bar bya'o/_/ma bcings sha sbrang sbrang bu dang /_/lhags pa ser bu sogs pas gnod/_/rma red gyur cing der snum dang /_/sman ni yun rings gnas mi 'gyur/_/sbyang pa'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang /_/'tsho ba
[\[294b.3\]]kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma ma bcings na sha sbrang la sogs pas gtses par 'gyur zhing /_de dang reg pa'i dbang gis 'tshe ba la sogs kyis gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rma de bcing ba med par snum gyis bskus na yang sman de
[\[294b.4\]]yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur zhing /_sman gyi lde gu la sogs pa bskus pa yang yun ring por mi thogs par bskams pa'am lud par gyur pa'am/_de bzhin du legs bar bcos su zin kyang rma 'tsho zhing 'drub par dka' ba dang /_gal te 'tsho
[\[294b.5\]]zhing 'drub kyang sha mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ro/_/bcings na chag cing phye mar 'gyur/_/'phres sam 'bur gyur dral gyur tam/_/rtsa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang /_/rma ni myur du bde bar 'tsho/_/ldang dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i/_/spyod lam kun
[\[294b.6\]]la gnod pa med/_/ces bya ba la/_rma legs par bcings shing bsdams pas ni/_chag cing phye mar grugs pa'am/_'phres shing gnas pa las 'phyugs pa'am/_/'bur zhing mtho ba'am/_dral zhing gas par gyur pa'am/_
[\[294b.7\]]rtsa dang rgyus pa chad par gyur kyang /_rma bde blag tu myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ldang ba dang mal na nyal ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam kun la yang gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyam dang /_/sra zhing rab na 'tsho bar dka'/_/
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]'jam zhing mnyam la na ba med/_/rma ni myur du dag cing 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma gang kha cher skyes shing mtho ba'i zlum po yod pa dang /_mtho dman mi mnyam pa dang /_sra zhing mnyen bag med pa dang /_rab tu na zhing tshor
[\[295a.2\]]ba drag pa dang ldan pa'i rma de lta bu ni 'tsho zhing 'byang bar dka' ba yin no/_/rma gang 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /_na ba med pa ni myur du dag cing 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/rma ni yun ring sha chung dang /_/rtsub pas 'byor bar ma gyur na/_/nad gzhi dus tshigs ji bzhin
[\[295a.3\]]du/_/sman dang lo mas dgab par bya/_/ma rnyings gzhon zhing bu ga med/_/kun nas legs par khebs pa dang /_/phyis shing mi rtsub lo ma ni/_/'o ma can shing stag pa dang /_/ardzu na dang ka dam pa'i/_/lo ma yis ni g.yogs par bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[295a.4\]]la/_rma yun ring zhing dus ring po lon te/_rnyings pa dang /_sha chung zhing zad pa dang /_rtsub par gyur pa'i rgyus 'byor zhing 'tsho bar ma gyur na/_nad gzhi ji lta ba'i tshul dang mthun pa dang /_dus tshigs dang ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du rma'i sman lde gu dang /_snum
[\[295a.5\]]la sogs pa rma la phan par byed pa dag bsku bar bya ba dang /_shing 'o ma can la sogs pa'i lo mas dag bcing gso bar bya ste/_de yang 'di ltar rlung las gyur pa'i rma grang ba'i dus su snum pa dang dro bas gso ba dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rma dang /_de bzhin du dro ba'i
[\[295a.6\]]dus su ni bsil bar gso ba dang /_bad kan shas che ba'i rma dang /_grang ba dang dro ba'i dus su ni phal cher rtsub pa dang /_grang bas gso bar bya ste/_'gres 'dis thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lo ma rnyings shing dengs pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[295a.7\]]gzhon zhing gsar pa dang /_bug rdol med pa dang /_de bzhin du kun nas thams cad du legs par khebs shing legs par gzhag pa/_phyis shing dri ma med par bkrus pa dang /_mi rtsub cing sra ba ma yin pa'i lo ma 'o ma can gyi shing la sogs pa las byung bas legs
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]par g.yogs par bya'o/_/mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang /_/'bus zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/byi ba sbrul gyi dug dang ni/_/thal sman rno dang dug gis phog_/rma ni bcing bar mi bya zhing /_/sha 'drul gzhang khar mi bzad rnags/_/'drul shing tsha dang na
[\[295b.2\]]bcas par/_/skrangs skams me dbal mi bcing ngo /_/zhes bya ba la/_mi mdzes btab pa dang /_de bzhin du mes tshig pa'i rma bcing bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'bus zos pa'i rma nas dug gis phog pa'i rma yang bcing bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sha rul zhing 'drul
[\[295b.3\]]ba nas me dbal gyi bar gyi rma yang bcing bar mi bya'o/_/rma gang legs par ma bsrungs par/_/sbrang ma srin bu 'jug byed de/_/de yis zos pas na ba dang /_/skrang dang rnag khrag 'dzag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rma gang zhig legs par ma bsrungs shing /_/ma
[\[295b.4\]]btsas pas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa 'byung ngo /_/deng ni bkru dang dag par ni/_/bye'u rug la sogs sde tshan sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bu zhugs pa'i rma der ni bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbyar bas bsku zhing sbyar ba dang dag ste bskrad par bya'o/_/
[\[295b.5\]]sab ta par+Ni ka rany+dza/_/ar ka dang ni nim pa dang /_/rwa tsha dang ni shing tsha rnams/_/ba gcin dang ni btags ba yi/_/lde gu de la bsku ba dang /_/thal sman chu ni blugs pas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rma der sab ta par+Ni la sogs pa dang /_ba gcin
[\[295b.6\]]btags pa'i lde gu bsku bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du thal sman rnon po'i chu blugs pa yang phan pa yin no/_/yang na sha rlon gyis g.yogs la/_/de ni myur du dbyung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rma de sha rlon rma'i tshad dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i sha'i dum bus bkag cing
[\[295b.7\]]g.yogs la/_'bu de de la chags pa na myur zhing rings par gdon par bya'o/_/'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas/_/myur du 'tsho ba bar mi bya ste/_/de ni gnod pa chung ngus kyang /_/slar zhing 'grams par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma 'di ni nang na skyon dang bcas shing rnags
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]la sogs pas khyab pas sman pas rings shing myur bar 'drubs shing 'byar bar bya ba'i phyir/_'tshob pa'i sman bsku bar mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir sman de na ngan gnod pa dang bcas pas rma de 'tsho zhing 'byar yang sla zhing 'grams pa dang 'jig par
[\[296a.2\]]'gyur ba yin no/_/'tshob par gyur kyang ma zhu dang /_/drag shul bud med bsten sogs spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rma 'tshob cing 'byor bar gyur kyang nad pa des ma zhu ba dang drag shul la sogs pa spang ngo /_/zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar/_/cho ga 'bad
[\[296a.3\]]pas bsrung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ma zhu ba dang /_bud med dang phrad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di ni rma 'tshob nas zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar du bsrung zhing bsdam par bya'o/_/gnas skabs de dang der ni byung gyur tshe/_/nad gzhi la sogs stobs kyis rjes
[\[296a.4\]]'brangs te/_/phyi ma nas bshad rgya cher legs brtags la/_/thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma'i gnas skabs gsal bar ma bstan pa'i tshul dang ming gang dag yin pa de dag byung zhing skyes par gyur pa na/_sman pas
[\[296a.5\]]rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi la sogs pa'i stobs kyis rjes su 'brangs nas/_'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma nas rgya cher bshad pa de legs par brtags shing dpyad la/_rma de gso ba'i thabs de dang des 'bad pa dang ldan pas gso bar bya'o/_/
[\[296a.6\]]blos gzhung la ma brtags pa'i rang dga' dang /_'bad pa med pa'i sgyid zhan pas ni mi bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i rnam par 'grel pa/_tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nye
[\[296a.7\]]bar sbyar ba las/_le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o/_/
